story:
To remove swirls and scratches, spread wax, what you can do with AutoBuff:What You’ll Get 

Polishing a car in an auto care center may cost you hundreds of dollars. AutoBuff saves you a lot of money since you are able to detail your car at home by yourself! 

Autobuff is designed with delicate appearance, comfortable grip and  easy operation which symbolized a combination of mechanical aesthetic and powerful performance.

Thanks to its ability to move orbitally and create dual operations, Autobuff is a perfect fit for anyone who wants to bring back their car’s original shine effortlessly without hurting the car paint.

A glowing and shining car always comes either at the cost of money or hours of time and energy. However, AutoBuff, unlike other standard rotary polishers, is much easier to control because of its dual-action movement, which means you can use it to remove the swirls and scratches easily with considerably less energy.

Whether you are a newbie, hobbyist or professional, anyone can use this cordless polisher efficiently and effortlessly!

Cordless design gives you much more freedom of movement than wired ones. Featuring a 4000mAh battery that lasts for 45 minutes, it enables you to polish your car without pesky cable and you can easily work on those off-angle and hard-to-reach areas of the vehicle such as the lower part of the bumpers.

The USB-C charging port is intended for a better portability which means you can virtually top up the buffer in your car with a USB-C cable.

Weighing at 2.8 pounds, AutoBuff is light enough for optimum maneuverability. In addition, it has a round handle for a convenient and comfortable grip so that you can easily move them at any angles when needed.

Superior to other polishers that are loud and noisy, Autobuff  turns out to be much more quiet which is lower than 80 decibel, protecting your ears when you are working.

AutoBuff also has an optimum inner cooling system to avoid overheating.

AutoBuff allows you to select the speed by pressing the button on the top of the machine. It has a speed range of 3,400 to a 3,800 OPM.

Press Once, you’ll get a speed of around 3400r/min. Press twice, it will level up to 3800r/min. To shut it down, you need to press it 3 times continuously.

The speed control of AutoBuff ensures that you don’t remove your car paint completely. There are safety speeds you can adjust during polishing as well as exchangeable different pads you can choose from.

AutoBuff comes with 3 pads which are of varying levels of coarseness. It is an ideal starter set for buffers of all experience levels.

Due to its hook and loop design, you can easily switch 3 pads according to your different needs while polishing.

In addition to your precious car, the dual-action AutoBuff is also ideal for polishing and buffing on cars, boats, marble surfaces, etc. It helps your big toys restore their former glory.

We have an R&D center and three major manufacturing departments: electromechanical, electronic, and injection molding. We have extensively cooperated with many well-known colleges (institutions) of the Chinese Academy of Sciences to produce more than 150 national patents and 5 foreign patents. Our products have been rated as Guangdong Famous Brand Product, Guangdong Key New Product, Guangdong Independent Innovation Product and Guangdong High-tech Product. We attach great importance to the user experience, and through the joint efforts of the team to create better automotive products.

The release of AutoBuff follows the successful launch of Pumpit. Raising over $250,000 from backers in 2020, we decide to introduce our second design to you.

story:
This is how it all started

My husband Kevin came to me when we had three small children and asked if we should abandon this idea we had for a home improvement tool because of the high cost of raising a family. We had a home made prototype we  were using and it worked great." I told him if we didn't do it now we never would." So we did!

Ten years later, six of those battling the U.S. Patent office an unscrupulous Patent Lawyer, multiple prototypes ( unique pour spout toughest), three more kids a new hip ( Kevin), a reputable manufacturer and mold maker, distribution channel WE ARE HERE!

The final push! We are inviting you to be part it! Less than 1% of people that set out to bring a product to market ever do. If you go to a Casino and play Black Jack you have a 10% chance of winning. Lets defy all the odds and make some great D.I.Y. projects come alive!   

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Our funding break down is this. $ 4500. goes to our initial manufacturing order.
  • $850. is for shipping to Chicago
  • $1200 is postal fulfillment/shipping to deliver the product to your door. 
  • $950 is for the final mold alterations and set up stamping fee.
  • We are confident that with so many different projects that there is many different demands for multiple Kits. We have assembled different packages to accommodate these demands. You may want more then one if you simply find yourself working with more than one color.  
  • All funds raised go to delivering your order. This Campaign is pre-order financing. This is not a donation. This is the end of an expensive and exhausting journey and we are asking for you to offer us some relief. All kits paid for will get delivered. 

The Impact

 

  • We really would love to have every supporter walk into a store one day and see that they were part of that finished product. That this product came alive with their help.
  • We have working samples as you can see. We want to stay in touch with our supporters and share finished projects.  
  • Our success will allow us to re approach Big Box and Mom and Pops with an inventory!  

Risks & Challenges

 We have been out at Vendor days, trade shows and such but without inventory we have been dead in the water, We needed to put together our packaging, color scheme and have samples in hand to get anyone to truly listen to us. This where your support comes in.  You are paramount!

  • We have a proven decades long passion toward this goal and want to see it through with you.
  • All the pieces are in place and again this is the final push. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

  • Please help by getting the  word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indigo go share tools!
  •  Please scroll all the way down to see all the offers.PLEASE SHARE!

story:
LuDela Perfect is the world’s first real-flame scent-on-demand decorative candlelight
fixture featuring wireless remote control ignition, extinguish, timers and extensive safety features. You can now create instant ambiance with beautiful accent decor in any room
with a few touches of a button while enjoying increased peace of mind and relaxation. 
Best of all, at a cost of just 25 cents per hour LuDela Perfect is a fantastic value well
worth the initial one-time candlelight fixture investment. 

On top of the great value, every time you enjoy Better Light with LuDela you'll feel the
warmth and joy of delivering Better Lives to those less fortunate as LuDela delivers a book
for every candle product sold to bring libraries to underserved communities. Thanks for checking us out and supporting the Better Light, Better Lives vision by backing and
sharing the LuDela project!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Enjoy Instant Ambiance and ignite multiple real-flame candles with our wall-mountable remote control. Quickly extinguish your candles with a touch of a button. No more need for lighters. The battery life of the candle and remote can both last anywhere from 6-9 months based on usage.

 

 

Have peace of mind while enjoying your candlelight experiences knowing that LuDela
Perfect's Tilt-Extinguish technology will extinguish the flame if the candle accidentally
tilts or falls. Built with kids and pets in mind, the LuDela Perfect will self-extinguish thanks
to an internal gyroscope.

 

 

 

Increase safety and serenity with timed burns. Set a timer on the LuDela Perfect to blow
out its flame when you want.

 

 

 

 

 

Have your candles match your holiday decorations. Instantly and affordably change the color and texture of your LuDela candle to suit the season with our swappable outer shells.

 

 

LuDela Perfect is the world’s first scented candle that allows you to choose the exact fragrance you want, when you want it, regardless of the color of your candle. Just pop in one of LuDela’s patented SunScent Fragrance Rings to enjoy months of beautiful aromas designed by global leaders in home fragrance.

 

We're excited to bring 6 scent options with our Kickstarter Campaign. Hot Apple Cider - our Staff Pick will be the first available to ship with fulfillment in November! After the campaign, additional SunScent rings will be available through LuDela's website. Check out our Add-Ons section for more information!

 

Unlike traditional pillar candles where the flame disappears into a dim tunnel, LuDela
Perfect’s flame burns as bright and beautiful as a brand new pillar candle, day after day
after day. Celebrate!

 

Finally, a luxury decorative pillar you can use every day without worrying about it melting, deforming and losing its beautiful accent décor. LuDela Perfect looks and burns like a new candle every day. 

 

Enjoy perfect candlelight instantly without the wax mess or wick hassles. No more worries about wax on your dining room tables or mantles. No more digging through the wax to pull
the wick out. And no more flipping the candle upside down to light it. In fact, no lighters or matches needed!

 

Our simple, hassle-free refills deliver over 20 hours of odor- and soot-free candlelight. And
at only $5 per refill, they cost a fraction of what many luxury candles cost to burn.

 

Every time you use or give LuDela products as a gift you are illuminating the minds of those
less fortunate. For every candle product sold LuDela donates a book to bring libraries to underserved communities around the world, staring in Uganda next February, with our first charity partner Books for Africa. So you’re not just enjoying better light, you’re creating
better lives by delivering the empowering gift of literacy to those in need.

 

The LuDela story began in Uganda, where founder Jamie Bianchini was riding his tandem bicycle with a Ugandan friend named Innocent. Innocent shared his dream with Jamie to
start a school for AIDS orphans and those in need. Innocent’s community lacked access to books and opportunities to receive a fundamental education. Jamie promised to do
everything he could to help make Innocent's dream for his people a reality.

 

 

Later, in Burkina Faso, Jamie spent the night at a rustic guesthouse where he was given a candle as a light source. He accidentally fell asleep with the candle burning and woke up to
a room filled with thick smoke from a candle fire. Luckily, he was able to put the fire out
with his boxer shorts and nobody was hurt.

 

As he rode his bike onwards the next day the inspiration for the LuDela Perfect came to him. After helping Innocent realize his dream for the Good Hope School in Uganda, Jamie was inspired to use the patented LuDela innovation as a vehicle to illuminate the minds of more children around the world by giving the empowering gift of literacy through the purchases
of LuDela candle products. This is Better Light, Better Lives. Join us!

 

1. Click Back this Project: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on
the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the
very end of this campaign.

3. Color, Scent & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to
select your Scent, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

 

Add On Instructions:

To add one the above options to your pledge, follow these steps:

  • Press the 'Manage Your Pledge' button above. If you have not pledged yet, it will say
    'Back this Project'. 
  • Increase your pledge in the 'Pledge Amount' box by the total of the add-ons you
    want to add. 

 

 

Jamie is a life-long entrepreneur and award winning graduate from the USC Entrepreneur Program. He’s started and exited several traditional businesses but is best known for co-founding the the world’s first intercultural cycling expedition though 81 countries called
Peace Pedalers. It was on this journey where he invented LuDela Perfect and his passion
for social impact business ventures was spawned, leading to the Better Light, Better Lives literacy and education movement as the foundaon of the LuDela brand.

Kathy is a 35 year veteran in the candle industry and is currently the President of the
National Candle Association and the CEO of Renegade Candle Company. She was
Senior Buyer at Walt Disney, where she worked with world-class artists to create new
product lines, brands and forms for the US and European parks. With The Limited as
Director of R&D, she created merchandise for Victoria’s Secret and Bath & Body Works, working directly with top scientists and traveled worldwide to develop and source.
As GMM of Illuminations she oversaw the teams responsible for store and catalog
assortment and visual display. To augment her capabilities and understanding of product
and brand development end-to-end, Kathy moved into manufacturing with Illuminations, Candle-lite, Nature’s Finest Candles and Fragrant Passage. In positions including GM,
she had direct responsibility for areas that included marketing, product pricing, overhead control, R&D, scale-up, production scheduling and QA. Kathy is presently the CEO of
Renegade Candle Company.

story:
ANIMALS

What do a crocodile, an elephant, a giraffe, a lion and a zebra have in common? They are all WUMBA – the world’s one and only collection of unique magnetic wooden toys. 10 animals, each with 3 blocks and multiple fun combinations.

 

This is WUMBA Elephant.  

Our Elephant stands, eats grass, pours water on its back, runs, runs fast, and sometimes even flies and it is purple.

 

 This is the kind WUMBA Crocodile.

 Multiple action poses, 2 emotions and a special gliding feature.

 

 This is WUMBA Zebra.

It drinks, it runs, it looks forward and backward, it bows and even has 9 stripes and a blue tail.

 

This is obviously WUMBA Lion.

This Lion likes performing real circus stunts, doing yoga. It is beautiful and cute. It also has a unique nodding feature.

 

This is WUMBA Giraffe.

 It enjoys doing Pilates and often stares at the stars.

 

The New WUMBA Animals (limited quantity)

This is WUMBA Pig

 

This is WUMBA Cat

 

This is WUMBA Sheep

This is WUMBA Walrus
 
This is WUMBA Dog (prototype before painting)
 

FUN

Consisting of 3 wooden blocks, each animal can be assembled in multiple ways. But there’s more! Although each animal has a different shape, they all have the same radius and smart magnet polarity, making the blocks interchangeable. With this feature, there is virtually no limit to the number of mix and match combinations. 
In short, kids can build as many wooden toy animals as they want! The fun never ends!

 

LEARNING

These toys are for small kids (2 yrs. +). The idea is a 3D version of popular early mix-and-match books. We took Montessori and Waldorf guidelines and brought them to life through wood and magnets. With our idea of the magnetic construction toys, kids can re-create the forms offered or come up with new forms. Specially developed shapes, prints, colors, and magnets allow children to build and create in ways they can't with standard building blocks!  

 

SAFETY

Not only is it fun to see what kids come up with, but parents can also rest assured that these magnetic wooden toys with their smooth edges are completely safe. Made of natural solid Ukrainian beech wood, WUMBA uses lead-free magnets and water-based paints. It is also impossible to see, touch or extract the magnets, so there is no danger of a child swallowing them.

 

We have chosen beech wood as a perfect solution for our toys. It is oak-strong; therefore, each block is long-lasting. Also, beech wood has antiseptic properties. It is easy to work with and leaves fewer hooks and chips, so children can’t get hurt. An extra bonus of using beech wood is that it has a beautiful texture: the annual layers are well distinguished, so it looks amazing after polishing.
Beech trees regrow fast and we use only FSC certified wood meaning our toys are sustainable.

The blocks are painted with water-based lacquers. It is 100% eco-friendly, as it’s based on acrylate, which dissolves in water and contains no toxic paint chemicals (lead-free). This covering allows the wood to adapt to the humidity of the environment, which increases the product’s lifespan. Blocks covered with such lacquers don’t lose their color after being exposed to sunlight for a long time. Our blocks contain no flammable substances and are therefore fireproof.  
Furthermore, it doesn’t totally overlay the wooden texture. So the result looks colorful but still natural.

To connect the blocks, we use strong Neodymium magnets. They have the longest lifespan, losing only 1% of their strength in 100 years. The magnets are small, light-weight and lead-free. We use 7x7mm cylindrical magnets with an axial magnetic field. Our magnets have a bonding force of 1.5 kg. 
Most importantly, they are implanted and securely sealed inside the wood.  

 

We take safety very seriously, and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you. The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH, as well as the equivalent US standards covered by ASTM F963 and CPSIA.

As such, we provide you with a lifetime guarantee for our products, and we will replace any broken block free of charge including shipping. You will, however, have to send us the photo of the broken block to make sure it wasn’t misused. 
We are confident in our quality and can guarantee you everlasting, enjoyable play with WUMBA.

 

TEAM

What began as a project that involved simple yet boring geometric shapes and external magnets 2 years ago has now evolved into this awesome and playful set of animal-shaped magnetic wooden toys for toddlers. WUMBA is the easiest way for parents to see their kids building unique magnetic art.

The WUMBA Team of Kirill Lewin, Olga Kotyck, Kristina Tarashchuk, and Sergei Kleimenov are dedicated toy people. 
We love kids and we love their toys, that is why we believe in creating interesting, playful and safe products that boost creativity and imagination. 

 

Implanting the magnets into the wooden body; 

Cutting and shaping the blocks; 

Polishing and fine-tuning the blocks; 

Coloring the blocks; 

Printing the decals on the blocks. 

Every block requires 30 minutes of labor and machinery work. After that, quality testing is performed until we are confident in the safety of each block. 
We have the facilities and the knowledge of how it should be done. 

If you prefer natural toys with high innovative play value and if you love this project as much as we do, please support us and let’s make WUMBA happen together!
story_txt:
ANIMALSWhat do a crocodile, an elephant, a giraffe, a lion and a zebra have in common? They are all WUMBA – the world’s one and only collection of unique magnetic wooden toys. 10 animals, each with 3 blocks and multiple fun combinations. This is WUMBA Elephant.  Our Elephant stands, eats grass, pours water on its back, runs, runs fast, and sometimes even flies and it is purple.  This is the kind WUMBA Crocodile. Multiple action poses, 2 emotions and a special gliding feature.

 
 This is WUMBA Zebra.It drinks, it runs, it looks forward and backward, it bows and even has 9 stripes and a blue tail.

 
This is obviously WUMBA Lion.This Lion likes performing real circus stunts, doing yoga. It is beautiful and cute. It also has a unique nodding feature. This is WUMBA Giraffe. It enjoys doing Pilates and often stares at the stars. The New WUMBA Animals (limited quantity)This is WUMBA Pig

 
This is WUMBA Cat

 
This is WUMBA Sheep

This is WUMBA Walrus 
This is WUMBA Dog (prototype before painting) FUNConsisting of 3 wooden blocks, each animal can be assembled in multiple ways. But there’s more! Although each animal has a different shape, they all have the same radius and smart magnet polarity, making the blocks interchangeable. With this feature, there is virtually no limit to the number of mix and match combinations. In short, kids can build as many wooden toy animals as they want! The fun never ends!

 
LEARNINGThese toys are for small kids (2 yrs. +). The idea is a 3D version of popular early mix-and-match books. We took Montessori and Waldorf guidelines and brought them to life through wood and magnets. With our idea of the magnetic construction toys, kids can re-create the forms offered or come up with new forms. Specially developed shapes, prints, colors, and magnets allow children to build and create in ways they can't with standard building blocks!   SAFETYNot only is it fun to see what kids come up with, but parents can also rest assured that these magnetic wooden toys with their smooth edges are completely safe. Made of natural solid Ukrainian beech wood, WUMBA uses lead-free magnets and water-based paints. It is also impossible to see, touch or extract the magnets, so there is no danger of a child swallowing them. We have chosen beech wood as a perfect solution for our toys. It is oak-strong; therefore, each block is long-lasting. Also, beech wood has antiseptic properties. It is easy to work with and leaves fewer hooks and chips, so children can’t get hurt. An extra bonus of using beech wood is that it has a beautiful texture: the annual layers are well distinguished, so it looks amazing after polishing.Beech trees regrow fast and we use only FSC certified wood meaning our toys are sustainable.The blocks are painted with water-based lacquers. It is 100% eco-friendly, as it’s based on acrylate, which dissolves in water and contains no toxic paint chemicals (lead-free). This covering allows the wood to adapt to the humidity of the environment, which increases the product’s lifespan. Blocks covered with such lacquers don’t lose their color after being exposed to sunlight for a long time. Our blocks contain no flammable substances and are therefore fireproof.  Furthermore, it doesn’t totally overlay the wooden texture. So the result looks colorful but still natural.To connect the blocks, we use strong Neodymium magnets. They have the longest lifespan, losing only 1% of their strength in 100 years. The magnets are small, light-weight and lead-free. We use 7x7mm cylindrical magnets with an axial magnetic field. Our magnets have a bonding force of 1.5 kg. Most importantly, they are implanted and securely sealed inside the wood.  

 
We take safety very seriously, and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you. The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH, as well as the equivalent US standards covered by ASTM F963 and CPSIA.As such, we provide you with a lifetime guarantee for our products, and we will replace any broken block free of charge including shipping. You will, however, have to send us the photo of the broken block to make sure it wasn’t misused. We are confident in our quality and can guarantee you everlasting, enjoyable play with WUMBA. TEAMWhat began as a project that involved simple yet boring geometric shapes and external magnets 2 years ago has now evolved into this awesome and playful set of animal-shaped magnetic wooden toys for toddlers. WUMBA is the easiest way for parents to see their kids building unique magnetic art.The WUMBA Team of Kirill Lewin, Olga Kotyck, Kristina Tarashchuk, and Sergei Kleimenov are dedicated toy people. We love kids and we love their toys, that is why we believe in creating interesting, playful and safe products that boost creativity and imagination. 

 
Implanting the magnets into the wooden body; Cutting and shaping the blocks; Polishing and fine-tuning the blocks; Coloring the blocks; Printing the decals on the blocks. Every block requires 30 minutes of labor and machinery work. After that, quality testing is performed until we are confident in the safety of each block. We have the facilities and the knowledge of how it should be done. If you prefer natural toys with high innovative play value and if you love this project as much as we do, please support us and let’s make WUMBA happen together!

story:
Anonabox creator August Germar has long been inspired by the career of John Draper, a “legendary figure within the computer programming world and the hacker and security communit[ies]” - Wikipedia. While contacting Mr. Draper for a possible security audit of our new Anonabox devices, we learned that the Crunchman was becoming burdened by increasing medical expenses, and we saw a way to thank the man that had been such an inspiration.

Anonabox got its original push right here on Indiegogo and we’ve since developed three new privacy routers. Alongside our new devices we’re also launching a special limited edition blue Anonabox PRO in homage of John's famous blue boxes. A portion of the proceeds from this device will go directly to Mr. Draper to help ensure he can share his life's story. You can show your support for the Crunchman while receiving the most feature-rich Anonabox privacy router yet.

What We Need & What You Get

We feel Crunchman’s story is one of great interest for all information technology users and fans, so our goal is to help the Crunchman fund the development of his autobiography as much as we can. This is why we've chosen a flexible monetary goal.

The run of limited edition Anonabox devices ends March 29th. This blue version of the device is only available here on Indiegogo. Each device will have a unique sequential serial number and certificate of authenticity. The more contributors we have, the more funds the Crunchman will receive.

Special Edition Project Blue Anonabox PRO:

If you missed the special limited edition 'Blue Boxes' you can still protect your privacy and help a great cause. The retail version of the Anonabox PRO is the most feature-rich, Tor and VPN capable router on the market. This device is truly a diverse tool and allows users to remain private and anonymous online, helps bypass censorship efforts at school, in the office and abroad, provides access to the deep web, allows connecting to location specific content and much more. The User Interface is intuitive enough for the most novice users, yet provides sophisticated users with in-depth control and customizable configurations. More detailed information about the Anonabox PRO and its applications can be found on our website at: https://www.anonabox.com/buy-anonabox-pro.html

All Anonabox PRO Routers come with a 1-month free trial of HideMyAss! Pro VPN service.

The Impact

Anonabox seeks to provide Internet users with an affordable, easy-to-use and portable privacy device that is useable and practical for a wide range of Internet users. Anonabox PRO features both Tor and VPN access. Whether used individually or together, users are provided with these robust tools configurable in a user interface for customizable personal privacy. Privacy is a right, and intrusions by governments, websites, marketing firms and blackmail groups are encroaching on this freedom like never before. Fight back with this special device.

Through this Indiegogo campaign, you can fight back against these intrusions, while supporting a legendary security advocate, John Draper. John has a storied life as a keystone figure of the Internet age. He is credited as a founding personality of the hacker counter culture, been a long standing security and open source software advocate and remains an industry consultant. His unique position within these communities and the countless untold behind-the-scenes stories from his days as a phone phreaker and personal friend to Apple founders means his story will surely appeal to anyone interested in the early days of the Internet and computer systems. Your support will help ensure that ongoing expenses, like increasing medical bills, don't hamper John's efforts at publishing his many life stories. The more support for Project Blue, the more resources Mr. Draper will have to accomplish this goal of publishing his biography.

We also encourage you to visit our website https://www.anonabox.com to learn more about how Anonabox is fighting back for your right to online privacy, as well as to discover some of the other highly practical uses of Anonabox Tor and VPN routers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember to share our post and tell your friends! Like and share our pages on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram and be sure to use Indiegogo’s share tools. With a little help we can make a huge in the life of a computer programming legend, and let his story finally be told.

Important Anonabox Links:

The Original Anonabox

Buy on Amazon

Buy on Anonabox.com

Fawkes by Anonabox

Buy on Amazon

Buy on Anonabox.com

Tunneler by Anonabox

Buy on Amazon

Buy on Anonabox.com

Anonabox PRO

Buy on Amazon

Buy on Anonabox.com

story:
CORY MACK


Whether you know Cory Mack as just the joyful man who rarely showed anything but a smile or as one of the most loyal friends The NET has ever had, Cory is consistently willing to go out of his way to serve others and make them feel loved. 

We have an opportunity to do the same!

Unfortunately, Cory is currently incarcerated at a facility over 4 hours away from Fort Worth. This makes it difficult to see him on a regular basis. However, Cory desires to remain connected to the Net community and the city of Fort Worth. We asked Cory if there was anything he needed or wanted, and this was his only request: 

A subscription to the Fort Worth Star Telegram!

THE IMPACT

God does not forget his people stating, "For the Lord hears the needy and does not despise his own people who are prisoners."(Psalms 69:33) We were all once prisoners until the grace of Jesus was poured out on us. Therefore, our response must be to love in the same way and walk in a manner worthy of the calling you have received. Throughout scripture God instructs His church to pour themselves out for the least of these. He declares, "Remember those who are in prison, as though in prison with them, and those who are mistreated, since you also are in the body." (Hebrews 13:3)

Cory Mack will feel supported, remembered, and most of all LOVED by all his friends and NET family.



HOW CAN WE MAKE IT HAPPEN?

Heres what it takes:

  • It costs $38.50 for a months subscription to the Star Telegram
  • That means for a years worth of paper we need $462 
  • We want to raise enough to get Cory at least a 2 year subscription


Where Does My Donation Go?

The NET is a nonprofit in Fort Worth that exists to restore dignity to those in poverty through community and relationships. 

We have walked with Cory for over four years and have seen God change his heart as well as change others hearts through him. Through the successes and trials, Cory consistently reminded us, "Y'all are family and everything" 

Your donation will go to The NET and is tax deductible. 

Any donations received over the needed amount will go to support other NET friends in prison. 


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

PRAY: It is not always easy to know how to pray for those in prison. Praise God he gave us a Helper who knows exactly how to pray
"Likewise the Spirit helps us in our weakness. For we do not know what to pray for as we ought, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us with groanings too deep for words. And he who searches hearts knows what is the mind of the Spirit, because the Spirit intercedes for the saints according to the will of God."    (Romans 8:26-27)

story: Our campaign has ended! Thank you to everyone who has contributed. We are working hard putting the funds raised to good use getting our PANCAKES operation rocking and rolling! As it stands, we are looking at opening in the spring of 2015. Again, thanks to everyone who has supported us!

story:
Brik Tile

We've been developing and prototyping these 10"x10" Brik Tiles (patent pending) for over a year. Each Brik Tile is backed with a temporary adhesive and can be applied multiple times to almost any smooth surface. Unlike traditional baseplates, Brik Tiles can be attached next to each other directly (without the need for gaps or spacers).


Not just for pixel art. Brik Tile can be used to organize cables, hang photos, display cards or virtually any type of small shelf. Apply at home or at the office!

Briks

We're also developing new Briks. These new flat 1x1 Briks include a small ledge at the bottom for simple removal. Briks are perfect for creating pixel art designs on Brik Tile.

Brik Clips

Brik Clips are perfect for hanging art work, photos, cables, keys and more. Every Indiegogo backer will receive a Brik Clip with every Brik Tile.

Structure Kit

The Structure Kit includes enough 2x2, 2x4, 2x10, 1x4, and 1x6 building bricks to build any one of the following at a time (assorted colors):

• Business Card Holder
• Pen Holder
• Small Shelf
• Mail Holder
• Sunglasses Holder


Brik Build

Use BrikBuild.com to design your own pixel art or browse hundreds of popular designs submitted by other members of the Brik community. Brik Build automatically calculates what Briks you'll need and generates a downloadable PDF template.

Brik Book

Brik Book was launched in March of 2015, and has been featured in Vanity Fair (Ultimate Gift of 2015), Oprah Magazine (Oprah's O-List), and others. Brik Book for Mac is available now. Brik Book for PC is coming soon and uses the same patent pending, temporary adhesive technology you'll find in Brik Tile.


Why We're Raising Money

While we've done extensive prototyping, the final version of Brik Tile and the new Briks will require special molds for the ABS plastic we'll be using. Raising money on Indiegogo will help pay for production-ready prototypes, molds, packaging, and the first order of Brik Tiles.


Rewards


Disclaimer

This product is not officially licensed by LEGO™, Mega Bloks™, or KRE-O™. It just happens to be compatible with all of them. Brik™ is a registered trademark.

"We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing."

- George Bernard Shaw


Risks and challenges

We promise to do our absolute best to deliver Brik Tile on time and on spec. Fortunately, we've done this before. :) Our experience creating Brik Book means that we know how to bring a crowdfunded project to market.

Although we've already accounted for problems that might arise related to durability and hanging power, we also know that it may not always be smooth sailing. We won’t leave you "hanging". We want to you be included in our process at every turn, as we continue to develop and deliver Brik Tile to you.

Our team is excited to change the way we play. We promise to make Brik Tile a reality no matter the obstacles that may arise.

If you have any questions you can always reach us at support@joltteam.com

story:
A Bit of Background

The Tahawus Center occupies a prominent 100-year old building on Main St, in Au Sable Forks, NY, in the Adirondack Mountains.  It was one of the few that survived the town-wide fire of 1925. The building was in sadly neglected and boarded up condition when dance artists Craig Brashear and Rebecca Kelly took over the building through Appleby Foundation in 2010   But changes soon became evident, starting with the ground floor, and by 2011, Main Street saw a newly restored, classic glass window storefront which housed the first Windows Gallery.  Today the ground floor provides intriguing and changing displays by the new store Tea Time Antiques with its eclectic and upmarket products.  In 2013 major improvements to the 2nd floor permitted the Windows Gallery upstairs and enjoy its set of fine new windows overlooking the Ausable River, and a renovated kitchenette and bathroom.  This is where the art world and village community engage with innovative projects featuring the best talent and culture of the region – and beyond. (See images at bottom of page).

Au Sable Forks is a tough little Adirondack town surviving mill closings decades ago, and the more recent hurricane and floods.  At its peak in the 20th Century, it was a thriving hub of the region.  Today the Tahawus Center demonstrates that a cultural center can respond in a healthy way to a community that is stressed.  While the building still is in need of substantial improvements to its infrastructure (electricity, insulation), each year produces more nooks and crannies of restored space to serve the community with exhibits, science labs for youth, education workshops, swing dance for adults, ballet barre, and creative movement for children.  Since 2011, the TLC Windows Gallery is been bursting with exhibits including Mohawk art, works by Rockwell Kent and Arto Monaco, dance photography by Todd Bissonette, a portrait of the Forks in photographs by Mark Hobson, the 60-year retrospective by Adirondack photographer Jeri Wright, (see sample below) the "Hardscrabble /Tough exhibit contrasting Detroit and the Forks, and the heart-warming holiday exhibit of G-Scale Model Trains.  

What We Need & What You Get

WHEN YOU SUPPORT TLC you can choose among amazing rewards. Some are rare and incredible deals!  Just imagine - creating your own swing dance (lesson) and party in the dance studio on a summer evening, OR experiencing delectable dining in a unique setting - an intimate, candlelit dinner in the TLC Art Gallery, created and served by Chef Rob for your guests; OR a Fly-fishing alert - an experienced Adirondack guide will take you to one of his secret places in search of native Brook Trout.

The Impact

Your support cycles back into the local economy in the art exhibits, the community gatherings, youth workshops, and cultural and education programming.  TLC spurs economic development on Main Street by changing what was an eyesore into an attractive creative example of downtown revitalization. The Tahawus Center has a direct interest in improving the health, economic viability, and adding cultural vitality to the region, and in so doing, bringing renewed activity to the historic Main Street of Au Sable Forks.

Watch a 3-minute Slide Show of 2013 Events

Future Plans

The Renovation To Do List is long, and we’ll continue to tackle it project by project (as funding permits). Future projects include replacing the final five windows in the stairwell with custom and historic curved windows - $4,000.  Then we can go on to really transform the Cloudsplitter Studio (for dance and wellness activities).  We'll add a specialized floor covering and mirrors - $5,000; along with a bathroom, changing and storage rooms - $6,000.  More complex projects include the additions of heating and electrical upgrades which will really transform the 2nd and 3rd floors from seasonal - to year-round use - $50,000!  This is a community effort with many partners, and help is needed in many ways. We hope you'll participate and tell your friends. Use the "share tools" to link to this effort via Facebook, Twitter etc.

economy in the art exhibits, the community gatherings, youth workshops, and
cultural and education programming.  TLC spurs economic development on
Main Street by changing what was an eyesore into an attractive creative example of downtown
revitalization. The Tahawus Center has a direct interest in improving the health, economic viability, and adding cultural vitality to the region, and in so doing, bringing renewed activity to the historic Main Street of Au Sable Forks. 
Watch a 3-minute Slide Show of 2013 Events
Future Plans
The Renovation To Do List is long, and we’ll continue to tackle
it project by project (as funding permits). Future projects include replacing the final five windows in the stairwell with custom and historic curved windows - $4,000.  Then we can go on to really transform the Cloudsplitter
Studio (for dance and wellness activities).  We'll add a specialized floor covering and mirrors - $5,000; along with a
bathroom, changing and storage rooms -
$6,000.  More complex projects include
the additions of heating and electrical upgrades which will really transform the 2nd
and 3rd floors from seasonal - to year-round use - $50,000!  This is a community effort with many partners, and help is needed in many ways. We hope you'll participate and tell your friends. Use the "share tools" to link to this effort via Facebook, Twitter etc.

story:
Wakeable is your alarm’s only off button. Take back control of your morning from the dreaded snooze.


You always have good intentions. Wake up early, take a hot shower. Have time for an egg sandwich or a smoothie. But your bed is so cozy...and all of a sudden, you’ve hit snooze once (or twice). You’re rushing, and now you've missed the most important meal of the day. 

Don’t feel bad, we’ve all been there. 


Wakeable is a remote off-switch to your alarm, wirelessly connected via Bluetooth to your smartphone.   




We will send you updates throughout the process, such as sharing prototype demonstrations. Read below to learn more about the technical steps that go into making the Wakeable a reality:

1) Develop electrical hardware system and device software. The Wakeable device design is comprised of an Arduino micro-controller (a common maker platform) and Bluetooth shield.

2) Develop applications for both Android and iOS smartphones. Our mobile app will be your alarm clock; managing alarm time, sound, and connection to the device.

3) Design physical housing for the Wakeable. Besides looking good, this case will incorporate all electrical components (Arduino, Bluetooth, battery, button, on/off switch).

All funds raised will go directly and solely toward the delivery of our perks. We have calculated small margins to cover Indiegogo expenses, unexpected expenses, and overhead. We hope to get this product into the hands of our supports ASAP, and to gather feedback. This project is meant to offer us the opportunity to build on our current skill set and create a small run of devices we think could improve mornings everywhere.


We want to use this campaign to create and share a limited, first release of Wakeable. By backing us, you will be starting the journey of finding a better morning with us!

We have assembled our crack team from across the country, having first met through Venture for America, a fellowship program for young aspiring entrepreneurs. Check out our mug shots and learn a bit about who we are!


[Video Music: "Water in the Creek (Instrumental Version)" by Josh Woodward (http://www.joshwoodward.com/) ]

story:
The Couch Ramp for Dogs!

For Your Dog's Safety, and to Match Your Furniture!

UPDATE: our new couch ramps have all shipped and have been exceptionally well received by customers (yay!) And now, sales continue on our own website, so visit DoggoRamps.com to get YOUR couch ramp for YOUR dog! 

Following the successful launch of our revolutionary bed ramp which is now in the homes of over 5000 people, we are excited to present our re-imagined, re-invented, and if we do say so, incredible couch ramp!

We've combined ergonomic design, strength, functionality, and beautiful aesthetics. Because the best-functioning dog ramp shouldn't have to be an eyesore.. 

TO PROTECT YOUR PET

Jumping on and off furniture can be dangerous. As the owner of a dachshund who underwent spinal surgery for a blown disc, I know this all too well. All it takes a misstep, rough play, a fall, or a harsh landing to cause long-lasting and expensive injuries to our pets. Why take the chance when something as simple as a ramp can greatly alleviate the likelihood of bad things happening?

But in creating a safer environment for your pets, you also shouldn't have to sacrifice the aesthetics of your living room, either! 

Even for the bigger dogs, who are shorter, elderly, disabled, or could just use an extra step up, a couch ramp can be beneficial for all types of dogs.

 

THE SPECS:

  • Adjustable height from 14" to 21", with 4 slot adjustments.
  • Completely collapsible to less than 3" tall when folded flat.
  • Featuring our unique PAWGRIP anti-slip surface for unprecedented traction.
  • Holds over 150lbs.
  • Comes in 5 beautiful colors.
  • Made of furniture-grade hardwood.
  • 100% made in North America.

 

DIMENSIONS & HEIGHTS:

COLORS:

 

WHAT KINDS OF DOGS IS THIS GOOD FOR?

As our video and description stated, this ramp CAN work well for virtually any type of dog where they could benefit from a ramp. It is designed more-so for smaller dogs, since they are the main users of a bed ramp, and are most at risk from injury, including dachshunds, chihuahuas, corgis, pugs, etc. 

Some medium and larger dogs who are shorter, like bulldogs, bassets, may also find it useful since they are, well, short... And for the big dogs, they too could use it in certain scenarios. Admittedly, most big dogs would NOT need a ramp, but as they get older and have arthritis or joint problems, or are disabled, then a ramp can definitely be of help.

 

A REPUTATION TO STAND BEHIND

At DoggoRamps Inc., we have already successfully delivered over 5000 ramps to customers across the world. You can check us out on Facebook or Instagram, or read our customer reviews on our website about our revolutionary bed ramp. 

WHAT PREVIOUS CUSTOMERS HAVE SAID ABOUT OUR PRODUCTS...

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE!

We successfully delivered over 5000 of our bed ramps already, so this is no new task for us. Our couch ramps are already in production, and will be coming fresh out the factory in batches. See below for our estimated arrival times based one hen you order:

  • First 100 ramps ordered - Expected Delivery by mid-December.
  • Following 400 ramps ordered - Expected Delivery early January. 
  • Following 500 ramps ordered - Expected Delivery, mid to late January
  • Further orders - TBD/February

 

THE CREATOR & COMPANY

Having launched two successful campaigns on Indiegogo now, totally over 5000 ramps sold, Ryan is the inventor, creator, and owner of DoggoRamps Inc. The company continues to find new, innovative, and better solutions for making dogs' home environments safer. This all came down to the fact Ryan's dog, Crusoe, has back surgery for a blown disc - which is what inspired him to build the first ever bed ramp many years ago!

story:
A bread, paring and Chef’s knife, designed and crafted to simplify every turn in your kitchen, uncompromisingly durable and exceedingly sharp.

From the home of bladesmithing, Seki, Japan, we’ve married a 400-year tradition of craftsmanship to modern form, function and aesthetic.

  • 2 metal finishes for blade and bolster in Brushed Chrome or Obsidian Black 
  • 2 Hardwood handles, in either ebony or walnut
  • Your initials. 

 

Samurai Steels: Jealously guarded finishes exclusive to Hinoki

For three years now we’ve been making a carbon-steel blade, the S1 Gyuto, a knife that has gained a cult following, finding a home in the kitchens of some of the world’s top chefs.

Forged by the master bladesmiths of Sakai using techniques and traditions passed through generations, the S1 Gyuto is a knife steeped in history, of superlative detail and exceptional sharpness.

Taking what we’ve learnt from the S1 Gyuto we’re creating knives for every kitchen, The Essentials. Unbound by limitation, unmatched in quality.

Sharpness is inherent through our signature convex blade, tensile strength achieved with our hardening process and edge-retention unmatched in our proprietary finished VG-10 steel.   

The City of Blades, Seki, Japan

All Hinoki Essentials are crafted in the home of Japanese sword-smithing, the town of Seki, a place that has been known for centuries as ‘The City of Blades’.

Here our factory sits amongst rice paddies and crystal streams, commanded by President Kawamura, whose family have been members of a legendary craftsmanship guild for over 400 years, a guild that was started by 16th-century Samurai Swordsmith, Naoe Kanetsugu.

A Hinoki knife is not only a world-class kitchen knife but also a piece of proud Japanese tradition. The culmination of hundreds of years of swordsmithing into knives made for your kitchen.   

 

Leave your mark, fully customised to you 

Fully customisable to your preferences, each of our three blades comes in your choice of two proprietary finishes specially rendered for Hinoki - Brushed Chrome or our signature Obsidian Black oxide finish.

Crowned by a bolster in matching finish, your handle in deep ebony or tactile walnut, and your initials discreetly etched to the blade, each knife is truly yours and yours alone.    

 

 

 

A revolutionary convex blade

Through years of exploration and testing, President Kawamura has developed his signature Hamaguri-ba or Convex Blade.

A blade profile of exquisite sharpness and edge retention, made using a trade-secret unique to his process, the hallmark Convex shape allows for the cleanest cut with every stroke, ensuring ingredients aren’t damaged through the cutting process and flavours are locked in.

On the Chef’s Knife this proprietary shape has been applied to not one, but three layers of VG10 steel. Sharpened through a process refined over generations, these are knives of pedigree.   

   

Personally laboured over by President Kawamura, each serration is pitched and troughed to exacting angles forming a truly modern, incomparable bread knife.

Tested through untold loaves of sourdough, it slices through bread without tearing the crust and carves meat and poultry and even the toughest artichoke as if they were butter.  

 

V Gold 10, the Core of Hinoki

Sitting at the pinnacle of chef-grade stainless steels, unsurpassed in rust resistance and peerless in edge retention, VG10 was the only choice for Essential blades.

Distilled from a combination of Carbon, Chromium and several other metals, VG-10 Steel with a Rockwell Hardness rating of 61, it is at once both durable and malleable, truly the gold standard. 

  •  HRC 61: A Rockwell hardness rating of 61 - incredibly durable, exquisitely sharp
  •  Incredibly Rust Resistant: Used in the world’s best kitchens, time and time again
  •  Effortless to resharpen: Superior edge-retention, both malleable and durable
  •  Sub-zero quenched to provide superb edge sharpness and retention 

 

A Hamon, unique to you 

In homage to the Katana from which the essentials owe so much, each blade features a unique pattern or Hamon (刃文, Ha meaning blade and Mon pattern).

Born from our sub-zero quenching and tempering process,  the blade and distinct to Japanese knives, the Hamon on each Hinoki is individual to that knife and that knife alone.    

 

Deep Obsidian Black

To achieve our signature Obsidian Black oxide finish each knife goes through a special chemical conversion oxidation process, smoothing the face of each knife and finishing it in brilliant, lustrous black.

As a result, the blade has better corrosion resistance, reduced friction and a look and feel distinct to the Hinoki Essentials.   

 

Angles Of Utility and Pace

The K-Tip Nose adds manoeuvrability and precision when scoring proteins and vegetables. Used in fast-paced kitchens the world over a K-Tip means you can cut with confidence and pace. 

Perfect Handling,  An Extension Of You

Inspired by Wa handle silhouettes, Essential handles blend modern ergonomics with traditional Japanese wood carving, bringing a lighter weight and a blade-forward balance disposition.

In a choice of either sustainably harvested Ebony or tactile American Walnut farmed from regenerative forests in Missouri, both luxuriously polished and finished.

 

Authenticity is in the Detail

Texture in wood and steel, finish accented through polish, the detailing on each Hinoki Essential is crowned on the collar and blade with the Hinoki 三十 and H discreetly etched,  authenticity is in the detail.    

 

Legacy Knife: The Eternal Guarantee

All Hinoki Knives come with a commitment to a lifetime of service, a commitment that any product we create should outlast its owner.

If you are at all not satisfied with the performance of your Hinoki, if the blade becomes dull or the handle is worn, we’ll make it right. In any circumstance, we commit our knives to a lifetime of performance, like new, forever.

With this sentiment, The Hinoki Eternal Commitment is yours to define, satisfaction with your product being yours and yours alone.

 

What owners are saying about their Hinoki 

 

Anatomy of The Essentials 

The E1 Bread Knife

Making light work of even the toughest materials, think artichokes, meat, poultry, the E1 Bread Knife goes beyond carbohydrates.

It’s unique geometric form and painstakingly tested pitched and troughed serration make for a tool that is stunningly aesthetic and without match in its class.   

The E1 Chef’s Knife

An iconic silhouette based on the Santoku blade profile, more than an all-rounder this is an indispensable partner in the kitchen.

Japanese for three virtues, Santoku, is a reference to the knife’s versatility in cutting fish, meat and vegetable, the first and last knife you will reach for. 

 

The E1 Paring Knife

Utility, detailing. Designed to deftly peel, mince and intricately decorate all matter of fruit, vegetables and aromatics. An all-purpose knife, for work that takes ten minutes or two hours.  

Worthy Companions

Requisite storage in the finest vegetable tanned leather, protect your E1 Bread or Chef’s Knife with the hand-stitched Companion Sheath.

A combination of two-high quality abrasive grits - the grey coarse grit for sharpening, the white for honing and polishing. A matchless way to keep Hinoki Steel prepared, The Companion Whetstone.     

 

Our story and purpose

Hinoki is both a reaction and a catalyst. A response to mass-consumerism and a blueprint for how brands can fully reject the disposable culture that has come to define the 21st century.

Our obsession for fighting mass-consumption takes many forms - our desire to keep dying craftsmanship alive, our inclination to question process across every facet of the product life cycle, our simple need to rationalize your life.

 

Illustrations by Liam Collod @monsierlixm

The Hinoki Team

story:
Each Gold Rush comes with its own unique Gold Nugget prepared and presented exactly as it left the ground, that’s what makes it so special.

 

This is the worlds’ first pen designed around a Gold Nugget. We wanted to celebrate the entrepreneurial spirit of the early pioneers that helped form swathes of the USA in the California Dream. 

We’ve sourced Alaskan gold and left it completely unchanged from the way it comes out of the ground right through to the nugget you see in your pen. Each pen is therefore truly unique and a reminder of the spirit of adventure that built so many great cities across America. 

 

 

By using laser sintered print technology we have been able to bring our supporters another world first - the first Titanium 3D laser sintered pen. Each pen is strictly Limited Edition, houses a maximum size unique Gold Nugget and is hand finished. 

We call the range PLUTUS after the Greek god of wealth. 

The PLUTUS BESPOKE allows you to personalise your pen with up to fifteen characters that mean something special to you or a loved one. A name, a date, an affirmation, you decide. Create a truly unique heirloom product. Our date version shown supports the moon landing, what special event person or place would yours reflect? 

Customization at the point of manufacture is only possible because of the Kickstarter project based process. Our technology, in partnership with Titanium print experts brings you a bespoke pen at a fraction of the Retail cost. Grab one now while its possible, if these pens Retail they will cost thousands.    

 

 

 

Responding to our backers we have introduced Limited Editions. This allows you to secure a first edition of a future classic brand in the making. 

Each Limited Edition has a larger Gold Nugget, mesh size 9 in the MORPHEUS and the maximum possible in the case of the PLUTUS. Each nugget is hand selected before and after encapsulation. 

On the MORPHEUS the Limited Edition detailing is on the top ring while on the Titanium PLUTUS the process allows up to place it elegantly down the face of the pens clip. 

 

 

There are three pens in the Gold Rush range offering between two and  four writing experiences.

Our APOLLO (the Greek God of learning and knowledge) offers a unique gold nugget in each and all four writing nibs. APOLLO is priced so that all backers can experience the INFINITY Gold Rush. Gold is not single sourced and slightly smaller at mesh size 12.     

The MORPHEUS (the Greek God of Dreams) brings a more exclusive format offering larger gold nuggets of mesh size 9 with each nugget used being specially selected. The range supports all four nib types. Each pen is fully hand finished and of Limited Edition.    

The PLUTUS (the Greek God of Wealth) offers an exceptional writing instrument the features of which could only normally be found in bespoke writing experiences costing thousands. Each PLUTUS is hand finished. Only the largest nuggets are used and each must pass multiple quality checks before and after manufacturing. 

A Titanium laser sintered 3D Print technology has been developed to enable bespoke customization at the point of manufacture, this is a world first in pen design and manufacture. 

 

  

 

There are up to four writing experiences to chose from.

The Rollerball offers a super smooth writing experience and fast drying black ink making it the perfect every day carry. It holds the excellent Pentel LR7 EnerGel refill available across the globe.  

The beautiful Fountain Pen includes a fast fill ink converter for bottle filling  or will take standard ink cartridges of any colour if you prefer. 

The Mechanical Pencil comes in a 0.5mm format and will suit designers, architects, engineers or anyone needing more precision. 

The Ballpoint option is supplied with the excellent Schmidt Easyflow 9000 black refill and will take almost any compatible alternative.      

Please note that the PLUTUS in Titanium is only available in the Fountain Pen and Rollerball formats.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our motivation was to create a stunning design piece that delivered ergonomically and visually while being completely practical, a true meeting of form and function.

 

We took our inspiration from the 'California Dream' - original Gold Rush driven by adventure, endeavor and entrepreneurial spirit. This event drove unprecedented growth in cities across the American frontier. Great cities like San Francisco were born.  

We also set a hard target to deliver truly exceptional value. This was achieved by firstly driving out the inefficiencies of modern luxury product distribution. This sector is used to massive marketing spend and long expensive distribution chains that combined drive prices up around 1,000%. 

 

 

Designing products for the luxury market is as much about delivering a fantastic user experience across all aspects that define and constitute the finished product. 

We select our nuggets using painstaking manual processes to make sure each is fit to carry the INFINITY brand.  

 

 

 

Our last Pen - The Pen From Space - was funded inside 12 hours and went on to secure 725 pens across the globe. Backers in the USA and Europe were delivered on schedule.   

The INFINITY Pen From Space went on  to be selected by the WSF (World Science Festival) to be presented to over four hundred of the worlds top scientists and luminaries at their 2017 Gala Event in New York. 

To date we have shipped over 3,200 units of The Pen from Space and experienced less that 0.1% requested returns. Under 0.5% of customers raised any issues at all with almost all relating to variances in the color of the unique pieces of meteorite used. All issues were satisfactory resolved.  

We received amazing testimonials from backers all over the world, here is a short sample of what they had to say.  

 

Is the Gold proceeded after leaving the ground?  No, the nugget comes out of the ground just the way you see it. 

How are the nuggets you used selected?  To achieve perfect nuggets for encapsulation we had to hand pick the nuggets. 

What country does the gold come from? The launch gold comes from Alaska in the USA in the case of MORPHEUS.

What defines the Limited Edition pens? Only the largest and best shaped nuggets are used in manufacturing the Limited Edition units, the largest gold in the PLUTUS.

Why have Limited Edition ranges? We listened to our customers on the Pen From Space range. The most requested feedback was to run the Limited Edition ranges these exceptional products demand. We also wanted to offer exceptional value products, hence the APOLLO range. 

How many units of The Pen From Space did you ship? We shipped over 700 units to over 450 backers. Since then we have shipped another 2,500 units so that's over 3,200 units so far.

What is your Retail price? The APOLLO range will Retails at $125 in line with the existing Pen From Space. The MORPHEUS will be $199 while the PLUTUS may have to be in the $1,200 range.   

Why 3D Laser Sintered Titanium? We listened to our backers and what we heard over and over was the desire for something new to world, something exceptional and unique. Bespoke pens usually start at thousands of dollars so we researched how to offer a truly bespoke option and developed the Laser Sintered Titanium Pen System used on PLUTUS so we could offer customization on each pen. 

What customisation do you offer? Using our laser sintered Titanium manufacturing process we can offer every backer the opportunity to add up to fifteen characters (digits or text) their Titanium pen. Maybe an important date, a child name, your partners name, the choice is yours.

How many returns of the Pen From Space did you have? We have had under 0.5% complaints in total to date with 0.1% of these being return requests. These we almost all about the size or color of the meteorite received, each piece was of course unique. We want to delight our customers so we simply explained this and offered to swap out the pen for one of their choice. This resolved almost all the queries. 

How can you offer a lifetime guarantee? We know our product development inside out and how to deliver on our promises. The core platform is mature now with over 3,200 units shipped and exceptionally low issue levels. We also know our customers and how to delight them. We like to keep business simple so why wouldn't we refund anyone that was not delighted, we want to grow a brand we and our customers can be proud of.
story_txt: Each Gold Rush comes with its own unique Gold Nugget prepared and presented exactly as it left the ground, that’s what makes it so special. This is the worlds’ first pen designed around a Gold Nugget. We wanted to celebrate the entrepreneurial spirit of the early pioneers that helped form swathes of the USA in the California Dream. We’ve sourced Alaskan gold and left it completely unchanged from the way it comes out of the ground right through to the nugget you see in your pen. Each pen is therefore truly unique and a reminder of the spirit of adventure that built so many great cities across America.   By using laser sintered print technology we have been able to bring our supporters another world first - the first Titanium 3D laser sintered pen. Each pen is strictly Limited Edition, houses a maximum size unique Gold Nugget and is hand finished. We call the range PLUTUS after the Greek god of wealth. The PLUTUS BESPOKE allows you to personalise your pen with up to fifteen characters that mean something special to you or a loved one. A name, a date, an affirmation, you decide. Create a truly unique heirloom product. Our date version shown supports the moon landing, what special event person or place would yours reflect? Customization at the point of manufacture is only possible because of the Kickstarter project based process. Our technology, in partnership with Titanium print experts brings you a bespoke pen at a fraction of the Retail cost. Grab one now while its possible, if these pens Retail they will cost thousands.       Responding to our backers we have introduced Limited Editions. This allows you to secure a first edition of a future classic brand in the making. Each Limited Edition has a larger Gold Nugget, mesh size 9 in the MORPHEUS and the maximum possible in the case of the PLUTUS. Each nugget is hand selected before and after encapsulation. On the MORPHEUS the Limited Edition detailing is on the top ring while on the Titanium PLUTUS the process allows up to place it elegantly down the face of the pens clip.   There are three pens in the Gold Rush range offering between two and  four writing experiences.Our APOLLO (the Greek God of learning and knowledge) offers a unique gold nugget in each and all four writing nibs. APOLLO is priced so that all backers can experience the INFINITY Gold Rush. Gold is not single sourced and slightly smaller at mesh size 12.     The MORPHEUS (the Greek God of Dreams) brings a more exclusive format offering larger gold nuggets of mesh size 9 with each nugget used being specially selected. The range supports all four nib types. Each pen is fully hand finished and of Limited Edition.    The PLUTUS (the Greek God of Wealth) offers an exceptional writing instrument the features of which could only normally be found in bespoke writing experiences costing thousands. Each PLUTUS is hand finished. Only the largest nuggets are used and each must pass multiple quality checks before and after manufacturing. A Titanium laser sintered 3D Print technology has been developed to enable bespoke customization at the point of manufacture, this is a world first in pen design and manufacture.     There are up to four writing experiences to chose from.The Rollerball offers a super smooth writing experience and fast drying black ink making it the perfect every day carry. It holds the excellent Pentel LR7 EnerGel refill available across the globe.  The beautiful Fountain Pen includes a fast fill ink converter for bottle filling  or will take standard ink cartridges of any colour if you prefer. The Mechanical Pencil comes in a 0.5mm format and will suit designers, architects, engineers or anyone needing more precision. The Ballpoint option is supplied with the excellent Schmidt Easyflow 9000 black refill and will take almost any compatible alternative.      Please note that the PLUTUS in Titanium is only available in the Fountain Pen and Rollerball formats.          Our motivation was to create a stunning design piece that delivered ergonomically and visually while being completely practical, a true meeting of form and function. We took our inspiration from the 'California Dream' - original Gold Rush driven by adventure, endeavor and entrepreneurial spirit. story:
We created the “Make It Your Banner” to bring to the world a truly unique way to commemorate special events. Every other party banner we came across was just generic and plain. There were options out there to create custom banners but they were expensive and not as fun. So we decided to fix that! We spent hours researching the best material and easiest process to making specialized banners. In that process we managed to teach our son about entrepreneurship and hard work. Still, we can teach him so much more. For us this is more than just a family project. It’s a community project.

Our goal to run this campaign is to raise the funds needed for production and to inspire families around the world to start a little project of their own too!

 

INTRODUCING

Make It Your Banner

25 Pieces Premium 2mm Felt Flags (5.3 inches x 7.5 inches) with 30 feet rope
25 Pieces Burlap Flags (5.3 inches x 7.5 inches) with 30 feet rope
40 Plastic Stencils (10.6 inches x 6 inches)
24 Balloons (12 inches)

 

SUPER USER FRIENDLY

Our stencils are reusable and specifically designed for "Make It Your Banner" flags. They are precisely measured so that when you place them on top of flag; corner to corner, edge to edge, the letter or sign will be in center, and the end result is always perfect.

 

REASON TO CELEBRATE

We understand the desire to create memories and bring your family or friends together with parties. A party banner can do just that! To some; it might just appear to be a simple craft and decoration but it can be used as a family project. With “Make It Your Banner” the memories can begin even before the party starts and they can last for years to come.

 

STENCIL DESIGNS

Our stencil designs include : capital and small alphabets, numeric characters together with seasonal symbols, which makes it suitable for all occasions.

You can use them to deck out your banner or your everyday items. Each stencil provided measures 10.6 inches by 6 inches.

 

SPECIAL EDITION LABEL

An Indiegogo Special Edition product label is designed especially for this campaign to show our appreciation towards Indiegogo for providing such a wonderful platform to the world and to thank our supporters for backing us.  However, we need a minimum of 1,000 sets pre-order to make this happen.

30cm x 22cm x 6cm       1.166-1.366kg

 

HOW WE'LL SPEND THE FUNDS WE RAISE FROM INDIEGOGO

 

PERKS & SHIPPING COSTS

We recommend our backers to pre-order two boxes at least, as the shipping cost will drop dramatically when compared to ordering a single box.

 

Make It Your Banner JOURNEY. . .

 

THANK YOU

Thank you for your interest and for reading this far. We wish that you find our little mission appealing, and if so, we hope that you can support this project as well as letting us share your special moments with you and your loved ones through “Make It Your Banner”.
