story:
Introducing EcoBreeze 2

 The Worlds Smartest Window Fan

What better way to enjoy a morning cup of coffee than in a room filled with fresh cool air.  While you sleep, Ecobreeze 2 is bringing in the perfect amount of outside air so you can wake up and enjoy a cool pollen free morning.  

​The Press

Mrs. Green's World - Gina Murphy-Darling gives this two thumbs up for its energy efficiency. I plan to pledge!

Knoxville Sentinel - New EcoBreeze 2 fan will save money and energy

BestAdvisor.com -  While the usual window fans are designed to simply create the airflow in your room with a propeller, this device is capable of much more. The EcoBreeze 2 window fan is designed to provide the natural cool air inside your room filtering the contaminants with a washable or pollen MERV filter. It also locks the humidity out increasing the time that the room stays cool on a hot humid day. 

How Does It Work

EcoBreeze 2 is lightweight, low-profile and installs in a snap. By monitoring the daily temperature fluctuations outdoors, it draws precisely enough air into the home at exactly the right time and has been proven to reduce home cooling bills by hundreds of $$$.  It’s also the first window fan that filters out pollen and dust providing clean and natural cooling.  

 

Ventilation Cooling - the inside story We’re a small American Company that dreams about changing summer cooling.  How? It’s as easy as making one simple change: use free outside air to cool our homes.  It sounds too obvious to be true, but the United States Department of Energy recommends “ventilation cooling” as the most effective way to cool indoor spaces. It’s a technology that’s already required by two-thirds of all commercial buildings in the country, and some of the largest, most powerful data centers on Earth have been taking advantage of it for years.

It begs the question: “why aren’t homes using this technology too?” We’vebeen working hard at finding an answer to this question and are excited with our new low cost and convenient way to use nature’s air for cooling.  

Nature’s Cooling Solution has invested the last 7 years perfecting its patented SmartFan technology and is proud to introduce EcoBreeze 2. Coming to market in June 2018, it is the world’s smartest window fan! It automatically works in conjunction with air conditioners and maximizes free outside air cooling while minimizing energy consumption.

Home air conditioners are some of the most ecologically harmful household appliances we own. In 2017, American cooling devices released an astounding 222 billion tons of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere. But by simply tapping nature’s existing resources, we can save money and slash our carbon emissions – all without sacrificing one degree of our cool, comfy home temperatures.

Best of all: EcoBreeze 2 will be manufactured in the US, creating jobs building a sustainable product.  

We need your help to build momentum and make this product a success!  That’s why we are offering special pricing on an Indiegogo Campaign.  You can help by joining our campaign and spreading the word.  

George and Jim Wiese – Two brothers working to make a difference

EcoBreeze 2 Energy Reports

How much can you save?

The United State Energy Information Administration’s “Annual Energy Outlook” for 2018 confirms that space cooling is the most costly, electricity-eating aspect of maintaining a home. EcoBreeze 2 rethinks the game by relying on one simple fact: cooling our houses with free outdoor air uses 98% less energy than creating it with an air-conditioner.

EcoBreeze 2 improves on these savings in two revolutionary two ways. First, its hyper-efficient motor and fan draws 75% less energy than traditional window fans; next, by implementing its patented SmartFan technology that maximizes cooling with outside air and minimizes energy use.

What’s so smart about EcoBreeze 2?

We at Nature’s Cooling Solutions are firm believers in brains over brawns. By continuously monitoring indoor and outdoor temperatures, sensing humidity and determining when and how much fresh, free, filtered air to draw into the home at precisely the right time, our EcoBreeze 2 uses about the same energy as an LED light bulb.

The entire cooling process is automated, so operating the fan is as easy as setting a thermostat. Simply set your home thermostat to your normal setting, then set EcoBreeze 2’s thermostat to a lower setting. The larger the difference between the two settings the greater the savings. It’s that simple!

Let’s Crunch the Numbers!

While potential savings are affected by climate zone, local power rates, and desired temperature, the MINIMUM estimated cooling-related energy savings is 30% with the majority of the United States estimated to save well over 70%. The table shows the potential savings for EcoBreeze 2 over different regions.            

 

 

                                       EcoBreeze 2 Quickly Pays for Itself!

EcoBreeze 2 provides such significant energy savings that many units will quickly pay for themselves. Units installed in hot cities like Los Angeles will return their full costs in less than a year. Even colder cities like New York, where air conditioners are used only intermittently, require little over a year to fully return their investments.

       Cooling savings and Payback

 

Additional AC Savings - Less Repairs and Longer Life There are many fringe benefits to owning an EcoBreeze 2, including the fact that it will significantly extend the lifespan of your existing air conditioner. Central air conditioners can cost thousands to replace and hundreds to maintain each year. By reducing how often and how long your existing air conditioner’s compressor runs, it will see an increased lifespan and will last much longer between service calls.

Additional Savings – Avoid cooling unoccupied rooms  Most single-family homes in the United States have central HVAC systems that condition all rooms at one time. However, many of these rooms are rarely used or go unoccupied for several days at a time. EcoBreeze provides individual room cooling and reduces the cost of cooling unoccupied rooms.  EcoBreeze 2 also allows you to focus your cooling efforts on the spaces that you use the most, so the coolest, most comfortable rooms will be the ones you spend the most time in.

Carbon & Noise Reduction

Less energy means less waste. Since the EcoBreeze 2 can potentially reduce your home cooling energy usage by an outstanding 90%, your carbon footprint will reduce linearly. And if your air conditioner is running less frequently, the noisy, industrial fans attached to them will no longer be a bother to you and your neighbors.

Incredible Filtration!

EcoBreeze 2 delivers free, cool, filtered air directly into your home to flush out stale air. But not all filters are created equally. Our optional MERV-13 filter is so fine, so highly engineer that it even traps viruses and bacteria. Smog, smoke and dust will be eliminated from you living space, allowing you to relax in the freshest, coolest, healthiest air your home has ever known.  Our standard MERV 8 filter does a great job at removing pollen, dust mites and mold spore providing clean fresh cooling.

 

How does EcoBreeze 2 sync with AC

The answer lies in our comfort zone.   When we get too hot our bodies start to perspire so we turn on our air conditioner temperature to avoid this zone.  When we get too cold we reach for sweaters or blankets.  The difference between these temperatures is known as our comfort zone.   


When EcoBreeze 2 and air conditioning are used together they have different functions.  The AC’s job is to avoid entering the TOO WARM zone.  The job of EcoBreeze 2 is to maximize the use of outside air to lower the room temperature to just above the TOO COLD zone.   In practice it’s really simple.  Set the ac temperature toward the high end of your comfort level.  Set the EcoBreeze 2 temperature at the low end of the comfort level.   When there is cool air outside the EcoBreeze 2 SmartFan technology will automatically take over to efficiently lower the room temperature.  When the outdoor air is too hot or humid the ac will kick on to avoid the TOO WARM zone.  

WARNING!  This could create a new thermostat war!   Increasing the difference between the two set points will increase savings.  Everyone will have to agree on the comfort zone or you can just do a stealth adjustment to have it your way! 

Technical Specs:

  • Room Size – Up to 400 square feet
  • Fan Height – 7 inches saves your view
  • Fan Width – 15.5 inches (for installation in 20 - 36 inch windows)
  • Window Types - Double hung or sliders with screens removed
  • Filter - Washable MERV 8 eliminates pollen & dust or MERV 13 removes bacteria
  • Average Energy Used – 17 watts
  • Low Speed Energy – 7 watts
  • Air Directional Louvers – Horizontal & vertical like your car
  • Insulated Side Panels - Meets Energy Star installation requirements for room air conditioners
  • Auto Mode - Adjustable Max Speed/ speed changes on calculated conditions
  • Manual Mode – Choose between 5 speeds
  • Customization – Dimmable control panel, fahrenheit or centigrade, max fan speed for auto operation
  • Seal When Not Running - Spring Return Butterfly Dampers seal out hot air
  • Humidity Limit – Yes, on or off
  • Exhaust – Barometric relief exhaust
  • Motor – High efficiency, variable speed BPM motor
  • Fan Type - High efficiency metal Centrifugal Fan
  • Made in the USA

 

Customer Feedback

“Sure you could do this yourself without this fan. Just stand around measure and wait for the moment outside air be cooler and less humid than indoors and open the window, install a fan turn it on then wait just in case it warms back up so you can close it all up... The EcoBreeze does it all for you the instant it should nothing more nothing less.” Aaron. EcoBreeze owner. 

“We couldn't be happier with our Eco Breeze purchase. Now that the Arizona summer is fading, we use our Eco Breeze daily. We spend the majority of our time in our family room. Instead of running the A/C which is trying to cool the entire house, we run the Eco Breeze and only expend energy in the room we spend our time. We've seen a huge reduction in our electric bills”. Shaunna. Eco Breeze owner.  

“I own two units and plan on slowly getting three more for our bedrooms. We live in St. Louis MO, where it's very hot and humid during the summer and they do kick on at night even in those conditions. It's like the sound of money I'm saving when they turn on! They are ideal for warm spring and fall days in our area, but they absolutely help in the summer as well”. M. Eco Breeze owner.

The table shows the potential savings for EcoBreeze 2 over different regions.            
 
 
                                       EcoBreeze 2 Quickly Pays for Itself!
EcoBreeze 2 provides such significant energy savings that many units will quickly pay for themselves. Units installed in hot cities like Los Angeles will return their full costs in less than a year. Even colder cities like New York, where air conditioners are used only intermittently, require little over a year to fully return their investments.
       Cooling savings and Payback 

 
Additional AC Savings - Less Repairs and Longer Life There are many fringe benefits to owning an EcoBreeze 2, including the fact that it will significantly extend the lifespan of your existing air conditioner. Central air conditioners can cost thousands to replace and hundreds to maintain each year. By reducing how often and how long your existing air conditioner’s compressor runs, it will see an increased lifespan and will last much longer between service calls.
Additional Savings – Avoid cooling unoccupied rooms  Most single-family homes in the United States have central HVAC systems that condition all rooms at one time. However, many of these rooms are rarely used or go unoccupied for several days at a time. EcoBreeze provides individual room cooling and reduces the cost of cooling unoccupied rooms.  EcoBreeze 2 also allows you to focus your cooling efforts on the spaces that you use the most, so the coolest, most comfortable rooms will be the ones you spend the most time in.
Carbon & Noise Reduction
Less energy means less waste. Since the EcoBreeze 2 can potentially reduce your home cooling energy usage by an outstanding 90%, your carbon footprint will reduce linearly. And if your air conditioner is running less frequently, the noisy, industrial fans attached to them will no longer be a bother to you and your neighbors.
Incredible Filtration!

EcoBreeze 2 delivers free, cool, filtered air directly into your home to flush out stale air. But not all filters are created equally. Our optional MERV-13 filter is so fine, so highly engineer that it even traps viruses and bacteria. Smog, smoke and dust will be eliminated from you living space, allowing you to relax in the freshest, coolest, healthiest air your home has ever known.  Our standard MERV 8 filter does a great job at removing pollen, dust mites and mold spore providing clean fresh cooling.
 
How does EcoBreeze 2 sync with AC
The answer lies in our comfort zone.   When we get too hot our bodies start to perspire so we turn on our air conditioner temperature to avoid this zone.  When we get too cold we reach for sweaters or blankets.  The difference between these temperatures is known as our comfort zone.   
When EcoBreeze 2 and air conditioning are used together they have different functions.  The AC’s job is to avoid entering the TOO WARM zone.  The job of EcoBreeze 2 is to maximize the use of outside air to lower the room temperature to just above the TOO COLD zone.   In practice it’s really simple.  Set the ac temperature toward the high end of your comfort level.  Set the EcoBreeze 2 temperature at the low end of the comfort level.   When there is cool air outside the EcoBreeze 2 SmartFan technology will automatically take over to efficiently lower the room temperature.  When the outdoor air is too hot or humid the ac will kick on to avoid the TOO WARM zone.  
WARNING!  This could create a new thermostat war!   Increasing the difference between the two set points will increase savings.  Everyone will have to agree on the comfort zone or you can just do a stealth adjustment to have it your way! 

Technical Specs:


Room Size – Up to 400 square feet

Fan Height – 7 inches saves your view

Fan Width – 15.5 inches (for installation in 20 - 36 inch windows)

Window Types - Double hung or sliders with screens removed

Filter - Washable MERV 8 eliminates pollen & dust or MERV 13 removes bacteria

Average Energy Used – 17 watts

Low Speed Energy – 7 watts

Air Directional Louvers – Horizontal & vertical like your car

Insulated Side Panels - Meets Energy Star installation requirements for room air conditioners

Auto Mode - Adjustable Max Speed/ speed changes on calculated conditions

Manual Mode – Choose between 5 speeds

Customization – Dimmable control panel, fahrenheit or centigrade, max fan speed for auto operation

Seal When Not Running - Spring Return Butterfly Dampers seal out hot air

Humidity Limit – Yes, on or off

Exhaust – Barometric relief exhaust

Motor – High efficiency, variable speed BPM motor

Fan Type - High efficiency metal Centrifugal Fan
Made in the USA

 
Customer Feedback
“Sure you could do this yourself without this fan. Just stand around measure and wait for the moment outside air be cooler and less humid than indoors and open the window, install a fan turn it on then wait just in case it warms back up so you can close it all up... The EcoBreeze does it all for you the instant it should nothing more nothing less.” Aaron. EcoBreeze owner. 
“We couldn't be happier with our Eco Breeze purchase. Now that the Arizona summer is fading, we use our Eco Breeze daily. We spend the majority of our time in our family room. Instead of running the A/C which is trying to cool the entire house, we run the Eco Breeze and only expend energy in the room we spend our time. We've seen a huge reduction in our electric bills”. Shaunna. Eco Breeze owner.  
“I own two units and plan on slowly getting three more for our bedrooms. We live in St. Louis MO, where it's very hot and humid during the summer and they do kick on at night even in those conditions. It's like the sound of money I'm saving when they turn on! They are ideal for warm spring and fall days in our area, but they absolutely help in the summer as well”. M. Eco Breeze owner.

story:
Just image such a similar situation, when you prepare for a outdoors activity or wanna store foods when you travel, or your snacks haven’t finished......it’s very troublesome to pick up these. “I don’t want to waste any food”, “I want to keep the food fresh”,”I don’t want to make a mess”.

Unfortunately......

“My vacuum sealer is too broad to bring......”

“My vacuum sealing machine is big and plug in every time to use it. It's very inconvenient......”

“I also have a similar product but it needs battery and often runs out of power......”

“When I open the snacks bags, I spill the snacks all over the floor”

Wanna.....

An incredible guy appears......What’s this?

“A handle-designed sealer?” 

“Yes you are right. And it will become your aid in kitchen or outdoors.” 

 

 

Y-DOT USB heat sealer, it is designing for sealing products to prolonging its freshness. There is a in-built high-tech circuit board to generate heat for sealing, it also have a cutter for opening the package. You can easily reseal opened bags. There are 3 gears power for sealing different kinds of bags. Also the battery can last for long time, just need to fully charge one time and you can use for 6 months.

 

 

There are 3 gears for sealing. You can apply for bags which are between 0.03 and 0.13 thickness. You can use it to seal Mylar bags, potato chip bags, even some thick bags. Easy to reseal any kind of bag. Chips, rice, nuts or crackers to keep fresh! Just try one for your kitchen or travel.

 

 

Generating powder by battery, circuit board controls current; Press the button for electrifying, making the heating cord generate heat, it generates hot fusion on plastic bags and sealed.

 

 

Y-DOT heat sealer has been built in a high-tech circuit board for adjusting temperature, and has 3 modes to choose( mode for pro thick bags, mode for common bags and mode for super thin bags ) . It can meet our daily use, not only for sealing super thick bags, but also for super thin bags easily. Patent triple anti-scald, double high-tech protection.

 

 

 

Y-DOT unique professional double-wire heating technology, which was made by 28 procedure. With it’s ± 0.01 high-precision, it achieves generating heating uniformly, and sealing the bags instantaneously.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Y-DOT has the quick sealing patented technology,  and it seals bags with a spacing of 3.5mm.

 

 

The bag sealer adopts high capacity rechargeable lithium batteries, which can be used for about half year after fully charged. Explanation: This bag heat sealer can be used for about 5-6 months if using the mode for common bags and sealing a PE bag every day which is 18cm x 0.14mm(L*H),when you are skilled.

 

 

The bag sealer has built-in rechargeable batteries to power on, no power outlet needed, which is easy to carry; Back of bag heat sealer installs a magnet tile that you can stick on the fridge;The tailed leather label can be hung in a convenient place.

 

Hung in a convenient place.

 

Convenient for sealing plastic bags​.

 

It’s great to keep one in your kitchen, sealing bags for flavoring.

 

Phone Mount

 

Seal the bags and save the foods or snacks and keep fresh.

 

Easy to carry.

 

 

What amazing is that there is a in-built cutter, rotate the switch “+” to “-” and it will change to cut. And press down you finish opening the package.

story:
Join Us On

   

FAQ

 

• What is Fynoti:

It is the most cost-effective home, personal and neighborhood security solution on the market. The device itself is is a so called IoT device (Internet-of-Things) which connects with your wifi and is controlled via free mobile application.

• How does it work:

If the device is turned on and detects a movement in your home it will blast the siren and send a notification to the owner on his smartphone. The owner can easily connect his neighbors, friends and family to his device so they will also be notified if the alarm goes on.

• How do I turn it on/off:

You control it via the app.

• Does it work with all smartphones:

Currently it works with iOS and Android.

• How many neighbors can I connect to my device:

There is no limit on how many friends, family members and neighbors you can add.

• Why should I add my neighbors:  

Because your neighbors can react much quicker than anybody else. We don’t encourage people to confront an intruder themselves but merely to contact the authorities if he witnesses a break-in. If the intruder is not cached at the scene of the crime, your neighbor could help to provide valuable informations to the authorities.

• Can I recharge the batteries:

To cut down the production cost we decided not to have Fynoti with re-chargeable batteries. Meaning the end-user can get it for a better price.

• What type of batteries does it use:

Fynoti uses 3 x C batteries, which can be bought in most, if not all supermarket. We will also offer our backers to buy Fynoti with batteries included. The batteries will last up to a year.

• Is there a camera in Fynoti:

No, in this first version of Fynoti there will be no camera. We wanted to build a basic security solution that everybody, or at least most people, could afford and could use to add extra security in their lives. Adding camera would increase the production cost thus the price to the end-users.

• Will my pet trigger the alarm:

It depends on two factors; The size of your pet and where you place your Fynoti. You can manually adjust the signal strength on the device so if you have pets we recommend that you place your Fynoti somewhere they are least present and adjust the signal strength until it doesn’t get triggered.  

• How many Fynoti’s can I have:

We can’t say unlimited as we haven’t tested it :)..But you can have as many as you need. Unless you live in a palace you will hardly ever need more than 5-6 pcs.

• Can I stick Fynoti on the wall or seiling:

No you cannot. It needs to sit on a flat surface.

• Can everybody in my home have access to Fynoti:

Yes you can give them access via the app, they will need to have the Fynoti app installed on their smartphone.

• How much area does one Fynoti cover:

Detection range up to 12 meters (39 ft.) and 130° detection capability. With adjustable settings.

• My neighbors don’t have Fynoti, can I still use it:

Yes you can. It will work as most other home alarm system, if it’s triggered the siren will go on and you will get notified on your smartphone.

• How many covers will there be to choose from:

30+ different styles and colors. You will choose the cover in a survey after the campaign ends.

• What the heck is F.E.R.N:

It stands for Fynoti’s Emergency Response Network. It’s basically the community of Fynoti users.

• How does Shout! work:

When you click on Shout! the first time, you will be asked to add your address. After that you can choose from what area you would like to receive Shouts from. You can choose for example a radius of 100 meters. If somebody sends a Shout within that 100 m radius you will automatically get that Shout. Shouts made outside that radius you will not receive.

• Can I use Shout! outside my neighborhood:

Absolutely! You can send Shouts from anywhere. If you live in Berlin and are located in Paris you can still send Shouts. Your Shout gets sent out to people that has chosen to receive Shouts in the area you are currently located in. So even if you are not in your neighborhood you can still help other people keep their neighborhood safe.

• How does Panic! Work:

The first time you visit Panic! in the app you will be asked to insert your name and profile picture. You can add some additional information if you like, that could for example be information about allergy, medications that you need and where you store them, anything that could help people react quicker in case of emergency. If you press the Panic button a message will be sent out to Fynoti users closest to your location as well as all people that are on your friends list. That message includes all the information you added when creating your Panic profile, along with your current location.

• Why do I need to have a profile picture in my Panic profile:

The reason for having a profile picture is for people to recognise you. People that will come to the rescue might not know you and therefore they will need to know how the person they will be looking for looks like.

• Can I use Panic! everywhere:

Yes you can.

• Is Fynoti waterproof? 

Do you live in Atlantis? No? Then why the heck you want it to be waterproof?

story:
Short Summary

Help me stay in my apartment for a few more months!

What happened

Me and my mom will be thrown on the street if we can't pay our rent that just doubled.We need to pay or move in a few weeks but we don't have the finances to do so.
My mom had one of her legs amputated so this is all I can do because no one trust a 17 year old student.

Other Ways You Can Help

If can’t contribute,ask some friends to help if they can.I am grateful for any support you give me and my mom!

story:
Dustpans are dirty, ineffective and frustrating. Everybody has one and NOBODY likes it! To us, they are the enemy. That’s why we invented VaBroom!

No more annoying dustpan lines or bending over. With VaBroom, just sweep into a pile or line. Then tilt to the side, and the the pressure activated switch on the nozzle turns on the vacuum power! That's right, just suck up dirt and debris and then drop it in the trash.

It's that easy! Just Sweep, Suck and SEE YA! 

VaBroom is lightweight, but POWERFUL!  So we ask ourselves, will it suck?  

 

 Step 1.  Sweep 

Step 2.  Suck 

Overview:

Capacity

VaBroom can hold approximately 1 cup of debris at a time. That's about 2,367 Rice Krispies®! 

Power Source

VaBroom is powered by four (4)-AA batteries. On average, get over 500 uses per charge!

Motor and Impeller

VaBroom boasts a 14,000 RPM motor with specially designed impeller to create powerful suction while remaining lightweight.

Our Design Challenge: 

Create a lightweight cleaning tool with built-in powerful suction, that effectively eliminates the need for a dustpan. 

 Product Testing:  

The nozzle design evolved from sequential testing to maximize suction and ease of use.  Additionally, we tested numerous combinations of motors, impellers and power sources to dial-in the best solution while keeping VaBroom lightweight.

 Refinement:  

Once the proper function was achieved by our engineers, our industrial design team then completed an iterative approach at refining VaBroom.  Customer surveys were completed with hundreds of participants and improvements were developed based on direct feedback from the user.

Form and Function:

The last step was to make VaBroom beautiful.  Now that function had been maximized, we wanted to give VaBroom a modern, sleek look -- again, based on feedback from hundreds of users, we arrived at our current colorways, textures and finish.  

Welcome to Enhance Product Development, the creators of VaBroom. Here is where we work each day, coming up with unique solutions to some challenging problems. You might be asking, who is Enhance? Well, within our team you'll meet dog lovers, little league coaches, wedding DJs, beer connoisseurs and karaoke rock stars.  

Though we come from varied backgrounds, one passion we all share is a love for innovation. At the heart of that passion is a drive to develop meaningful solutions that resonate with our customers. We are curious, inquisitive, analytical, quirky, and sometimes a little edgy. We enjoy the open collaboration with our clients and tend to push the boundaries of conventional thinking. Our focus is to offer cost effective solutions with intrinsic value that create results.

Lastly, it is our enthusiasm that truly sets us apart. We actually love what we do and look forward to putting that enthusiasm to work for you, our backers!  

So from all of us, we thank you for considering backing our project and we will be providing you with updates on our progress in the weeks and months ahead!

We need you! And no, we're not just saying it. We really need your help. Without your support we can’t start the production of VaBroom and tie up the last loose ends in development. We have been working hard to create the best product possible and we want to release it to the world ASAP! We have finalized the prototype and now we need your help to get the production volumes up to get the prices down. It’s that simple!

story:
Verdeat has been created by individuals with a common goal; to contribute to better future for our planet and our well-being by taking small steps.   Cliché as it may sound, today's world needs those small steps more than ever.

 

What is it?

Verdeat is an indoor garden system that uses soilless, organic plant cultivation. It smartly irrigates and provides nutrition to vegetables and herbs. Verdeat is an app-controlled system which is self-sustainable for 1-3 weeks. The amount of water, energy and nutrients used is adjusted precisely to the needs of the plants, without an unnecessary waste.

The system consists of modular trays with slots to plant the seeds along with a soil-free natural substrate (e.g. coconut fibre). Its unique universality and modularity also allow the growth of regular soil-based pot plants and microgreens. 

 

Verdeat is manufactured in EU with 95% recycled materials. 

With each purchase we will plant a tree and  give you 3 tree seeds to cultivate in Verdeat and then plant in your neighborhood as a way of giving back to nature.  Each unit (size L) is made from plastic waste weighing 10kg / 22lbs. 

 

 

 

Team

We’re the team that created DitoGear. For a decade we’ve been building professional devices for the filmmaking industry: from sliders to stop motion filming gear. Our solutions are used by big studios, music video creators and animation industry.

Working on film sets requires absolute precision and perfection - exactly like designing hi-tech devices. Even though gardening and filmmaking may sound like seemingly unrelated disciplines, the experience, gained thanks to DitoGear, and our passion for healthy lifestyle gave birth to Verdeat.

Ditogear went from a Startup to a globally recognized brand in less than 2 years. I am passionate about inventing and introducing products with a deeper meaning where the bottom line covers not only digits, but also the future of wellbeing locally and globally. 

Our mission

At Veardeat, we believe that what you save, saves you back. By going green and making making environmentally friendly choices, we have the power to influence. We do not wish to take a radical stance or to moralise. What we do want is to enable a  positive individual action to take care of your own  well-being  and  that of our planet.

To us at Verdeat, human well-being means healthy nutritious food that is produced with minimal harm to the environment. In large scale cultivation, the planet is exploited to maximise production through water overuse, pesticide use and plastic packaging. Producing too much food, in turn, results in food waste, soil infertility and deforestation. 

In developing Verdeat we wanted to to make a small contribution to reverse negative trends. With Verdeat, each of us can make a positive impact by growing our own food in order to stay healthy and less affected by climate change.
story_txt: Verdeat has been created by individuals with a common goal; to contribute to better future for our planet and our well-being by taking small steps.   Cliché as it may sound, today's world needs those small steps more than ever. What is it?Verdeat is an indoor garden system that uses soilless, organic plant cultivation. It smartly irrigates and provides nutrition to vegetables and herbs. Verdeat is an app-controlled system which is self-sustainable for 1-3 weeks. The amount of water, energy and nutrients used is adjusted precisely to the needs of the plants, without an unnecessary waste.The system consists of modular trays with slots to plant the seeds along with a soil-free natural substrate (e.g. coconut fibre). Its unique universality and modularity also allow the growth of regular soil-based pot plants and microgreens.  Verdeat is manufactured in EU with 95% recycled materials. With each purchase we will plant a tree and  give you 3 tree seeds to cultivate in Verdeat and then plant in your neighborhood as a way of giving back to nature.  Each unit (size L) is made from plastic waste weighing 10kg / 22lbs.    TeamWe’re the team that created DitoGear. For a decade we’ve been building professional devices for the filmmaking industry: from sliders to stop motion filming gear. Our solutions are used by big studios, music video creators and animation industry.Working on film sets requires absolute precision and perfection - exactly like designing hi-tech devices. story:
Short Summary

We've been concerned about security in apartments and homes with patio doors and sliding windows. We designed a device that can be retrofit to ANY sliding patio door or window (vertical OR horizontal) to allow the door or window to be SECURELY locked in ANY open position, from LESS THAN ONE INCH to wide open, anywhere in between.  Our PATENT PENDING lock also adds extra security when the door or window is completely closed.

One thing to keep in mind is that while burglaries take place throughout the year, according to security officials, most areas in the country see a significant spike in crime from November through January during the holiday season. And since most thieves want to be in and out of your home in six minutes or less, anything you can do to slow them down, or deter them entirely, will work in your favor. 23% of home burglaries take place through first floor windows and patio doors.

In most cases, burglars who cannot gain access to a home in under two minutes will just give up and move onto the next vulnerable target. 


What We Need & What You Get

We require $25,000.00 to complete our migration from limited, to full production, with commercial packaging, to help bring our product to local retailers. Our goal is to move from small machine shop production, to a more commercial mould and die produced unit.  Even if we don't reach our funding goal to advance our production model, we will be able to deliver your lock based on current production.

The Impact

Why shouldn't you feel safe in your own home and have your patio doors and windows open a little.....EVERYONE can feel secure with having their windows or patio doors open a few inches. In apartments and homes, these units can easily be installed at ANY height on patio doors, up high or down low! This is also a safety device, particularly in apartments. Every year we hear of children falling out of apartment windows. With our security device in place, your home will be safer for you AND your children!

Other Ways You Can Help

Pre-orders will be accepted, the final product will cost $69.00 for the smaller  window sizes and $89.00 for full size patio doors. What is YOUR security and peace of mind worth to you and your family?

story:
LUMOS CANDLE is a magical candle that lights a fire at the push of a button. 
No more stress, enjoy candles more safely and conveniently. 

 

 

LUMOS CANDLE made of soy wax and wooden wicks. Experience the incredible auto-ignition of the world's first "real candle"! 

 

 

Existing candles cannot be used without a lighter. People often experience the danger and discomfort of using a hand tool while using a lighter or a match. On the other hand, LUMOS CANDLE is lit as soon as the button is pressed.

 

 

When you use a candle for a long time, the wick gets deeper. When this happens, it is difficult to use an ignition tool to light the candle. But LUMOS CANDLE can be lit easily by pressing the button. 

 

 

1. Easy and safe use

LUMOS CANDLE can be easily and conveniently enjoyed by those who feel uncomfortable and difficult to use a lighter because it is lit by pressing the button on the pad without using an ignition tool.

2. No paraffin

LUMOS CANDLE is a handmade soy candle without using paraffin. All products are made of high quality soy wax made in USA and selected premium fragrance oil.

3. Easy usb charging

When the lighter gas is gone, you have to go to the market and buy a new one. But LUMOS CANDLE have a built-in rechargeable battery that can be easily charged by a five-pin USB charger. Once fully charged, it can be used for more than four months if you use about 4 times a day. It is also useful for outdoor use due to its long usage time.

4. The easy changing of a candle

If the candle is used up or if you want to change the scent, simply replace the refill candle right away. Try different scent depending on your mood.

 

5. Safe design

LUMOS CANDLE is designed as a form of pad to minimize influence of shaking. The refill candle is fit into the pad stably so that it is safe for rocking. Try putting LUMOS CANDLE in different places from kitchen to the bedroom. It is perfect as an interior accessory as well. 

 

 

 

1. Vanilla 

It’s just such a comforting scent. Create a warm and inviting atmosphere by simply lighting a candle and enjoying the delicate fragrance of Lumos Candle.

intensity ● ● ● ● ●

2. Fresh Lavender

The smell of Lavender is calm and clean, making you feel comfortable. The scent is soft so that anyone can enjoy it.

intensity ● ● ● ● ○

3. Wild hosta

Like a fragrance of the garden with early morning dew, you can feel the cool scent of nature.

intensity ● ● ● ○ ○

4. Clean cotton

It is a refreshing fragrance spreading gently. It is as clean and refreshing as when you take in the laundry that is placed on a sunny day.

intensity ● ● ● ○ ○

5. Peach

It is a fragrance that gives the impression of a peach bite. It is a fresh peach scent that anyone can enjoy.

intensity ● ● ● ● ●

6. Orangeade

It is a refreshing scent that feels ripe fresh oranges and warm sunshine. The sweet smell spreads and gives a pleasant feeling, it boosts the energy of stuffy space.

intensity ● ● ● ● ○

 

 

 

  • Refill candle : 190g / 40hours
  • Fragrance : 1.Vanilla/ 2.Lavender/ 3.Wild hosta/ 4.Clean cotton/ 5.Peach/ 6.Orangeade
  • Lumos pad
  • USB cable : 5pin
  • Manual   

 

● Lumos pad

 

● Refill candle

 

  1. Fitting the refill candle to the Lumos pad properly.
  2. It is lit by pressing the button on the pad.
  3. When the pad's battery is low, you can charge it easily with a mobile phone charger. 
  4. If the candle is used up or if you want to change the scent, simply replace the refill candle. Try different scent depending on your mood.

 

● Fragrance : 1.Vanilla/ 2.Lavender/ 3.Wild hosta/ 4.Clean cotton/ 5.Peach/ 6.Orangeade    

 

 

   

 

● Where we ship?  
LUMOS CANDLE will ship worldwide. The shipping fee differs from country to country and  varies by perks. Your pledge does not include GST, VAT, equivalent taxes and customs duties.

● When we start shipping?

We plan to ship the product in November 2018. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. For questions about your order, please contact ▷ indiegogo@lumoscandle.com

 

Many people love candles, but many people feel uncomfortable using them. We considered how to resolve the inconvenience. We thought candles should be changed. We decided we needed to change candles, and we decided to make a candle that would make it comfortable and safe for people to use.

We hope that many of you will have a chance to experience the convenience of LUMOS CANDLE and have a lot of sympathy. Your funding will be used for product development and production cost. We will continue to work to ease the discomfort of the candles that many of you are experiencing, and to make sure everyone who uses them can enjoy the candles comfortably : )

 

Like "lumos" which is a bright-lit spell at the movie Harry Potter, we want to shine the world beautifully with the candlelight. We will move forward until the day everyone uses the candles comfortably.  : )  

 

 

Q What is LUMOS CANDLE?

LUMOS CANDLE is a magical candle that it is lighted when you just push its button.

 

Q How is it different from the existing candles?

Existing candles cannot be used without a lighter tool. People often experience the danger and discomfort of using a hand tool while using an ignition tool.

On the other hand, LUMOS CANDLE can be easily and conveniently enjoyed by those who feel uncomfortable and difficult to use the lighter because it is lit by pressing the button on the pad without using the ignition tool.

A lighter is a consumable item, but the LUMOS PAD can be used semi-permanently with a built-in rechargeable battery.

 

Q How does LUMOS CANDLE work?

It uses the principle of electric discharge to ignite on the wick. If you press the button of the pad after fitting the refill candle to the LUMOS PAD properly, the refill candle wick is immediately lit.

 

Q Are other candles sold on the market compatible?

Only the refill candle of LUMOS CANDLE can be used.

 

Q How long does it take to use a refill candle?

You can use it about 40 hours. (The usage time may vary depending on the environment.)

       

Q How do I replace the refill candle?  

The refill candle can be easily inserted and removed from the pad. If you have used up your candle or want to use a different fragrance, you can remove the existing refill candle and place a new refill candle on the pad, then you can use it right away.
 

Q Do I need the LUMOS PAD?

Yes, you need to place a refill candle on the LUMOS PAD to experience the auto-ignition function.

 

Q How long is the battery life of the LUMOS PAD?

It can be used for more than 4 months once it is fully charged. (based on the use of 4 times a day)

     

Q How do I charge my LUMOS PAD?

You can charge it easily with a mobile phone micro USB(5 pin) charger.

 

Q Is the LUMOS PAD waterproof?

Because there is no waterproof function, putting it in a wet shower room may cause malfunction. Do not allow water or other liquids to flow into the pad.

story:
___________

 

 

It’s hard keeping your loved ones dialed in to your daily life when they’re living in a different time zone or uncomfortable with technology. And it’s not the big stuff they’re missing. It’s all the important little stuff. Loop’s simple, beautiful frame means that the next time mom calls, she can ask about Tyler’s soapy fauxhawk at bath time instead of the weather.

 
 

Sharing photos with the family can be difficult

 

 

 

 

 

Digital photo frames don’t exactly have the best reputation. Tried one before and it just ended up in the closet? That’s because they’re hard to update, have less than stellar screens, and are difficult for the grandparents to use. Loop fixes all of that.

 

We’ve wrapped a high-end 10” IPS display into a delightfully simple package that’s easy to use. Unlike the competition, we also believe the app should be more than an after thought, because what good is an easy to use frame without regular new photos? We spent years developing an app that makes getting setup and adding photos both quick and fun. Loop seamlessly integrates into whichever way you currently store and share your photos so keeping the family to date is never a chore.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Send photos directly via the Loop app, or through text message

Open the app if you want to upload a bunch of photos or a video and you you can add comments to the pictures. Or you can even text message pictures to Loop and  they show up in seconds. You can even add Loop to a group chat and they will show up instantly at your parents or grandparents home.

 

 

Sync with Apple and Google Photos

Is Apple or Google photos your jam? We got you covered. We have an integration with both so Loop can automatically pull from an Apple photos album on your phone or a Google photos from the cloud. Just pick an album and we will sync to it each day.

 

 

Get Gran on the ‘Gram

If your best moments are already up on social media, just setup Loop to stream your latest photos and stories. A quick login to your Instagram and Facebook accounts will have everything synced and streaming to Loop automatically.

 

 

Or connect with your Adobe Lightroom albums

For all the photo enthusiasts with large catalogs of content on your computer Loop also connects to Adobe Lightroom. Select your favorite albums to sync and start enjoying those buried photos taken on your SLR.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

See everything that’s happening in the family all in one place

All the pictures you and your family share are put into a feed in the app. Its like your own private family facebook. You can ‘like’ photos, add comments or even add simple emojis.

 

 

Invite your entire family to join in

You can invite everyone in the family in seconds. Using the app you share a link through text message or email and the family can send pictures to Loop from anywhere in the world.

 

 

Get notified with whats happening in the family

When new pictures are shared, or someone adds a comment, you get notified. You even get notified if mom or grandma likes a photo on her Loop! It’s a light way of keeping up to date.

 

 

Organize your photos into channels

Channels are like “Slack for your family”. You simply create a channel name and invite people to it. Everything you post to a channel shows up on Loop and everyone who is invited to the channel sees it in the app. You can add multiple channels to Loops.

 

 

Remote control your Loop from anywhere - so your parents never have to

All of Loop’s settings are controlled through the app. So if you want Loop to turn off at 10pm and back on at 6am, you just make a few taps on the phone (from anywhere) and your done! No more walking mom through settings over the phone. Its like having a remote control from a thousand miles away.

 

 

 

Easily scroll through photos with the knob

If you want to go back a photo or show someone an old favorite all you need to do is turn the large knob on the side of Loop to flip like photos like an old rolodex.

 

 

Switch to a different photo channel with the other knob

Loop organizes your photos and videos into channels. For a change of pace you can switch channels by turning the small knob under the scroll knob.

 

 

Loop automatically goes to sleep at night

When your days over Loop will automatically dim the screen at night or turn off completely at a scheduled time to prevent light glare and conserve power.

 

 

 

 

 

Your family's privacy is something we respect. Everything you share on Loop is private by default and only gets shared to family members you choose to add. Photos are stored and backed up in the cloud so if anything should happen to either your Loop or your phone, there’s no need to worry.

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The idea for Loop was born several years ago when Brian’s son Alex was born. He was living in San Francisco with his new family and trying to stay connected with his parents who live on the east coast in Boston and Florida. When his father became ill, it really hit home. But all the alternatives had problems - social media was too public, half the family was on Apple, the other on Android and we still needed to email pictures to grandma. It was a mess. So the team created Loop.

 

This isn’t our first rodeo

Our first Loop did over $1m in sales and shipped to thousands of families around the world. In fact, some people told us that it changed their lives. We have wrapped all the learnings from that development to deliver our second generation Loop. It’s faster, cooler and has so many more features. It is better and cheaper and you get it in just a few weeks!

 

 

A team you can trust to deliver

Everything you post to a channel shows up on Loop and everyone who is invited to the channel sees it in the app. You can add multiple channels to Loops.  Remote control your Loop from anywhere - so your parents never have toAll of Loop’s settings are controlled through the app. So if you want Loop to turn off at 10pm and back on at 6am, you just make a few taps on the phone (from anywhere) and your done! No more walking mom through settings over the phone. Its like having a remote control from a thousand miles away.   Easily scroll through photos with the knobIf you want to go back a photo or show someone an old favorite all you need to do is turn the large knob on the side of Loop to flip like photos like an old rolodex.  Switch to a different photo channel with the other knobLoop organizes your photos and videos into channels. For a change of pace you can switch channels by turning the small knob under the scroll knob.  Loop automatically goes to sleep at nightWhen your days over Loop will automatically dim the screen at night or turn off completely at a scheduled time to prevent light glare and conserve power.     Your family's privacy is something we respect. Everything you share on Loop is private by default and only gets shared to family members you choose to add. Photos are stored and backed up in the cloud so if anything should happen to either your Loop or your phone, there’s no need to worry.    

 

 

 
 
     The idea for Loop was born several years ago when Brian’s son Alex was born. He was living in San Francisco with his new family and trying to stay connected with his parents who live on the east coast in Boston and Florida. When his father became ill, it really hit home. But all the alternatives had problems - social media was too public, half the family was on Apple, the other on Android and we still needed to email pictures to grandma. It was a mess. So the team created Loop. This isn’t our first rodeoOur first Loop did over $1m in sales and shipped to thousands of families around the world. In fact, some people told us that it changed their lives. We have wrapped all the learnings from that development to deliver our second generation Loop. It’s faster, cooler and has so many more features. It is better and cheaper and you get it in just a few weeks!  A team you can trust to deliver

story:
[UPDATE]

Hey all you superstars! Thank you so much for the support you have given us. All the love and comments are much appreciated and have given us a great vote of confidence in our designs.

Our Indiegogo campaign has ended and we'll start production very soon. So, early next year you'll be getting your personal thank-yous, aprons and of course, table legs to build your lives on and make 2015 the best year yet! For the year to come, Francois and Ta Yang are already working on new accessories for tables, so stay tuned to our Page!

Whether it's Ribbon or Delta that you've taken a fancy to, all of us at Adap.Table wish you happy adventures doing the things you love. Have a wonderful holiday season.

Warm hug from Adap.Table 

Keep following us at
Adap.Table offcial website
Adap.Table facebook


[UPDATE]

Wondering how you could play with the 2-legs perk? We made a new video to show a few of the numerous possibilities. Oh the possibilities!


We now have a Referral Program by which you might be able to get Adap.Table legs for free! Please find out more at the Updates section or simply click HERE.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Adap.Table legs make it possible to turn any flat surface into a table. Just tighten the legs onto the surface using the clamping mechanism and you have a table. Easy to assemble and disassemble, Adap.Table provides you with the freedom to create your own personal space, and fits perfectly into a flexible and personalized lifestyle. 


 

Our simple and elegant Adap.Table legs enable you to freely match sculptural table legs with any new or recycled table top, individualizing the heart of your working and living spaces at ease. Made of robust steel, each set of legs can support over 100kg or 220lbs; more than enough for working at home, having a meal, or making what you love! 

Currently we have two legs we want to put into production. 

Here’s a little more about them:


This table leg fits snugly around the corner of a table. Strong and sturdy, the triangular top-plate tapers down to create sleek legs that, when combined with a surface, create a striking table.


People are very mobile these days. We move around for work and study. This impermanence makes it difficult to create personal spaces when we don’t have permanent addresses. People need furniture that can adapt to a contemporary, mobile lifestyle. The movement of collapsible design has never been as relevant as it is now. Ikea with its concept of flatpack furniture can be described as the precursor of the movement in modern times. Objects need to be flexible, we should be able to store them without losing space. Furniture also needs to fit inside an elevator or in a car to make moving less of a headache.

Table legs have been overlooked for many years. These legs are the foundation of a table, without them, tables cannot exist. We want people to appreciate these legs and to give them a new perspective of this fundamental piece of design and show their hidden beauty through a new functionality.


This is us, the design team! We are Ta Yang Hsu and Francois Elphick. 

Born in Belgium, Ta Yang studied piano and architecture in Brussels. His work ranges from space design, museology, identity design, photography, and art direction. Francois was born and grew up in South Africa. After studying industrial design in Taiwan, he has worked in interior design, architecture and graphic design.

After meeting in Taiwan in 2001, Ta Yang and Francois have since then worked together on many design projects. 

"Francois is a free-spirited mind who, from the very beginning, has always wanted to play not within, but around the rules. While sometimes it could be crazy, it is nevertheless very refreshing, and makes you want to explore new things.
As partners, I can say that while my instinct is to look at the big picture, his is to look into the soul of a project, which in design, is always about the details."

Ta Yang—

"Ta Yang has the amazing gift of getting straight to the core of any design problem.  He cuts through all the noise from ideas battling for attention and finds the most elegant and appropriate solutions, even when this goes against the design brief. This ability to see the whole picture and distance himself from his work engenders trust in all the people he works with."

Francois—





Get FREE SHIPPING on your Adap.Table legs!

We now have a Referral Program for you to thank you for your support and sharing!

It’s very simple: Invite your friends to check our Indiegogo page, and you get your Adap.Table legs at ZERO international shipping cost! You will furthermore get $10 refund per friend who buys either a set of 2 or 4 Adap.Table legs! The more friends you refer, the more refunds you get!

Let's start from HERE.

Dimensions: 8 × 8 × 75cm (3.1" × 3.1" × 2' 5.5")
Weight: 2.1kg (4.63lbs)
Material: Powder coated steel
Color: Black

story: I'm going to be moving shortly into my own place! FINALLY! But, I'll be taking nothing with me. No furniture. Nothing. Ill be eating 2 minute noodles and sleeping on an air mattress until I can fund real furniture and hopefully with your help I'll be living more comfortably and happily than ever xox

story:
WHY OLLY IS DIFFERENT

 

Each Olly is unique because you are unique

A ground-breaking AI engine allows each Olly to develop a unique personality, connecting with you on a highly personalised level. 

 

Olly learns. You don't have to ask

Proactivity* is one of Olly’s most unique features. Olly understands your patterns and schedules, processes the information based on context then acts on the information before you have to ask. Olly learns to be proactive in two ways: user defined and contextual awareness.

*Don't worry, you have the full control. Olly will only be proactive under your permission.

User Defined

One way to teach Olly is to literally train Olly. For example, simply say "Hey Olly, tell me the weather in the morning." Olly will remember this and tell you the weather forecast automatically the next morning. You can train Olly to tell you the news, traffic, your calendar events etc.

Contextual Awareness

Olly recognizes your routines and executes the most relevant and useful actions, such as play your favorite music and set the temperature to the right degree at the right time. To add to the experience, Olly draws connections to your calendar, email, TFL, news, BBC and so on. This gives Olly optimal information to better assist you.

Like mentioned before, if this is not your thing, you have the full control.

 

FEATURES (UPDATED 2.11.2017)

A Perfect Fit

Based on your needs and personality, we do our best to match you with an Olly that will complement your lifestyle. No matter if you are an artist, a teacher, an engineer or an athlete there's an Olly for you.

 

OLLY'S SCIENCE AND INNOVATION

 

Emotional Character Engine

Olly understands your facial expressions, vocal intonations, and verbal patterns. So whether you are happy or sad, Olly sees it and hears it.  This understanding allows Olly to move and talk to you in an unprecedented way.  

 

Vision-enhanced Natural Voice Interaction

Olly interacts with people in a more natural way similar to how a person might. Olly does not only hear, but it can also see. Olly will proactively start a conversation rather than just reacting to a command.

 

Multimodal User-recognition

Olly recognises people through visual and audio detection/by voice and by image. The two combined techniques work together to improve recognition rates. This is the foundation of Olly’s proactivity.

 

Don't forget to bring your umbrella.

Action/activity Recognition & Forecasting

Olly not only recognises what you’re doing, but can also learn the intention behind it. Subsequently, Olly is able to anticipate situations and offer helpful suggestions.

 

Scene Understanding & Vision-augmented Beam-forming

Hearing you clearly across the room is important. Olly therefore uses vision to enhance its beamforming microphone array technology. Olly scans and analyses the surrounding environment to identify the room type and any potential obstacles between itself and you, so it can focus on you better.

 

Expressive Visual Interaction System

Olly communicates with you using a custom built circular LED display with a design language that is as visually unique as every Olly, yet understandable due to its shared core patterns.

 

 

INSIDE OLLY:

CUTTING-EDGE INTERACTIVE TECHNOLOGY

 

OLLY MAKES YOUR SMART HOME, SMARTER

Olly is designed to seamlessly connect with your home’s most popular apps and smart devices and to listen to Internet radio.

                                     

 

 

PRE-ORDER NOW!

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

            

 

WE ARE EMOTECH

Emotech, the team behind Olly is made up of an incredibly talented and diverse group of individuals who all share a common goal: to create technology that’s more human －  technology that we can truly connect with, that understands us, and that ultimately improves our lives through innovative and more personal interactions.

To bring Olly to life, we’ve assembled world-leading AI-scientists and researchers from the fields of machine learning, speech technology, and computer vision, as well as neuroscientists, psychologists, highly experienced software and hardware engineers, game designers, animation and sound artists and globally integrated marketing specialists. At Emotech, we come from over 20 countries and now work in London, Edinburgh, San Francisco, Armenia, Taipei, and Shenzhen.

ENDORSEMENT

 

John Shawe-Taylor Director, Centre for Computational Statistics and Machine Learning, UCL

 

Jason Rentfrow Director of Studies in PBS, University of Cambridge

​

Yvonne Rogers Professor of Interaction Design, the Director of UCLIC, UCL

 
 
Suzi Perry
Suzi Perry is an English television presenter best known for the BBC for 13 years.
 
 
"We are really excited to see Olly come to life.  We worked with the Emotech team to help setup a solid process to review and vet their manufacturing partner and lay the foundation to ensure a smooth handover to production." - Scott N. Miller, CEO, Dragon Innovation, Inc.
 

 

As Featured In

 

 

THE MAKING OF AND EARLY CONCEPTS

 

Wake up, Olly!

In September 2016, Olly stood up for the first time. Back then, it was merely a mechanical prototype that could not respond. Only 3 months later, Olly could hear and recognise our voice! Although acting a bit slow, Olly was able to rise and turn to find us! Earlier this year, Olly made another huge progress. From 8 meters away, it did not only wake up but also greeted us!

 

 

LED Iterations

Olly communicates through visual language, which is currently one of the most innovative technologies displayed by any robot on the market. Albeit not the only element, Olly’s LED are the key component of its interaction with the owner.  Our engineers, developers and designers cannot recount the many iterations and tweaks necessary to achieve the LED effects you see today. We've come such a long way! And we thoroughly enjoyed the process because we genuinely care about providing you with the possible user experience!

 

OLLY IS READY TO MEET YOU

Bringing Olly to life has been a joint collaboration between AI researchers, human psychologists and neuroscientists. We’ve refined and perfected Olly across numerous prototypes to get to where we are today. Olly is now finally ready to go. We’re hugely excited to introduce Olly to the world and recruit the first owners to shape the personality of Olly, a robot that views the world more like a human than a machine.
 
We commenced factory preparations in 2016, and are now waiting for the launch of our crowdfunding campaign to secure our manufacturing partner. With final testing and production scheduled for March 2018, pre-orders will be shipped in February to ensure you’re amongst one of the very first to experience Olly.
 

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

Through crowdfunding we’re giving you the chance to be one of the world’s first owners of Olly. You’ll not only get to experience the first robot with a personality, with lifetime free Olly system upgrades, you’ll also be playing a part in shaping the future of Olly itself. More importantly, you will be involved in creating a new world of AI and encouraging our society to embrace this new technology.  

We’re looking for owners who’ll give us updates on their life with Olly, helping us to ensure every Olly is as uniquely brilliant as possible.

Olly can’t wait to meet you and empower your daily life.  

 

IMPACT

Emotech’s mission is to improve the relationship between humans and technology. Which is where you come in. We’re giving tech-lovers the technology to help make this happen. By becoming a proud owner of Olly, you can help us to create a better product and shape the future of Olly's development.

We want Olly to be an open platform. The more people who use Olly, the better Olly will become. We want our developers to have some fun with this project too, challenging them to create new software and hardware that pushes the existing boundaries of technology.To increase Olly’s skillset, we seek more talents from AI, design, voice and sound innovation and the medical field.

As a start-up, there’s a rebellious spirit that runs throughout Emotech. We’re looking for backers who share that spirit. Those who want to disrupt the ‘expected’ and help us create a more diverse AI world.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready to scale. Our team of experts, including the former head of manufacturing for Pebble, have been getting Olly ready for action since February 2017, We’ve also teamed up with the clever folk at Dragon Innovation, with several versions of Olly already completed. It’s the reason we’re super confident that the Olly you pre-order will be of the highest quality.

We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. We want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. However, due to the complexity of Olly’s components being produced across the globe, there may be slight delays to the originally planned delivery times.

Also, being as smart as Olly doesn’t come cheap. We’re using the very best quality materials and technology, from the super-powerful CPU to the high-quality microphone arrays and gears ensuring superb sound quality and smooth movement. It means that Olly will be ready to impress right from day one. We know the pricing might reduce the number of backers who support us. But those who do will receive a truly state-of-the-art robot assistant (Olly told us to say that).

 

HELP OUT BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS!

Do you have a friend who would be interested in Olly? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make a difference in growing our community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs Olly!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.

Let’s do this.

       

 

How to contact us:

General inquiries: info@emotech.co

Open platform and SDK: ollylab@emotech.co

Support inquiries: support@emotech.co

Investment and press: chelseac@emotech.co

Wholesale: sales@emotech.co

Career: julia@emotech.co

 

FAQ

 

About Emotech

1. Who created it?

We are a London-based start-up working on the innovative personal robot Olly, the first robot with personality. We have been selected as one of the Top 14 Start-up teams in Europe for Disrupt London by TechCrunch. BBC News and TechCrunch have reported that we have been named a CES 2017 Innovation Awards Honoree in four categories for our smart lifestyle assistant Olly Robot, a first for any startup product.

The inspiration for Olly came from the realisation that AI could be developed which would have a personality based on its users’ preferences and patterns, and that is where the name Emotech comes from, Emotion+Technology.

2. What makes Olly different compared to other AI devices?

Olly does what others don’t. Problems with current AI products are 1) Reactive rather than proactive. 2) Voice only, cannot detect its surroundings. 3. One-size-fits-all, i.e. lack of personalisation / customisation.

Olly is more than a robot. It is the first robot with personality. Day by day it gets to know your life patterns and begins to shape its personality to match yours. Olly is the only robot with a real learning system; its great uniqueness lies in its proactivity.  We have been preparing for manufacturing for a few months now, which means that we are confident the delivery will be of superb quality.

3. Why do personality and emotions matter for robots?

Emotion is the future of AI. Adding personalities and emotions isn’t just a fun experiment: it will help create virtual and physical robots that communicate more naturally. Emotions also aid in making computers smarter by offering motivational reminders and unconventional suggestions to encourage problem-solving.

4. Why order now?

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Ollies off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

About Usage

5. What if you wanted to change your morning routine (for example), can you re-set?

Olly will do its best to use the whole available contextual information (the scope of which is fully controlled by the user) to quickly spot and adapt to changing user conditions. If some manual intervention is still necessary, Olly is always ready to listen to your feedback.

6. Can Olly speak other languages?

Olly speaks English for now in either a British or American accent and has a male or female voice. Our team is currently working on different languages, which will enter the testing phase by the end of this year.

7. Will the voices be changed?

Yes, Olly presently has two voices (male and female, British and American) and we will release more characteristic voices later.

8. Will Olly become like a robot version of me?

Olly won’t become like a robot version of you but it will continuously learn your preferences to proactively communicate with you and respond to your needs.

9. Will Olly watch me sleep?

Olly has two cameras, which means Olly can interact with you in both “awake” and “sleep” mode. For example, Olly knows when you come home and can talk to you proactively; Olly knows you are doing a push-up, and can cheer you on. But please don’t worry about your privacy as Olly doesn’t upload images or any raw data anywhere, and you can even turn off this proactivity feature of Olly if you prefer.

10. How many people can use one Olly device?

Olly feels best in home environments, and can recognise and offer a unique experience for each household member independently, up to 6 people.

11. Can you link multiple Ollies together, so you have constant coverage around your home?

Ollies on the same network (within the same environment) can exchange data.  

12. How long does it take to set-up an Olly?

Olly is very easy to set up. It comes together with a mobile app, through which you have to connect it to your wireless network. After that, you can log in with services such as, Gmail, Calendar, Music providers, etc., to increase the experience you will get out of Olly.

About Data Security

13. Where does the data go?

We are very aware of the importance of our users' privacy, and life at home is intimate and personal. We believe the best way to protect user’s data is by giving the users full control of their data and to follow all the official standards on data privacy in each and every country where the product is released. We don’t offer data to third parties, however, as everyone else, we would like to use some of the collected data to improve Olly and in doing so we will follow the golden standards behind data collection and storage, including transparency of what is used and how. Furthermore, we use data encryption and anonymisation to better protect Olly users.

About Customer Service

14. Are there VAT charges involved?

You will be responsible for the tax obligation in your respective jurisdiction. Duties and taxes differ wildly from country to country, state to state, province to province. Shipments will be made without any prepayment of duties, VAT, taxes, GST and/or HST. This means that there will be nothing additional to pay at the time you finalize your order; however, you will be responsible for taxes, duties and customs fees levied by the customs office in your country. This will likely mean your shipment will be held by customs until duties and taxes are paid.

15. What is your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've been shipped.

16. How will I know when my order ships & can I track my package online?

As soon as our warehouse ships your order, we will send you an email notifying you that your package is en route. In this email we will include a tracking number from the logistics service provider.

Suzi Perry is an English television presenter best known for the BBC for 13 years.

 
 


"We are really excited to see Olly come to life.  We worked with the Emotech team to help setup a solid process to review and vet their manufacturing partner and lay the foundation to ensure a smooth handover to production." - Scott N. Miller, CEO, Dragon Innovation, Inc.
 
 
As Featured In

 
 THE MAKING OF AND EARLY CONCEPTS Wake up, Olly!In September 2016, Olly stood up for the first time. Back then, it was merely a mechanical prototype that could not respond. Only 3 months later, Olly could hear and recognise our voice! Although acting a bit slow, Olly was able to rise and turn to find us! Earlier this year, Olly made another huge progress. From 8 meters away, it did not only wake up but also greeted us!

 
 LED IterationsOlly communicates through visual language, which is currently one of the most innovative technologies displayed by any robot on the market. Albeit not the only element, Olly’s LED are the key component of its interaction with the owner.  Our engineers, developers and designers cannot recount the many iterations and tweaks necessary to achieve the LED effects you see today. We've come such a long way! And we thoroughly enjoyed the process because we genuinely care about providing you with the possible user experience! OLLY IS READY TO MEET YOUBringing Olly to life has been a joint collaboration between AI researchers, human psychologists and neuroscientists. We’ve refined and perfected Olly across numerous prototypes to get to where we are today. Olly is now finally ready to go. We’re hugely excited to introduce Olly to the world and recruit the first owners to shape the personality of Olly, a robot that views the world more like a human than a machine. We commenced factory preparations in 2016, and are now waiting for the launch of our crowdfunding campaign to secure our manufacturing partner. With final testing and production scheduled for March 2018, pre-orders will be shipped in February to ensure you’re amongst one of the very first to experience Olly.  
WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
Through crowdfunding we’re giving you the chance to be one of the world’s first owners of Olly. You’ll not only get to experience the first robot with a personality, with lifetime free Olly system upgrades, you’ll also be playing a part in shaping the future of Olly itself. More importantly, you will be involved in creating a new world of AI and encouraging our society to embrace this new technology.  
We’re looking for owners who’ll give us updates on their life with Olly, helping us to ensure every Olly is as uniquely brilliant as possible.
Olly can’t wait to meet you and empower your daily life.  
 
IMPACT
Emotech’s mission is to improve the relationship between humans and technology. Which is where you come in. We’re giving tech-lovers the technology to help make this happen. By becoming a proud owner of Olly, you can help us to create a better product and shape the future of Olly's development.
We want Olly to be an open platform. The more people who use Olly, the better Olly will become. We want our developers to have some fun with this project too, challenging them to create new software and hardware that pushes the existing boundaries of technology.To increase Olly’s skillset, we seek more talents from AI, design, voice and sound innovation and the medical field.
As a start-up, there’s a rebellious spirit that runs throughout Emotech. We’re looking for backers who share that spirit. Those who want to disrupt the ‘expected’ and help us create a more diverse AI world.
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready to scale. Our team of experts, including the former head of manufacturing for Pebble, have been getting Olly ready for action since February 2017, We’ve also teamed up with the clever folk at Dragon Innovation, with several versions of Olly already completed. It’s the reason we’re super confident that the Olly you pre-order will be of the highest quality.
We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. We want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. However, due to the complexity of Olly’s components being produced across the globe, there may be slight delays to the originally planned delivery times.
Also, being as smart as Olly doesn’t come cheap. We’re using the very best quality materials and technology, from the super-powerful CPU to the high-quality microphone arrays and gears ensuring superb sound quality and smooth movement. It means that Olly will be ready to impress right from day one. We know the pricing might reduce the number of backers who support us. But those who do will receive a truly state-of-the-art robot assistant (Olly told us to say that).
 
HELP OUT BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS!
Do you have a friend who would be interested in Olly? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make a difference in growing our community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs Olly!
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.
Let’s do this.

Support inquiries: support@emotech.co
Investment and press: chelseac@emotech.co
Wholesale: sales@emotech.co
