FAQ
 
About Emotech
1. Who created it?
We are a London-based start-up working on the innovative personal robot Olly, the first robot with personality. We have been selected as one of the Top 14 Start-up teams in Europe for Disrupt London by TechCrunch. BBC News and TechCrunch have reported that we have been named a CES 2017 Innovation Awards Honoree in four categories for our smart lifestyle assistant Olly Robot, a first for any startup product.
The inspiration for Olly came from the realisation that AI could be developed which would have a personality based on its users’ preferences and patterns, and that is where the name Emotech comes from, Emotion+Technology.
2. What makes Olly different compared to other AI devices?
Olly does what others don’t. Problems with current AI products are 1) Reactive rather than proactive. 2) Voice only, cannot detect its surroundings. 3. One-size-fits-all, i.e. lack of personalisation / customisation.
Olly is more than a robot. It is the first robot with personality. Day by day it gets to know your life patterns and begins to shape its personality to match yours. Olly is the only robot with a real learning system; its great uniqueness lies in its proactivity.  We have been preparing for manufacturing for a few months now, which means that we are confident the delivery will be of superb quality.
3. Why do personality and emotions matter for robots?
Emotion is the future of AI. Adding personalities and emotions isn’t just a fun experiment: it will help create virtual and physical robots that communicate more naturally. Emotions also aid in making computers smarter by offering motivational reminders and unconventional suggestions to encourage problem-solving.
4. Why order now?
By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Ollies off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.
About Usage
5. What if you wanted to change your morning routine (for example), can you re-set?
Olly will do its best to use the whole available contextual information (the scope of which is fully controlled by the user) to quickly spot and adapt to changing user conditions. If some manual intervention is still necessary, Olly is always ready to listen to your feedback.
6. Can Olly speak other languages?
Olly speaks English for now in either a British or American accent and has a male or female voice. Our team is currently working on different languages, which will enter the testing phase by the end of this year.
7. Will the voices be changed?
Yes, Olly presently has two voices (male and female, British and American) and we will release more characteristic voices later.
8. Will Olly become like a robot version of me?
Olly won’t become like a robot version of you but it will continuously learn your preferences to proactively communicate with you and respond to your needs.
9. Will Olly watch me sleep?
Olly has two cameras, which means Olly can interact with you in both “awake” and “sleep” mode. For example, Olly knows when you come home and can talk to you proactively; Olly knows you are doing a push-up, and can cheer you on. But please don’t worry about your privacy as Olly doesn’t upload images or any raw data anywhere, and you can even turn off this proactivity feature of Olly if you prefer.
10. How many people can use one Olly device?
Olly feels best in home environments, and can recognise and offer a unique experience for each household member independently, up to 6 people.
11. Can you link multiple Ollies together, so you have constant coverage around your home?
Ollies on the same network (within the same environment) can exchange data.  
12. How long does it take to set-up an Olly?
Olly is very easy to set up. It comes together with a mobile app, through which you have to connect it to your wireless network. After that, you can log in with services such as, Gmail, Calendar, Music providers, etc., to increase the experience you will get out of Olly.
About Data Security
13. Where does the data go?
We are very aware of the importance of our users' privacy, and life at home is intimate and personal. We believe the best way to protect user’s data is by giving the users full control of their data and to follow all the official standards on data privacy in each and every country where the product is released. We don’t offer data to third parties, however, as everyone else, we would like to use some of the collected data to improve Olly and in doing so we will follow the golden standards behind data collection and storage, including transparency of what is used and how. Furthermore, we use data encryption and anonymisation to better protect Olly users.
About Customer Service
14. Are there VAT charges involved?
You will be responsible for the tax obligation in your respective jurisdiction. Duties and taxes differ wildly from country to country, state to state, province to province. Shipments will be made without any prepayment of duties, VAT, taxes, GST and/or HST. This means that there will be nothing additional to pay at the time you finalize your order; however, you will be responsible for taxes, duties and customs fees levied by the customs office in your country. This will likely mean your shipment will be held by customs until duties and taxes are paid.
15. What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've been shipped.
16. How will I know when my order ships & can I track my package online?
As soon as our warehouse ships your order, we will send you an email notifying you that your package is en route. In this email we will include a tracking number from the logistics service provider.

story:
We use the toilet everyday anyway, so why not use it the correct way? The modern toilet sitting posture is known to be bad for health. Our product, TURBO, can help solve that issue.

 

Simple things like how we use the toilet can have a big impact on our health and wellness. Many of us probably do not use the toilet as best as we should. We are simply unaware. That's why we invented TURBO, which makes using toilet the right way easy and seamless.

If we go back in time, people used to squat to release. Many in the East still do, and for good reasons. Western toilet was invented to provide convenience and comfort. But unfortunately sitting on the toilet creates a kink in the colon which makes it difficult to release, and makes us susceptible to a number of health issues like hemorrhoids, constipation, IBS, colon cancer, etc. With the western toilet we compromised wellness for comfort.

However, who wants to give up the comfort of western toilet? No one! And the good news is you do not have to, thanks to TURBO! TURBO is a toilet footstool for squatting and much more. You just sit on the toilet as you normally do, then place your feet on TURBO and lean forward a bit. This posture mimics squatting and brings the wellness back to the comfort of western toilet.

Squatting is healthier. Our body is designed like that!

 

Squatting is healthy but uncomfortable. Sitting is comfortable but unhealthy. Turbo-squatting is just right!

 

 

Good to know: Just like eating, sleeping, and exercising, pooping is also a crucial piece of the wellness puzzle. Wellness will be always illusive without it!

Health issues and soaring healthcare costs are among the #1 worries as we enter the 21st century. So it is becoming more important than ever to be in charge of our own health. Making simple lifestyle changes like this is the easiest way to stay healthy and live life to the fullest.

 

 

We have some unique and patent pending designs for you! As you will see, we have excelled both in terms of form and functionality. We are bringing you a design that you will love to have in your bathroom and use it everyday.

Go ahead, show it off to your friends or when you have guests over in your house ... let them appreciate your healthy lifestyle and get inspired by you :)

TURBO is our flagship product. It will be plastic injection molded.
To use, sit on the toilet as you normally do. Take out the TURBO, place your feet on it and lean forward a bit. When not in use it stores nicely under the toilet bowel.

 

Turbo-squat makes the 'job' easy!

With TURBO, we have excelled both in terms of form and functionality. Ordinarily, keeping a footstool by the toilet is not something one may feel proud of … that is all going to change with TURBO. While taking the functionality to the next level, we made NO compromise on aesthetics. TURBO has an elegant design and you will feel proud of having one in the bathroom, just as you would feel proud of having a 'yoga mat' in the living room – because both are symbol of healthy lifestyle!

Form and functionality!

TURBO is designed for easy and adjustable squatting, the lower toes area combined with the ramp design makes that possible. Raise your heels and then lift your legs few inches to load your feet easily (unlike a flat footstool where you will have to raise your feet all the way up). Moreover, squatting with raised heels is much more comfortable (try it!). You can also just move your toes forward/backward to adjust the squat very easily (effortlessly and without having to adjust the footstool physically).

Adjust to a squat comfortable to you, easily!

TURBO has integrated massage roller, called FLOAT (see the next section for more about FLOAT). Plus, it has storage for a spare FLOAT, so that you can get a different FLOAT experience with an easy swap – never get tired of the same massage!

Easy swap a different massage!

 

TURBO brings the wellness back at the comfort of the western toilet, with style!

 

FLOAT is the massage roller, and A/B are rollers with different surface features. Massage rollers are modular and interchangeable. FloatA has longitudinal ribs and FloatB has circumferential ribs.

Massage is a key highlight of TURBO, and it adds a whole new dimension to bathroom experience. Our feet get beaten up everyday from the time we wake up to the time we go to bed. So why not pamper our feet a little while attending the nature's call? It not only feels good, but also has health benefits. Among other benefits, massage can also be very relaxing and a great stress reliever.

A good feet massage first thing in the AM can help with blood circulation and provide a healthy foundation to get us through the day.

Massage helps with blood circulation

Massaging the feet stimulates the pressure points on the feet

The massage is not only a 'feel good' feature, it is also good for health. Massage the colon related pressure points on your feet to help with any constipation and improve colon health. Feet has other pressure points for different parts of the body that one can stimulate for enhancing the health.

Feet has pressure points for different parts of the body!

Life is getting busier day by day, and who has the time and money for a feet massage everyday? But now you can get a massage while sitting on the toilet and doing your business (takes no extra time), and for free! After all, we use the bathroom everyday anyway!

For many bathroom is no longer a place just to poop, it is also a temporary heaven (ask a mom!). So we integrated the massage to make your bathroom experience little more heavenly :)

Introducing Turbo FUSION, the hybrid of a TURBO and a BLADE (see our Kickstarter page for more info). It will be plastic injection molded with metal reinforcements.

We are introducing FUSION in the middle of the campaign based on our backers' requests. Thus there may be some more tweaks/changes to the final design. We will be doing testing before moving to production.

 

 

 

 

FUSION has four levels of height adjustment!

While TURBO works for most, FUSION gives that extra edge (in terms of elegance and functionality) for those who want it! FUSION has a toe piece that can be adjusted (easily and on the fly) to fit the need of different family members of different heights. No need of having different footstools for different-height family members, and no need to compromise on the squat.

Thus, FUSION offers the same functionality of BLADE, at a more affordable price.

 

TURBO dimensions are approximately 21.5” wide, 13” deep, and 3.5” high at the lower toes area and 8.25” high at the top of the hill ramp. The toes platform is at 10 degrees and the heel ramp is at 35 degrees. The arc is designed to fit a toilet base with diameter 10” or less. It will be plastic injection molded and weigh about 2.5 lb.

 

TURBO Specs

FUSION dimensions are approximately 21” wide, 14” deep, and 8” high. The toes platform is at 10 degrees and the heel ramp is at 35 degrees. The cutout is designed to easily fit a toilet base with diameter 10” or less. It will be made up of plastic with metal reinforcements.

 

FUSION Specs

The FLOATs are plastic injection molded and are about 4.5” long and 1” diameter. These will weigh less than 0.1 lb each.

Note that these dimensions are only approximate and may change as we make some final tweaks to bring you the best product. If you have tight tolerance about the specs or need any other specific information, please do not hesitate to check with us.

One size fits many -- and this is one area where we have excelled compared to what is out there in the market.

TURBO - Although you cannot adjust the height physically (it is intentional, to keep the design simple), the unique ramp design lets you position your feet forward or backward to adjust to a squat suitable to you.

Toilets come in different shapes and sizes, and people in a given household have different heights too. A good rule of thumb is, if your feet rest on the floor comfortably when you sit on your toilet, you should be able to use TURBO's unique ramp design to get a good squat and adjust. If your feet does not even touch the floor while sitting on your toilet, you can probably still use the TURBO to rest your feet on it and even get some squat (also don't forget that you can use the massage!).

FUSION - This design is even more versatile. You can physically, but very easily, adjust the toe piece to a squat suitable to you. No need of adjusting the individual feet or any other complicated adjustments -- just sit on the toilet and move the toe piece to the right slots, no tools needed!

FLOAT - The FLOATs are all interchangeable.

TOILET BASE - Both TURBO and BLADE easily fit under a toilet with base diameter of 10" or less.

 

 

Under normal use, both TURBO and BLADE are expected to last for years, if not a lifetime. It is a one time investment, amounts to only a few cents a day, that can have a lifetime of wellness benefits. You will also love to use it :)

 

It costs very little for a lasting wellness!

 

 

 

 


We are just starting out and our margins are razor thin, if any, so unfortunately accepting returns will be cost prohibitive for us. Therefore we have made this very hard decision not to accept any returns (and our sincere apologies for that). Before making a pledge we encourage you to use some blocks in front of your toilet and try out if squatting helps you (and we are confident it will, as our body is designed like that). If it does, our products will make the squatting only easier and more relaxing.

Phew … if you have read so far (and we hope you did because we spent months preparing for it :), now treat your eyes with some fun facts and cool graphics … enjoy!

As you can see, odds are not in our favor. Luckily it only takes a simple lifestyle change to greatly improve the odds. And the good news is TURBO makes that lifestyle change easy and seamless!

Source: Mayo Clinic, Florida Hospital, and About IBS. We already have so many worries in life, let this not be one of those.

TURBO - best of both worlds!

TURBO combines the wisdom of East at the comfort of West!

Very first animation we had created to explain the concept.

What people are already saying ...
 
At NadiaLabs, our mission is to provide product and services that integrate seamlessly in our life and help with our wellbeing. We are a small but dedicated team of professionals with backgrounds in technology, design, and wellness. Tikka (Tikeswar Naik) is a co-founder and leads NadiaLabs. He is a huge fan of natural ways for wellness. He received his bachelor's from IIT Madras and PhD from University of Minnesota. He worked as a mechanical engineer and left his job in Jun 2012 to pursue his interests.  Risks and challenges
When I (tikka) decided to go ahead with this project, a colleague said 'tikka, this is your wheelhouse'. And I think I agree!
Anything worth pursuing has risks and challenges. However we have done everything we can to minimize those. For example our design team and manufacturing partners have over 20 years of experience. We have bootstrapped and invested our life savings to bring the project to a stage where it is now manufacturing ready. We have literally gone through several concepts, extensive model tests, prototypes, and we believe now we are ready.
However, we will listen to your, our backer's, feedback and make any tweaks or fine adjustments to bring you the best possible product. We will lock the design asap to avoid any delays.
Should any issue arise, I will work tirelessly for a resolution. We have a razor thin margin, but should any issue arise I promise I will choose order fulfillment over profit. By backing this project you trust us with your time and money, I will do anything and everything to preserve your trust on us.

story:
There’s so much we love about Cold Brew: From the smooth flavor, to the lower pH, we could wax lyrical about this caffeinated nectar of productivity. One thing we didn’t love though was the 12-24 hour laborious process of making cold brew coffee at home so we decided to use technology to find a better way to brew.

Enter the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System. A completely new way to make Cold Brew faster and easier than ever before. Whether you’re making ready-to-drink cold brew or concentrate, our system makes it seamless. It’s like coffee magic. 

And you don't have to take their word for it, check out the word on the street... 

How Do We Do It?

Conventional Cold Brew coffee takes 12-24 hours to brew but can take up to 72 hours. Who has time for that? We solved that problem with what we call ColdBoil™ technology. 

After 5 minutes with conventional Cold Brew methods, you'll have zero ounces of Cold Brew to drink. With the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System, you'll have plenty of Cold Brew to go around the meeting table. 

What do you mean ColdBoil™? 

This whole Cold Brew in 5 minutes seems pretty magical, huh. So how do we do it? 

Thanks to our proprietary patent-pending pump, we are able to create rapid circulation and create the same results you would get from the extraction of boiling without any added heat. 

The pump circulates water through the coffee matrix while the upper and lower filters in the coffee container keep the coffee grounds contained. This forces the water to permeate the structure of the grounds, thereby dissolving and extracting the flavorful coffee oils. 

 

 

The carafe holds 50 oz. of water and after just 5 minutes, you have about 42 oz. of smooth, delicious cold brew coffee. 

It’s all about that yield baby. If you’re making ready-to-drink cold brew, you can make 42 fl oz (7 servings) of delicious sweet cold brew in as little as 5 minutes. 

For cold brew concentrate, you can max out at upwards of 16 servings.  

*serving size is approximately 6 oz. 

Store your cold brew in the refrigerator and drink for up to 10 days.*


*Jim in our office has personally tested this and he’s still alive and running our logistics department. 

Averaging 1 cup per day of cold brew at Starbucks, you can spend upwards of $1600 in a year. And that’s just 1 cup a day - we all know about those 2 and 3 cup days. So in a 2 person household, you could be spending $3200 a year on your cold brew. 

Just think, you could be drinking that cold brew out of a coconut on the beach with all that money you save, smarty pants. 

 

So, what is cold brew? You’ve probably seen an icy cup of cold brew advertised but we are here to give you the low-down. Simplified.  

Traditionally, cold brew is coffee that has been steeped for a long period of time in cold water -- usually 12-24 hours. Because the coffee beans never come in contact with heat, the coffee oils don’t react with boiling water and don’t develop that acidic, bitter coffee tang. 

The result is a richer cup of joe with a smoother finish that’s easy on your digestive system. Brewing your coffee with cold water results in 65-70% less acid than hot drip coffee or espresso, per part. And if you’re looking for a buzz, cold brew also often has more caffeine than regular coffee. Thank you cold brew!

And you can also reheat Cold Brew coffee and drink it hot. People with acid reflux who might not be able to drink regular coffee may find that hot cold brew is more tolerable to drink because of the lower pH. 

 

So Cold Brew vs. Iced Coffee –what's the big deal? Iced Coffee is just coffee brewed hot and then cooled and poured over ice. Because brewing coffee hot can release bitter or acidic oils, Iced Coffee often has an undesirable flavor. Cold Brew is the better-looking, more talented cousin of Iced Coffee. 

 

 

We designed the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System to be more compact and to fit easily on the countertop and in small spaces like apartments and dorms. 

We’ve been working on this for more than a year. From the initial idea, to the working engineering prototype, to the industrial design, to product testing and tooling.

We’re busy working on the final execution of this revolutionary product and we need your help to get the first order. Be ahead of the curve and jump on this now before the price goes up to full retail. You’ll thank us later.  

By backing us, you’ll help us meet the minimums that the factory requires to get our first order and bring this product to life. You’ll get the Dash Rapid Cold Brew at an exclusive-value in time for the holiday season. 

We are excited to share that the DASH Rapid Cold Brew has now been delivered to all our backers.

We know that no one needs to plan their coffee drinking. Now, you can spend less time worrying about planning your cold brewing and more time drinking that smooth caffeinated goodness.  

*Back us, share it & get yours free! 

Back us and share your Indiegogo referral link. If 6 of your caffeine-loving friends back us, we'll give you a Dash Rapid Cold Brew System for free. 

We’ve made it our business to bring incredible products to life in record time. Our team has successfully manufactured and shipped hundreds of thousands of products. Our crowdfunded successes include products at the intersection of technology & home. 

The PancakeBot, a pancake printer and the Sobro Coffee Table, a smart table with a refrigerator, bluetooth speakers, LED lights, charging ports and more. 

 

Our highly caffeinated team is revving up to bring this incredible cold brew to you as fast as possible. 

1. Back us! Join our crazy caffeinated cold brew family.  

2. Share this campaign with your friends or family. You know how much Cousin Diane likes her Iced Coffee. Help her upgrade.

3. Like, tweet, instagram, share on Facebook or send a smoke-signal - you know what to do.

4. Get your Rapid Cold Brew System for free if you back us and get 6 friends to back us using your Indiegogo referral link. 

Risks and Challenges 

Risks are relatively low - we’ve done all our homework to make sure that this product works and is delivering the best possible cup of joe. 

With any manufacturing process there are an infinite number of things that can go wrong but we have the team in place to make sure that our challenges never affect our backers. Plus, all the cold brew we’re drinking is helping us get stuff done in record time. 

We will be on-site inspecting the first units to come off the production line to ensure quality control. Short of our container ship sinking or be hijacked by coffee-loving pirates (stranger things have happened) we are aiming to hit our deadlines. 

Where we ship 

At this moment in time, we are only able to receive certifications for the USA & Canada. 

When we start shipping 

November 2017

Referral Program - The Details 

We are using Indiegogo’s referral program to offer you the chance to get your Dash Rapid Cold Brew System for FREE

-Refer 3 separate new people to back the current perk for a Dash Rapid Cold Brew
 and you will get your Dash Rapid Cold Brew for HALF PRICE*

-Refer 6 separate new people to back the current perk for a Dash Rapid Cold Brew and you get your Dash Rapid Cold Brew for FREE**

To count as a referrer, you must promote the Dash Rapid Cold Brew campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.


When you're logged into your account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when anyone in your social network reads your tweet, clicks the link and backs the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System, you're instantly recognized for your referral – entitling you to your Special Thank You! Within 2 weeks after the delivery of your Dash Rapid Cold Brew we will reach out to each of you (and we hope it is a lot of you!!!) to give you your Thank You credit.


* We will credit you back half of your contribution toward one Dash Rapid Cold Brew System
** We will credit you back 100% of your contribution toward one Dash Rapid Cold Brew System

+ Please note that if you have purchased multiple Dash Rapid Cold Brew Systems, this Thank You referral program only applies to one of them.
++ We can not accept any claims of referral that do not come through your unique Indiegogo ID.

If you are a member of the media looking for a press release, click here.

Can I claim multiple perks?
Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

What about shipping? 
We’re offering shipping at a flat rate of $10 per US address and $15 per Canadian address. 

Will this work outside of the US and Canada?
No, the Dash Rapid Cold Brew is designed to meet US and Canada 110V safety standards only and we do not recommend using this internationally. 

What happens if we don't reach our goal?
You will be refunded in full soon after the campaign has ended.

Does the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System come with a warranty?
Yes, it comes with a 1 year warranty but we’ll extend it to 2 years if you register your product. 

What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?
With crowdfunding we are expected to deliver a product that can otherwise take years to deliver. While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product that you are extremely satisfied with. There may be certain set backs beyond our control which may delay the project. However, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date.

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?
The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product development, purchasing of materials, and manufacturing to deliver the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System to your home. Refunds will only be issued if we can not deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all developments.
For questions please contact crowd@storebound.com

Can you ship outside of the US and Canada?
For our initial campaign, we’re limited to the US and Canada, but if we get enough interest from other countries, we can add an international perk. Stay tuned for more. 

Will the Dash Rapid Cold Brew System vary from the design above? 
We have spent the last year developing the preliminary design and prototypes built. With the complex internal workings, we are locked into the tooling we developed. So for this version, we’re pretty firmed up on the design.

story:
AI-powered Belle = AI Assistant + Doorbell + Security Camera

Meet Belle, the world's 1st intelligent Wi-Fi doorbell that greets your visitors on your behalf and notifies you when you’re needed. Protecting your packages, waving off potential solicitors, and greeting your friends are only a few of Belle’s many talents. It’s like having a personal doorman for your family, except Belle stays on duty 24/7. Log on any time day or night to see what Belle sees and hear what Belle hears. 

Belle can greet your visitors on holidays and open doors (need to work with compatible locks) for scheduled visitors without your presence. It creates a welcoming aura for the visitors by holiday greetings and it lets the visitors know what to do when you are not able to answer the ring.

 

Instruct the Package Man with Voice Interaction

 

Recognize Your Frequent Visitors with Facial Recognition 

When the same person comes more than twice, Belle can recognize this person and have a more interpersonal conversation with him/her.

 

Greet Your Visitors on Holidays

Belle is equipped with the talent of greeting you on major holidays. If your Belle talks to your visitors on Valentine’s Day like this: "Wishing you and your Valentine a happy day today. Sorry, I’m off the market. I’ve been dating an iPhone 6 for a while now. Just kidding." Imagine how surprised they will be!  

 

Distribute Visiting Requests to Respective Family Members

Once understanding whom the visitors are looking for, Belle will distribute the visiting requests to the respective home member via Netvue mobile App for the most responsive reply.

 

With our powerful Camera and App, live views, playbacks, and phone alerts are readily in your hands. You can access Netvue X - the artificial intelligence system in the App to enable/disable the AI functions of Belle.

 

Watch Your Door 24/7 From Your Phone or Echo Show with Live Streaming

Belle is like a magic window from where you can see everything taking place around your home. Its HD live streaming and infrared night vision show you the real-time views in front of your doors with clear and smooth videos days and nights.

 

Get the Accurate Notification with Advanced Motion Alert Settings

The motion alert keeps you informed promptly when something gets near to your door. Either a stray cat or a sketchy stranger, all will be captured under Belle’s complete surveillance. We’ve upgraded the motion alert to avoid frustrating false alerts. With Belle, you can customize motion detection zones and sensitivity to avoid false alerts like traffic on the street.

 

See Clear Details Even in Any Light with Dynamic Exposure

With Belle, you can get a clearer view by tapping the area in the live view, where Belle dynamically adjusts the exposure of the image for optimal image quality.

 

Monitor, Record and Playback Anytime with 24/7 Recording

Functional as a surveillance camera, Belle captures everything occurring ahead of your doors. For either the security purpose or the precious moments recorded, you can retrieve the footage from Netvue Cloud Service whenever you want and share the video clips on AWS to offer you top-level data privacy.

 

Other Benefits 

Work with Echo Show/Fire TV Designed as an Alexa compatible product, Belle can be commanded by Alexa. Just speak to Alexa, it would collect data from Belle and show you the front door view.

Super Useful Functions Even in Poor Internet Connection Belle was the first in the industry to support audio-only ring call so that you can answer your visitors easily when the Internet connection is not optimal. It also supports voice-to-text reply to visitors, saving you a lot of time and trouble.

 

Netvue Cloud  

To ensure a safe, stable and quick data storage and access, Netvue Cloud is hosted on AWS (Amazon Web Services) with reliable performance and global node distribution. With the free plan, you can use basic functions like live view, 2-way audio, instant alert and moment capture image storage, Netvue X (the AI assistant with facial recognition). 

You'll have a 14-day free trial for the premium plan if you'd like to experience functions like 24/7 cloud recording.

 

 

To make it easier for visitors, we innovated the Belle design by introducing the super large button to the doorbell. It not only makes the button more visible but also delivers a super exotic pressing experience unlike any doorbell in the market.

Belle is always illuminated at night, always be waiting and welcoming you and your visitors. 

 

 

 

 

 

Note: Belle only supports wired indoor chime. Power kit is a bypass box which is required for Belle to works with your wired indoor chime. If you don’t have a wired chime at your home, any type of chime with 16-24VAC will be fine.   

 

Established in 2010, Netvue has been an industry leader in developing the first Plug-n-Play IP cameras, video doorbells, and other IoT products supported by progressive generations of the cloud platform. We have won awards like Red Herring Top 100 Asia Award and formed strategic partnerships with industry leaders such as Q-SEE (U.S.A), DOREL (Canada) and so on. 

Our team includes IEEE fellow, world-renowned multimedia scientist, industrial experts, geeks, Masters, Ph.Ds and Professors from top universities like Tsinghua University with tens of years of experience in IoT and home security industry. 

Netvue at CES 2018

 

 

If you’re a member of the press looking for info or media assets, please download our press kit here, or contact us at press@netvue.com.

 

Risks and Challenges

We have tremendous confidence in our design and manufacturing, and have even done a small-batch production run, but as with any hardware project, there are always potential risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive.

Our team has already successfully delivered home security products to market. We understand the unique challenges of home security hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. Additionally, we have also established trusting relationships with our global logistics companies.

But as per Belle, we may encounter these challenges 

  1. It takes long to debug and optimize the stability of the overall AI software system. In this aspect, customer experience may be affected due to insufficient debugging time. 
  2. The proper selection of speakers and microphones affects the accuracy of AI speech recognition, so there is a risk in the selection and debugging of these two devices. 
  3. Complex assembly process of big button may cause the risk of delaying.

We are committed to delivering Belle on time with the high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime!

We have won awards like Red Herring Top 100 Asia Award and formed strategic partnerships with industry leaders such as Q-SEE (U.S.A), DOREL (Canada) and so on. Our team includes IEEE fellow, world-renowned multimedia scientist, industrial experts, geeks, Masters, Ph.Ds and Professors from top universities like Tsinghua University with tens of years of experience in IoT and home security industry. Netvue at CES 2018  If you’re a member of the press looking for info or media assets, please download our press kit here, or contact us at press@netvue.com. Risks and ChallengesWe have tremendous confidence in our design and manufacturing, and have even done a small-batch production run, but as with any hardware project, there are always potential risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive.Our team has already successfully delivered home security products to market. We understand the unique challenges of home security hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. Additionally, we have also established trusting relationships with our global logistics companies.But as per Belle, we may encounter these challenges 
It takes long to debug and optimize the stability of the overall AI software system. In this aspect, customer experience may be affected due to insufficient debugging time. 
The proper selection of speakers and microphones affects the accuracy of AI speech recognition, so there is a risk in the selection and debugging of these two devices. 
Complex assembly process of big button may cause the risk of delaying.
We are committed to delivering Belle on time with the high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime!

story:
As a current best-seller on Amazon, we’ve had many customers test and use our products with great results and positive feedback.

 

What our customers say:

“Great product! Assembly was very easy, plus the instructions provided for start up were clear and concise.” - Tracy S. Ebarb

“This is my third smoker now and I absolutely love it.” - Christopher Madigan

“Best grill I ever had. No more flare ups and temp stays where you set it.” - Frank Adams

 

Previous successfully funded project:

We’ve also had previous success on Indiegogo two years ago for our Elite 900, raising over $400,000.

The difference is in the taste. Z Grills infuses your food with natural, wood-smoked flavors that you can’t get from charcoal or gas grills. You can choose from a variety of wood-smoked flavors such as oak, apple, pecan, cherry, mesquite, etc. to give your food that extra kick.

Z Grills offers 7-in-1 versatility that allows you to grill, BBQ, smoke, bake, roast, braise and sear. It’s also less labor inducing and easier to maintain thanks to its digital temperature control and automatic pellet feeder that regulates the temperature for you. You won’t be chained to the grill on your next backyard BBQ.

Consistency is also key. With Z Grills’ convection heat distribution, your food cooks evenly every single time. It also prevents flare-ups and over-smoking your food, which means more mouth-watering dishes all year-round. You’ll grill like a pro in no time.

 

The 6002 series optimizes electricity and uses small amounts of pellets for flavoring purposes making it friendlier for the environment than traditional charcoal or gas grills.

The auger at the bottom of the hopper pulls the hardwood pellets into the fire pot, where they contact the hot rod and ignite the pellet grill. Convection heat distribution technology cooks food evenly, encircling food with delicious and flavorful smoke.

 

7-in-1 • Deliciously Versatile

Whether you’re in the mood for smoked halibut or wood-fired pizza, Z Grills lets you grill, smoke, bake, roast, sear, braise, and barbeque without the time constraints and messiness of a gas or charcoal grill.

 

Pellet Auto Reloading • Set It & Forget It

While your food cooks, Z Grills automatically adds the right amount of pellets needed to maintain the desired temperature. No babysitting needed.

 

Digital Temperature Control • Simplified Wood-Fired Cooking

Z Grills heats up fast and is always ready to cook. Just set the temperature with a simple turn of a dial — it’s as easy as turning on your oven. The spot-on heat control allows you to walk away and enjoy the party without having to worry about overcooking or undercooking your food.

 

Heat Circulation • No More Flare-Ups or Burnt Food

With convection-based heating, the circulation fan distributes the heat across the entire cooking surface so your food is cooked evenly every time.

 

Natural Wood Flavor • Savory, Wood-Smoked Flavors

Healthier, tastier and less messy than food cooked on other grills, Z Grills infuses your meals with 100% natural wood-fired flavors. Choose from a variety of pellet flavors such as pecan, oak, hickory, and mesquite that add big, bold flavors to your dish.

 

Large Grilling Area • Enjoy Bigger Cookouts​

From burgers to brisket, salmon to steaks, these new Z Grills models offer 600 square inches of cooking space. Cook 24 burgers at the same time for big parties.

 

Easy to Clean • Less Elbow Grease

Made from high-standard iron, the waste oil collector is conveniently located to assist you with safe and easy cleanup.

 
 

"Z" Moments with BBQ Gurus:

by: Guga Foods

 

by: Cooking with Jack Show

 

by: I Heart Recipes

 

by: No Hippie BBQ

 

by: Real Show BBQ

 

by: Mother's BBQ

 
by: Grill Top Experience

 

by: Noel Big Family Life

 

by: Moss Family TV 

 

by: White Thunder BBQ

 

by: Amy Maryon

 
by: Baum Grillin'z

6002B or 6002E:

What’s the Difference?

The only difference between these two models is the exterior finish. The Z Grills 6002B’s grill cover is made of porcelain coated cast iron, while the 6002E’s grill cover is made of heavy-duty stainless steel, perfect for year-round grilling. Both grills are built to last, have the same functions and features, and guaranteed to give you savory, wood-smoked flavors.

Our designs have been tested and proven. The Z Grills 6002B & 6002E have been put through thorough safety testing and countless hours of grilling.

Z Grills is a wood pellet grill innovator that continually works to bring value and quality to wood pellet grilling. For over 3 years, we’ve produced a myriad of grills for different kinds of grillers, from tailgate grillmasters to backyard barbecue gurus. We are a proud grill brand that exclusively sells wood pellet grills via www.zgrills.com and through several online and storefront retailers: Amazon, Walmart, Home Depot, and more.

We’re confident in our ability to bring these new Z Grills to your homes and have the manpower to make it happen. As a current best-seller on Amazon, we’ve maintained a 4 out 5 star rating and have sold over 20,000 units in the U.S. this past year. We’ve also had previous success in crowdfunding, raising over $400,000 on Indiegogo. 

We love crowdfunding our latest products on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged community. We can’t wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world’s best pellet grill for everyone.

We are able to ship to the US only. FREE standard shipping to the 48 contiguous U.S. states.

We plan to ship the product at the end of October 2019*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Z Grills 6002B & 6002E grills off the line plus exclusive access to prices never to be seen again.

 

This crowdfunding project is marketed by Red Cube. Since 2015, Red Cube has helped companies of all sizes bring their ideas into fruition, raising over $100MM through crowdfunding.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 750+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $330MM raised between them.

story:
Check the hands-on video from Unbox Fantasy 

 

 

 

Even with soap and water, it is difficult to cleanse knives and flatware properly. These daily utensils can harbor harmful germs and bacteria. These microorganisms can remain on utensils and can contaminate your food and cause serious illness. Other sanitizing methods such as boiling or using antiseptic liquid are either too time-consuming or raise food safety issues.

 

 

That’s why we invented Hookee Knife Guard to solve these problems. Hookee Knife Guard destroys bacteria using ultraviolet light to eliminate risks of infection common with raw and cooked foods. It also dries flatware with a built-in 158°F dryer to prevent mold and rust.

 

 

 

Your food’s safety is the first priority. Hookee Knife Guard prevents the invisible threat of contamination to your flatware in two ways.

 

 
  •   Patented Jason HeaChips UV Lights
     

Knife Guard uses patented UV LED lights to guarantee efficient, durable and eco-friendly decontamination. With 275nm wavelength, Knife Guard UV LED light eliminates bacteria by destroying the structure of DNA & RNA at the cellular level.

 

Compared to traditional mercury UV lamps, Hookee does not contain any toxic chemicals or release any fumes. It operates in a safe manner for you and the environment.

 

 
  •  158°F Dryer for Killing Germs 

 

In addition to UV treatment, Knife Guard applies a 158°F high-temperature drying process to utensils to prevent invisible kitchen threats. The 158°F temperature not only disinfects the knives and flatware but also dries them. It also maintains a sufficiently dry environment inside of the block that inhibits bacterial growth.

 

 
  • Auto-sensing Mode for Convenient Use

​

Hookee's auto-sensing mode measures the humidity inside the block and turns on the auto cruise mode when necessary. Once the signal light is flashing, Hookee begins to protect the knives & flatware from moisture, mold, and rust. Just plug it in and go! Your knives & flatware dry automatically.

 

 
 
  •  Large Capacity
     

Knife Guard holds most commonly used knives and accessories up to 8 inches deep such as chef knives, bread knives, cleavers, steak knives and even kitchen scissors.
 

 
  •  Designed for Families
     

3 different slots provide you with enough space for 12 knives along with 14 spoons, forks, and chopsticks. It can easily accommodate the utensil needs for a family of 6.


 

  • Smart Design

​

Elasticity double-layer parallel slots hold the knives perfectly in a safe upright position with blade separation, protecting their sensitive sharp edges.


 

 
 
  •  Compatible with All Utensil Materials
     

Knife Guard is safe for all utensil materials including metal, ceramics, silicone and other food-grade plastics.

 

 
  •  Modular Design For Cleansing
     

Detachable design for easy cleaning. Hookee’s top slots can be taken apart and cleaned with soap and water, keeping it safe and hygienic.

HD Rear View Mirror is clip-on Rear view mirror that Turns your Standard mirror into a True Panoramic HD Mirror. That will provide you Awesome View & NO MORE BLIND SPOTS! Yes, It goes on any make and model even you if your vehicle has onStar buttons. After putting on the HD Rear View Mirror you will notice Right away the difference and you are going to wonder how did you ever drove without it.

HD Rear View Mirror, Comes in two sizes:




HD Rear View Mirror, Comes in two sizes:

1) 14 Inch Mirror: 

Good for all vehicle but best used for Coupes to Full Size SUV. Also Great for Taxi Drivers, Delivery vehicles!

2) 16 Inch Mirror: 

Good for all types best used for large vehicles: Full Size Sedans, SUV's, Mini Vans, Pickup Trucks. Also Great for Taxi Drivers, Delivery vehicles and RV'S.

Simply Installation: Only Two Philips Screws

story:
What is the EcoQube C?

The heart of the EcoQube C is the aquaponics filter, which we've integrated into the tank to create an all-in-one system that uses plants like Basil or Mint to keep your aquarium clean.



EcoQube C Remote

See the remote in action!




Testimonials


How Does It Work?



Simply decorate your tank and fill it with water, plug it in and enjoy your very own sustainable ecosystem!


Why is it better?

The new beautifully integrated design is durable, portable, and compact. We've made it more affordable while maintaining the high quality product build. It's now even easier to maintain with less parts and automatic functionality, AND it's manufactured in the USA.


Traditional Aquariums


VS.

EcoQube C


Never change or replace filters again with the EcoQube! Everything Works. Together.

Ecoqube Grown Basil vs. Normal Basil


Perks

Check out the Perks that are Available!

EcoQube C

EcoQube C UV




Our Story

Our names are Eric and Kevin. We're UC San Diego students and aquarium geeks who met in high school and share a passion for planted aquatic ecosystems. 

We started out working at various aquarium shops in San Francisco, including Aquatic Central and Aqua Forest Aquarium. We eventually started our own online aquarium store called Aqua Design Innovations while selling shrimp out of a garage.

As we got older, we started to become more aware of the harsher realities of our world, realizing that there are many people globally who face food and water shortages every day but that for most of us, such issues are so foreign.

We couldn't ignore the facts, so we decided to use our knowledge of aquariums to find a feasible solution.

We believe aquaponics is a clear solution to many of the food and water shortages humanity faces today. While this food production method was used thousands of years ago in early Aztec and Chinese civilizations, it has since fallen into disuse and become largely forgotten.

We hope to educate as many people as possible about the practical solution and beauty of aquaponics and to ultimately help initiate the process of bringing aquaponics to the forefront of today's agriculture. 

We were able to reach many with the first EcoQube, and now, we hope to reach even more with the EcoQube C! Please join our mission and share the EcoQube C with as many people you know!


Original EcoQube (left) and EcoQube C (right)

 

How it All Started


In November 2013, we launched the first EcoQube on Kickstarter and raised over 200% our campaign goal, turning our idea into a reality.

Following a long and tedious manufacturing and production process, our first shipment of EcoQubes finally arrived in October 2014.



Check out the finished product below!

We shipped the EcoQubes out to all our backers and received an overwhelmingly positive response.

We couldn't have asked for a more amazing, supportive community of backers! Check out the forum they created showcasing their EcoQubes here! 

We wanted to make the EcoQube even more accessible and efficient, so we took all the feedback we got to further develop the product, which resulted in the EcoQube C!


Congrats to the Final EcoQube C Winners! 

Lacey D. & Cathee S.

story:
We like to make things - and to make things happen here in the MFA Applied Craft and Design Program, offered jointly by Oregon College of Art and Craft, and Pacific Northwest College of Art.

This project features Jack Sanders, Butch Anthony and the wonderful folks at the Community Cycling Center working with us to design and build a bicycle repair workshop for students at Helensview High School.

Helensview is designed for students needing a range of comprehensive support systems to meet their educational and career goals, and for those students that have not been successful in other educational environments. Students may be faced with multiple barriers, such as homelessness, histories of school failure, learning differences, drug and alcohol issues, and other challenges that may require extensive support from staff. 

These students face a lot of challenges, and this project is one step towards providing them with the tools, skills, and knowledge to overcome them. 

While we're supplying the expertise and labor, we'd like your help with the cost of materials we need to build with, and the bike repair tools and equipment we'll install.

With your help, we'll make something awesome AND useful, and do our part to work on critical social issues, like the school to prison pipeline.

The project runs from August 19 - 30. It's fast, with a bit of a reality show feel at times, but when 20 talented and skilled artists, designers, and makers work together, you'd be surprised how much can be accomplished! 

Once we get started, we'll share our progress on this project via updates. For the time being, read articles about our last bike repair shop project here, and our previous related project at Donald E. Long Juvenile Detention Center here and here. And of course, check out this video of our last bicycle repair shop project!

and our previous related project at Donald E. Long Juvenile Detention Center here and here.
And of course, check out this video of our
last bicycle repair shop project!

story:
Rememory Pack, Antique Floor-Tile Hacking Kit


Rememory Packs are a tool that allows you to paint antique tiles any surface. Sturdy and endlessly reusable, they are as much a stunning visual statement as a call to action.

The stencils can be used on any surface, with spray or brush-on paint. They bend around curvy surfaces or flex to fit tight corners, the stencil pack has multiple designs to allow you to paint on geometric, flower patterns, wavy floor tile designs and more. With multiple designs to choose from in varying colors, they are versatile, fun and endlessly reusable. 

We love antique tile patterns, we see them everywhere. 

Inspired by the patterns in our city of Haifa's Wadi Salib Neighborhood, we made these stencils to serve as a beautiful mirror to echo memories of abandoned homes and their forgotten stories. 

You can use the stencil pack on walls:

 You can use Rememory Packs in a variety of settings from furniture to indoor DIY projects:

You can use Rememory Stencils outside, in the street, on your favorite board

 Use them indoors for your room, your office or as a special project 

The stencil kit: 

Each Rememory stencil pack includes 4 unique patterns. Each pattern incorporates 2 stencils to complete it.

Mix&match

Stencil size: 10x10 inches. Made of 100% recycled plastic, these stencils are tough, washable and reusable. Rememory stencils are modeled on real tiles from the Wadi Salib neighborhood in Haifa. Using these stencils you can paint designs of tiles that have been forgotten over time and bring them back to life in your own community.

 

Rememory Stencil packs as a call to action:

 Our neighborhood in Haifa is a lot like any neighborhood, it’s past is hidden from view. 

 We wanted illuminate this past and make it a global conversation. A conversation about community memory. We made our Rememory stencils to capture the patterns of exquisite antique floor tiles found in our local Wadi Salib neighborhood. 

This neighborhood has seen families come and go, real people live their lives filled with joy, struggle and resistance. Today the neighborhood is in ruin and has been so for half a century.

 It’s a local story and it's a global conversation mirrored around the world from Detroit to Johannesburg, from Istanbul to Chicago. Our community memory is unique but the discussion is public, global and should be loud. We made our tile stencils to tell a story. Rememory Stencils are stunning, reusable, they're story tellers and at their best can break cycles of oppression with memories. Wanna learn more? 

 The Rememory Stencil pack is as much stunning design as it is a call to action, a voice, a spark for conversation on issues of community memory. 

How we profit share:

We give between 15-30% of our proceeds to local community youth ventures. We focus on local alternative schools in Haifa who can teach alternative historical narratives. We work to maintain relationships with the schools we help fund and update our backers on the work we do.

From Boston to Haifa:

Yup, we are multinational, we are based in Boston and in Haifa and split our time between outreach, media work and marketing in Boston and production, education and community engagement in Haifa. 

 Socialize with us!

Press pack

Risks and challenges

Rememory is our 4th project and we have grown a lot (and grown up :) ) since we started. 
Today we manage all our fulfillment and shipping with the most amazing and qualified partners out of a warehouse in Boston. The packs are shipped with express deliveries worldwide and tracking codes assigned to all packages for ease of delivery. We promise to have the packs sent by the date we specify and since this is a fairly light and small package we can pretty much assure that every backer will get their package on the date they were promised. Easy.

story:
HiCan is a contemporary and technological cocoon, a private sanctuary where you can enjoy a new concept of lifestyle and comfort. A perfect blend of design and technology to make life experience more authentic. 

 

Back in 2008 we set the concept for a new category of bed, being HiCan truly the world first smart bed ever conceived. We realized it´s become the most loved bed in the industry.

However the high price has made it accessible only to a few customers around the world. That is the real reason why we are here, because we really want to focus on consumer technology for everyone. Any meaningful innovation is going to be an every-person's technology.

To do this we need the support of all who believe in our mission. We believe that crowd-funding is a powerful democratic tool capable of pushing forward innovation from the bottom, so the best way to promote our project aimed to change the furniture industry.

There are actually two things required in order for a new technology to be affordable to the mass market: first of all you must have economies of scale; secondly you have to iterate on the design, you must go through a few versions. Tesla business case is a clear evidence of this. When we created the first HiCan almost a decade ago our ambition was the same as it is today: to accelerate the advent of smart furniture for everyday living as soon as possible. When the Iphone arrived in 2007, it changed everything. Smartphones were revolutionary because of the ways they allowed hardware, software and services to work in unison. We envisioned at that time a future in which furniture could interact with users . However our first product was going to be expensive no matter how it looked like, so we decided to invest in design and make it the best we could, as we thought it had the best chance of being successful and finance the development of further products made gradually available for the mass market. 

Electronics are now good and cheap, while software is more reliable and sophisticated. Their interplay is resulting in science-fiction-worthy ideas - we were promised long ago - becoming a reality. Keeping this in mind we have been working incredibly hard over a prototype for the past year to make a new HiCan that is much better in every way. The new HiCan has an improved design, uses innovative materials that guarantee a better engineering, allow for a greater flexibility in terms of hardware and deliver an even better experience. Still our main focus while approached the re-design of HiCan was having a tremendous focus on cost reduction, taking full advantage of technological advances. We were able to significantly reduce the cost compared to the first version, despite having greatly improved this version of the product. 

But we know we have a long road ahead of us to achieve our mission. For this reason the success of this campaign is essential and everyone's contribution who share the same vision is extremely important. 

 

For press inquiries please email: info@agenziacopyright.it . 

We like to remember some of the quotes of the first passionate ones who contacted us showing curiosity and enthusiasm about this project, representing a great source of motivation to make it a reality.

Starting using HiCan you realize that you've never experienced anything like this. Anything you want while resting in your bed it’s now possible; the technology behind the design lets your senses astonished within a theatre of emotions, being surrounded by pure high quality sounds and images. While enjoying the comfort of your bed, you can explore the outside world without leaving the privacy and warmth of your bedroom. Of course, you will also have a wonderful night of sleep, awakening renewed to start your day.

The bed is packed with following features: 

The user interface will be a native iOS and Android app, currently under development, along with the multi-platform web application usable with any smartphone or tablet and already functioning. It will include controls for light, automation, and audio-video components. Apple Watch will also be supported.

With the first HiCan we introduced a cultural revolution in the furniture industry, changing the relationship with technology in the interiors. 

However the automation system of the first version of HiCan was based on traditional home or building automation off-the-shelf discrete components, increasing the installation complexity and maintenance skill levels. The new version of HiCan instead is based on an advanced custom built electronic control unit, using technology at the root of what is now called “Internet of Things”. The controller’s logic is based on the very popular Raspberry Pi computer, enhanced with the professional Strato Pi board, and it can be easily extended with additional custom hardware and software features. HiCan will be the first integrated bed platform in history based on open source software and applications. All control software is based on Sfera, an innovative open source development framework, and the HiCan software itself will be open source as well and available to everybody to create new exciting features and ultimate personalization. Leveraging the immense choices of sensors and devices that are already available or will be introduced in the future, HiCan becomes a fully customizable platform, with potential for further innovation that goes beyond the wildest imagination.

The new HiCan represents the most advanced piece of furniture that has ever been conceived, being much more than a bed with an integrated entertainment system. It implements a fully developed, state-of-the-art automation system. All components are controlled via a simple integrated application, available on all smartphones, tablets and computers. Every aspect of the user experience can be tailored, with customizable scenes, to the owner’s preferences. 

Besides the app, HiCan can be controlled via wearable devices, like Apple Watch, and through three touch sensors, embedded in the headboard, that can be freely programmed to set the bed in various configurations. The system can be bi-directionally integrated with existing home or building automation systems using standard protocols, allowing control of other devices surrounding the bed (e.g. room lights and blinds, heating or air conditioning based on HiCan use scenarios), or control of the bed based on whole home scenarios (e.g. night mode, or guest welcome scenario in a hotel). 

HiCan’s control system is fully autonomous and works perfectly even when not connected to the Internet. But it can also share, based on user’s preferences, its configuration with other authorized beds. If the owner uses more beds in different locations, all beds can be configured to share all pre-sets and scenarios, so that moving from one bed to another the user experience will be exactly the same. The same concept can be implemented to HiCan beds in hotels, where the user could immediately replicate his or her own HiCan settings, being recognized by the same bed via smartphone or smart watch. 

Furthermore, similarly to how you receive updates to your smartphone, HiCan owners will receive updates to their bed remotely. The ability to receive these updates is free for the full life of the bed.

Materials: external structure made of Adamantx, coupled with internal wooden structure lacquered. Upholstery made of leather or textile according to client request.

What’s ADAMANTX?

Adamantx is an innovative material, which allows creating whatever shape, to perform unique designed objects and projects like HiCan. Adamantx is a composite material obtained from the processing of expanded coated with special resins, which provides great solidity and strength. This material born from years of studies, experimentations and technical applications in lab, it’s the Italian alternative to solid surface. 

It’s advantages:

VERSATILITY – HARDY – MONOLITHIC ASPECT – LIGHTNESS – WHASHABLE – FLAME RETARDANT – NO MASTER

Dimensions: L 228 - D 280 - H 208 cm

 

Among the additional features we want to develop for new version of HiCan, not yet available, and for this we need your support, there are :

Fueled by curiosity, we are an agile group of designers, creatives, engineers, architects, strategists, developers and storytellers focused on turning ideas into reality. We are craftsmen with a VISION working together to create meaningful innovation combining the best design, hardware, software and services at unprecedented level in the furniture sector.

 

 

We are looking to grow the team! Email us your background and why you think you would be a right fit at Hi-Interiors through info@hi-interiors.com.

 

 

We believe in being an open and transparent company. We are happy to meet and speak to our backers about our shared passion for design and technology. We are based in Milan, so please feel free to drop us a message if you're around!

Hi-Interiors was founded as a spin-off start-up in 2008. We were young outsiders in the design scene, born in Calabria and grown as professionals within the furniture family business.

We decided to be game changers and start from a “blank sheet” in order to better exploit the HiCan revolution. Intuition was that this product could ride the long-term trend of convergence between design and technology, defining a new path for innovation in furniture sector. In 2009, the first HiCan was presented at Milan's Design Week.

The same year Intesa Sanpaolo has featured us in its first Start-up’s Arena among the 14 most innovative Italian start-ups. We are proud to be the very first to take full advantage of the latest technology to redefine human interaction with their interiors.
 

We currently have a working prototype

and we're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering and industrial design of the final product ;
  • Developing the documentation (user manual, developer manual, etc.);
  • Designing packaging;
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the apps.

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Getting product certifications;
  • Developing health package (if stretch goal 1 is unlocked);
  • Developing voice control (if stretch goal 2 is unlocked).

 

 

Other Ways You Can Get Involved

Like what we're doing, but you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed.  Want to help?

Get our t-shirt and be an ambassador of our #dreamingfuture campaign in your community.

Please also consider passing on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing our community. Tag a dreamer who wants to change the world! 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product.
We can't do this without you...

HELP OUT BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS!

#HiCan #muchmorethanabed #dreamingfuture

                                                      

 

Risks and challenges

1. Manufacturing:

We have been working at this project for several months and already passed trough a few generations of prototypes. We believe the new HiCan is now ready for industrial production. We already have manufacturing in place, being almost entirely resolved the manufacturing and assembling of HiCan within our family owned woodworking industrial joinery facilities. Our design and technology partners are experienced professionals and we have been working with them for many years.

2. Testing & Safety Approval:

All our designs, materials, hardware and software products will undergo thorough testing and international regulatory safety standard approval before shipping.

3. Logistics:

No risk here really. Since we’ve done this before. We have a proven track record of delivering the first HiCan in the following countries: Canada, Russia, Saudi Arabia, UK, USA and UAE. Our manufacturing is in Italy and we will be shipping our beds from there. We want the shipping process to be as seamless as possible for our backers. For this we are working with highly experienced international logistic partners to help us mitigate any issues that may arise with our fulfilment obligations.

With all the above points in mind, we are mindful that unforeseen delays and challenges may arise, because we are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary walk-in smart device like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. If delays should occur, we will update you with our progress to finding a solution and keep any delays in dispatching orders to a minimum.


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What are the shipping costs?

All shipping in Italy is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.

What about sales tax / VAT and import duties?

You are responsible for paying any taxes and import duties, which apply in your country or state.Please enquire for a confirmed cost prior to ordering.

How much will it retail for?

Our current recommended retail price is € 36,000, as it appears in the reward level information boxes, showing our Indiegogo supporters are definitely getting the best deal by supporting us!

Am I going to receive an invoice for my HiCan reservation?

Your HiCan reservation payment is refundable. An invoice will therefore not be available until the reservation is converted into a confirmed order. However, we will send you an official confirmation of your reservation payment by email.

Can I cancel my HiCan reservation?

Yes, you can cancel at anytime by sending as a request by email at: info@hi-can.com. Refunds can take up to three weeks. The refund will be net of commissions paid to Indiegogo and to the payments system provider used by the platform (10%).

Can I test “drive” HiCan?

We are working to provide the opportunity to experience HiCan in several locations around the world once we begin production.

When is the soonest I can get my HiCan?

We have received an extraordinary number of reservations for the new HiCan. Production is scheduled to begin at the end of April 2017. At this time, the delivery estimate for new reservations is mid 2017 or later, depending on country of delivery. Our goal is to have the shipment out to you earlier but we have seen some of the challenges of others, and we want to make sure not to overpromise. In case we reach any of the stretch goals, the development of the additional features will probably delay the shipping to late 2017. This we promise: we are working around the clock to bring this to market. 

Can I choose what colour I want for my HiCan?

Yes, we are currently selling custom built versions of HiCan. Each bed is built to order. We have selected a number of finishes that enhance the iconic design of HiCan and make it easy to contextualize it in your interiors. As soon as we receive your pre-order we will send you the sample materials on the basis of your preferences in order to let you choose the ones that best interpret your personal taste. We can also reproduce any color of RAL (or NCS) Pallete for external finishes.

Will HiCan work with Windows, Android and/or iOS?

We are designing HiCan so that it will work with any web-enabled device, with extra features to enhance the experience in our native app. Prior to launch; we are developing for iOS and Android. HiCan will also be accessible through a mobile-friendly and tablet-friendly web app, which can be accessed on any web-enabled device.

Can I use multiple devices with my HiCan?

Yes. The app is free and a single HiCan can be connected to multiple devices (smartphones or tablets). For instance, if there are two people in the bed, they both can be primary users on their device(s).

Will the bed sync with smart Internet of Things (IoT) devices?

The new version of HiCan is not based on traditional home or building automation components, but uses technology at the root of what is now called IoT. The controller’s logic is based on the very popular Raspberry Pi computer, enhanced with the professional Strato Pi board. HiCan will also be the first integrated bed platform based on open source software and applications. Leveraging the immense choices of sensors and devices that are already available or will be introduced in the future, HiCan becomes a fully customizable platform, with potential for further innovation that goes beyond the wildest imagination. We want the Indiegogo community to make suggestions as to how we integrate our bed with other 3rd party hardware such as: home thermostats, lights, curtains, door locks and home safety and security alarms.

Can I become a distributor?

We are happy to discuss partnerships further after we complete our Indiegogo campaign and production begins. Hi-Interiors is considering offering exclusive distribution rights for specific countries and regions. These distributors will provide sales and servicing support to HiCan customers in their specific territory, as well as offer demonstration for prospective customers.  Exclusive distribution rights may be offered after the initial trial distribution period.

Can I make money with HiCan?

There are many ways in which you can potentially profit from owning a HiCan due to its unique nature and mass appeal. Like us, you can perform media demonstrations, attend shows and events, gain corporate sponsorship, and even lease your bed out for film and commercial work. We can help provide you with some of these opportunities. Soon, we expect to see HiCan Rental operations pop up throughout the world. This may provide a good source of revenue from owning one bed for commercial purposes.

What more can you tell me about HiCan?

It’s going to be awesome. We’ll continue to share more about the new HiCan with you over the coming months, as we get closer to production. Stay tuned!

I’m a journalist and have questions, who do I contact?

We’d love to help answer all of your questions. Please contact our press office at: info@agenziacopyright.it .
