We will soon begin the process of:

Getting product certifications;
Developing health package (if stretch goal 1 is unlocked);
Developing voice control (if stretch goal 2 is unlocked).

 

 
Other Ways You Can Get Involved
Like what we're doing, but you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed.  Want to help?
Get our t-shirt and be an ambassador of our #dreamingfuture campaign in your community.

Please also consider passing on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing our community. Tag a dreamer who wants to change the world! 
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product.We can't do this without you...
HELP OUT BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS!
#HiCan #muchmorethanabed #dreamingfuture

                                                      

 
Risks and challenges
1. Manufacturing: 
We have been working at this project for several months and already passed trough a few generations of prototypes. We believe the new HiCan is now ready for industrial production. We already have manufacturing in place, being almost entirely resolved the manufacturing and assembling of HiCan within our family owned woodworking industrial joinery facilities. Our design and technology partners are experienced professionals and we have been working with them for many years.
2. Testing & Safety Approval: 
All our designs, materials, hardware and software products will undergo thorough testing and international regulatory safety standard approval before shipping.
3. Logistics: 
No risk here really. Since we’ve done this before. We have a proven track record of delivering the first HiCan in the following countries: Canada, Russia, Saudi Arabia, UK, USA and UAE. Our manufacturing is in Italy and we will be shipping our beds from there. We want the shipping process to be as seamless as possible for our backers. For this we are working with highly experienced international logistic partners to help us mitigate any issues that may arise with our fulfilment obligations.
With all the above points in mind, we are mindful that unforeseen delays and challenges may arise, because we are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary walk-in smart device like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. If delays should occur, we will update you with our progress to finding a solution and keep any delays in dispatching orders to a minimum.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


What are the shipping costs?
All shipping in Italy is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.
What about sales tax / VAT and import duties?
You are responsible for paying any taxes and import duties, which apply in your country or state.Please enquire for a confirmed cost prior to ordering.
How much will it retail for?
Our current recommended retail price is € 36,000, as it appears in the reward level information boxes, showing our Indiegogo supporters are definitely getting the best deal by supporting us!
Am I going to receive an invoice for my HiCan reservation?
Your HiCan reservation payment is refundable. An invoice will therefore not be available until the reservation is converted into a confirmed order. However, we will send you an official confirmation of your reservation payment by email.
Can I cancel my HiCan reservation?
Yes, you can cancel at anytime by sending as a request by email at: info@hi-can.com. Refunds can take up to three weeks. The refund will be net of commissions paid to Indiegogo and to the payments system provider used by the platform (10%).
Can I test “drive” HiCan?
We are working to provide the opportunity to experience HiCan in several locations around the world once we begin production.
When is the soonest I can get my HiCan?
We have received an extraordinary number of reservations for the new HiCan. Production is scheduled to begin at the end of April 2017. At this time, the delivery estimate for new reservations is mid 2017 or later, depending on country of delivery. Our goal is to have the shipment out to you earlier but we have seen some of the challenges of others, and we want to make sure not to overpromise. In case we reach any of the stretch goals, the development of the additional features will probably delay the shipping to late 2017. This we promise: we are working around the clock to bring this to market. 
Can I choose what colour I want for my HiCan?
Yes, we are currently selling custom built versions of HiCan. Each bed is built to order. We have selected a number of finishes that enhance the iconic design of HiCan and make it easy to contextualize it in your interiors. As soon as we receive your pre-order we will send you the sample materials on the basis of your preferences in order to let you choose the ones that best interpret your personal taste. We can also reproduce any color of RAL (or NCS) Pallete for external finishes.
Will HiCan work with Windows, Android and/or iOS? 
We are designing HiCan so that it will work with any web-enabled device, with extra features to enhance the experience in our native app. Prior to launch; we are developing for iOS and Android. HiCan will also be accessible through a mobile-friendly and tablet-friendly web app, which can be accessed on any web-enabled device.
Can I use multiple devices with my HiCan?
Yes. The app is free and a single HiCan can be connected to multiple devices (smartphones or tablets). For instance, if there are two people in the bed, they both can be primary users on their device(s).
Will the bed sync with smart Internet of Things (IoT) devices?
The new version of HiCan is not based on traditional home or building automation components, but uses technology at the root of what is now called IoT. The controller’s logic is based on the very popular Raspberry Pi computer, enhanced with the professional Strato Pi board. HiCan will also be the first integrated bed platform based on open source software and applications. Leveraging the immense choices of sensors and devices that are already available or will be introduced in the future, HiCan becomes a fully customizable platform, with potential for further innovation that goes beyond the wildest imagination. We want the Indiegogo community to make suggestions as to how we integrate our bed with other 3rd party hardware such as: home thermostats, lights, curtains, door locks and home safety and security alarms.
Can I become a distributor?
We are happy to discuss partnerships further after we complete our Indiegogo campaign and production begins. Hi-Interiors is considering offering exclusive distribution rights for specific countries and regions. These distributors will provide sales and servicing support to HiCan customers in their specific territory, as well as offer demonstration for prospective customers.  Exclusive distribution rights may be offered after the initial trial distribution period.
Can I make money with HiCan?
There are many ways in which you can potentially profit from owning a HiCan due to its unique nature and mass appeal. Like us, you can perform media demonstrations, attend shows and events, gain corporate sponsorship, and even lease your bed out for film and commercial work. We can help provide you with some of these opportunities. Soon, we expect to see HiCan Rental operations pop up throughout the world. This may provide a good source of revenue from owning one bed for commercial purposes.
What more can you tell me about HiCan?
It’s going to be awesome. We’ll continue to share more about the new HiCan with you over the coming months, as we get closer to production. Stay tuned!
I’m a journalist and have questions, who do I contact?
We’d love to help answer all of your questions. Please contact our press office at: info@agenziacopyright.it .

story:
Even though we have achieved our original goal, our mission is not nearly over yet. We have now introduced a new InDemand program with Indiegogo where you can continue to contribute to our campaign, so we can put more effort into the development and production of URI Light. We are committed to produce the best products we can, and we couldn't have done it without your generous support. Let's make URI comes true! 

Introducing URI   

The URI light collection are a series of unique LED bulbs with simple, soft and minimalist lines that create remarkable lighting effects. The word, “URI” refers to God’s light in Greek. Inspired by the spectacular of space and the beauty of planets, we want to bring the lighting source to a different level. 

LED light bulb is no longer old fashion. It can have a fashionable, glamorous outlook with its practical function, long life spanning and energy saving.These are quality products that we are proud of and will stand the test of time, and best fit with your home, office, restaurants or any interior projects. 

Our Design

URI led light bulb is made of acrylic glass sheets and led screw base. The light source is reflected from the bottom to the transparent acrylic glass and forming a remarkable lighting effect. We make good use of led technology, laser cut machining and traditional mortise and tenon skills to create our URI led bulb. 

We have 6 styles of URI led bulbs

  • Venus
  • Mars
  • Earth
  • Wave
  • Sun
  • Jupiter 

 

Our Process

Each bulb consists of 6 pieces of acrylic glass pieces and we have to assembly them all together. It is just like playing a 3D puzzle. Thus, we have to do the math correctly to make sure all the little pieces could fit with each other. We have tried several thickness of acrylic glass sheet on prototypes. 

Production started with a series of hand-drawn sketches. After the Ai drawing is done, it is loaded into a laser cutting machine and the part is cut from the acrylic glass sheet. The edges of the piece are then grinded and smoothed by hand. Afterwards, we brings the acrylic glass pieces back to our office and assembled by hand with care. 

We have spent 8 months to study the shape and form of each light bulb style, testing materials, developing 3D models, and sourcing the led base and laser cut workshops in local business. After tesing several laser cut workshops, we chose the ones with bigger machine and provision of acrylic glass sheet. Its long opening hours is very suitable for handling large production. For LED screw base, we selected Hong Kong based company, which has factory in Shenzhen. It has rich experience on led screw base production with CE safety certificate for worldwide export. We have tested their led parts and the light distribution was effective with no heat. We're happy to support and work closely with local business for sustainable production.  

Dimensions  

 

Light Bulb Features

Watts: 3W, equivalent to 25 Watt  

Voltage: 110V or 220V, worldwide applicable  

Life Hours: 15000 average hours  

Base Type: Standard E27 Medium Screw Base

Color Temperature: 2700K warm white 

Energy efficient and light weight  

Low heat 

Pendant Set Features

Aluminium lamp socket in Black color, UL listed 

2 meters round cord wire in Black color

Ceiling rose OR Plug in Black color / Ceiling rose size height 25 mm x diameter 68 mm / Plug for your country usage

Assembled and ready to be installed 

110V to 220V, worldwide applicable

weight approximately 0.2 kg 

Desk Lamp Set Feature

size: height 6.5cm x diameter 12cm

Aluminium lamp socket in Black color, UL listed  

2 meters round cord wire in Black color  

TOUCH on/off function 

attached with electrical plug Plug for your country usage

Assembled and ready to be installed  

110V to 220V, worldwide applicable

weight approximately 0.25 kg

Rewards # A3 Poster 

For backers choosing our hkd70 pledge, you will be receiving one of the below cool design poster in A3 size. 

How the funds be used?  

The funds will be used towards lamp production. Any additional funds will be used to develop more shapes of the URI bulbs. As we have already built a working prototype and have finished testing , thus the production and fulfilment stages of the project will move quite quickly. Your backing will be used to fund:  

  • LED screw bases  
  • Acrylic Glass sheets  
  • Laser cutting services, and assembly process 
  • Pendants assembly    
  • Packaging design and production  
  • Delivering cost  
  • Certifications required to offer internationally, UL / CE. etc.

We take pride in keeping our backers informed, and will regularly post updates on our development progress.

Delivery  

Once our campaign goal has been reached, we will immediately place the materials and process production. Our goal is to begin delivery in December 2016. The URI bulbs will manufacture in Hong Kong and ship directly to worldwide. We will ship through Hong Kong Post, a reliable courier in our local city. Once the order arrive on backer’s local country, it will be transmitted to their local courier. Backers can trace their order through Hong Kong Post’s online system (http://www.hongkongpost.hk/en/home/index.html).

About Our Team and Company   

NAP is a Hong Kong based design firm, founded in 2013 by Yat Ming and Stephanie. We have been doing lighting retail for 3 years, running an online shop and offering custom made service. We have worked with many residential, restaurants, office and boutique hotel projects in USA, UK, Europe and Indonesia. In 2016, we start to focus on product design and finally launch our own designed light bulb, URI lamp collection.

About Our Designer  

Our designer, Yat Ming believes that a great sustainable design makes a better life for us. He loves hand making furniture and trying different materials since he was 16. He studied local industrial school and learnt crafting skills and product designs. Also, he had worked on advertising and design industry for 10 years with rich experience on graphic design, product design, events and exhibition design. Ming is very proud of his URI collection and best represents our creativity. 

A Very Special Thanks To You!  

Heartfelt thanks to our good friend Tin Lok, whom help us to make a great video in this project. Thanks for doing the video editing and give URI a life! 

Also, a very big thank you to each backers. Our sincere thanks in advance for all your support! If you have a question, comment or inquiry regarding this project, please use send us a message. 

It would be great if you could share URI Bulb within your social networks, just click on the links below!  

Share on Facebook  

Share on Instagram

For media, distributors or retailers wishing additional information, please send an email to info@napmaker.com

Risks and challenges

We can’t foresee too many risks in the creation of URI led light bulbs. We have been testing the bulbs for 8 months and the technical problem has been solved. Besides, full collection of prototypes are on our hands. We have found reliable suppliers based in local city and they can handle large quantities production. We are confident that this project will be going very smoothly and deliver a great quality products to all the backers.

The main challenge this project will be faced with is hitting our deadline. We will keep our backers informed by publishing regular updates about our project. if you have any questions, feel free to ask and we’ll make sure we respond.

Press Release and Interviews 

[Article] URI collection @Design Milk (in English) 

[Article] URI collection @ Retail Design Blog (in English)

[Article] URI collection @ Design Wanted (in English)

[Article] URI collection @Core 77 (in English)  

[Article] URI collection @Design Inspiration (in English)  

[Article] URI collection @Isuta (in Japanese)

[Article] URI collection @SCMP (in English)  

[Article] URI team talking about the Kickstarter campaign and production details @Ming Po (in Cantonese)  

 [Article] Founder talks about the the Kickstarter campaign @HK01 (in Cantonese)  

[Video] Founder shares his story and application and preparation process of crowdfunding @NOW TV (in Cantonese)

F&Q

1.) Will URI light bulb work in my light fitting?

The URI led bulb works in all standard light fittings. It is in E27 screw base and is applicable on 110V or 220V. 
You can measure the width of your bulb holder. If it’s diameter is between 26mm to 27mm, then the URI bulb works well with your lamp fitting.

2.) How do I select my URI led bulb style and set?

we will send you a survey where you can select bulb style and set

3.) Is the voltage compatible with US, UK or Europe current?

Yes, it is fully compatible. Both of the bulb and the pendant set provide 110v-220v. It is workable in worldwide.

4.) Will you provide plug?

If you choose our desk base set, a plug will be included. 

If you choose our pendant there is option of ceiling rose or electrical plug. Once we reach our goal and the campaign ends, we will send you a survey where you can select any of them 
Ceiling rose size - height 25 mm x diameter 68 mm 
Electrical plug - Plug for your country usage

5.) is the sales tax or VAT included in my perks?

No. All item does not include any sales tax in perks

story:
Please help us grow the LastSwab community and reduce plastic in our oceans. Click on a button below and spread some love for the planet.

The tips of LastSwab also have the resilience to be cleaned thoroughly, enabling long-term use.    

LastSwab comes in several colors, so you can pick the one that fits you best. Standard LastSwab colors to the left and Make-up colors to the right:   

The different colors make it easy for you to organize your swabs in your home so they don’t get mixed up!  

1.5 billion cotton swabs are produced every single day and the average American uses 415 cotton swabs every year. In the UK damage is evident: For every 100 feet of beach there are 9 cotton swabs.  Let's make single-use cotton swabs a thing of the past! 

 

 

To create LastSwab, we tested dozens of prototypes – we wanted to get it just right. 

Both our two innovative designs feature a soft-feel tip. It is delicate enough to be suitable for sensitive body parts, and so precise that it’ll become a make-up essential. 

 

 

Paper, wood and hemp cotton swabs are bad too. The CO2 emissions from the production and transport of these single use cotton swabs can be avoided with LastSwab.

The case for LastSwab is made of a corn based plastic, and the packaging it comes in is made of eco-friendly cardboard. The real game changer is that the swab is designed to last for thousands of uses – and we really hope the one you buy from us will be the LAST Swab.  

 

LastSwab comes with a carry case so it's convenient to store and take with you on the go.

We have been through hundreds of iterations in order to find the right feel and look for LastSwab - and we're pretty sure we’ve nailed it. 

The Swab is made up of a stiff, compact nylon core with soft tips on each end, and is both aesthetically pleasant and functional.

 

Change your habits for the good of the planet in a fuss-free way. Buy LastSwab once, cross cotton swabs off your shopping list forever, and do your bit for the environment. Easy.    

 

 

We're a small team dedicated to creating sustainable alternatives to everyday products. About one and a half years ago we read that 550 billion cotton swabs are produced every year, many of which are polluting, spoiling and killing our oceans and beaches, this is why we created LastSwab.

Kåre Frandsen is trained as a cabinetmaker. He is our hands on, built-a-set-in-a-day, i-can-use-all-tools, cleaning expert, never negative, real prototype and photo expert designer.

Nicolas Aagaard has created industrial design for a number of years. He is our the-big-picture, this-can-be-scaled, rendering expert, excel and business shark designer.

Isabel Aagaard has a background in designing medical equipment. She is our safety-and-quality-first, GIF fanatic, cafe brewing, scissor cutout, eco collaborative designer.   

 

We have wanted to launch this product for a long time, but we had to get it just right. What you see now is the result of a lot of trial and error - leading up to today’s finished LastSwab. 

 

Don't hesitate! Write us a message or post a comment and we'll get back to you ASAP. 

 

 

 

 

Please help us grow the LastSwab community and reduce plastic in our oceans. Click on the button below and tag a friend, family or anyone else who cares about our planet! There Is No Planet B

Thanks for all the support IndieGoGo Backers, you will receive your LastSwab shortly. 
                                     
 
 
   
 
Please help us grow the LastSwab community and reduce plastic in our oceans. Click on a button below and spread some love for the planet.

Risks and challengesProduct Manufacturing •We’ve made lots of samples that we have had people test to ensure they are safe, suitable and practical.•We have chosen a trusted manufacture that comes recommend to us, we have an excellent communication with them and are going to be on site to ensure timely delivery and swiftly deal with any issues that might arise. Shipping •We will start sending LastSwab boxes out as soon as the first batch is done. We promise to be honest if any issues occurs that could impact the date of delivery. Please check this site for updates. •Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.Product Guarantee. •LastSwab has a two year warranty. Should you experience problems with the product, send it back to us.  We’ll happily recycle it and send you a new one for free.•Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Please spread the word by sharing our page with the links and help make single use cotton swabs a thing of the past.•There Is No Planet B

story:
Thanks to our supporters we successfully funded our first production run with your help!

We are now selling Venus Mats at:
www.VenusMatters.com
 
Get 10% off your first purchase by signing up for our newsletter.  
 
To your delight!
 

 

The Venus Mat: A simple idea, beautifully realized.

 

The Venus Mat is an absorbent, waterproof and washable mat that keep stains or wet-spots off the bed linens.

 

We've been perfecting this practical product for a few years and there's still nothing quite like it on the market.  But we're not counting humiliating hospital pads, over-the-top sex blankets or old towels...

Women deserve better so we created the Venus Mat.

No more wet spots.  No more stained sheets or mattresses.  No more worries traveling during your cycle. 

 

Who needs it?  

Venus Matters to women who are tired of the old, "out, out damn spot!" 

 

Venus Matters to new mothers who already have their hands full with leaky babies without all the extra laundry. 

Venus Matters to teenage girls who shouldn't have to worry about staining the sheets while taking on the responsibilities of becoming young women.

Venus Matters to perimenopausal women who tend to have night sweats and heavy flows —making sleep-time unnecessarily stressful and uncomfortable. 

Venus Matters to female ejaculators (estimated at up to 10% of women) who may be awash in shame about something their bodies do naturally.  

Venus Matters to women and men who just want to have more fun in bed —without the added mess

 

"The Venus Mat is just what I've been looking for!   I use it for diaper-free time with my 5-month-old, then throw it in the wash and use it for after-hours lovemaking sessions with my husband.  It folds up and is easy to travel with, plus it's beautiful—instant atmosphere,  anywhere.  From playtime at the park to playtime in the bedroom, I use it every day.  It's perfectly designed and delivered."

~Becca Fresco

 

 

                                                                   

 

The Details:

We've searched long and hard to find the best materials to make the Venus Mat safe, beautiful and responsibly produced.  That's why we're making it right here in the USA with fabrics guaranteed to meet or exceed safety standards.   Sure, we could have gone the cheap and easy route overseas but that's not in alignment with our integrity or our mission.  
 
We want to bring something beautiful into the world and do it right.

 

"There’s a sense of safety with the Venus Mat that allows us to be more intimate. We can have our attention on each other —not our bedding." 

~Erik Bryan Slavin and Michelle Palmer

 

                                                                               

 

 

The Impact:

Did you know many teenage girls consider menstruation an embarrassing, or worse, forbidden topic of conversation?  Or that some cultures prohibit women from cooking or even praying on their cycles?  Worldwide, billions of women still lack the necessary means to make sovereign choices about their bodies, and far too many are married as children or enslaved by the sex industry.  

 Once established, Venus Matters promises to give 10% of our net profits to support women's reproductive health —and happiness— worldwide.     
                                                                              

 

 

"These soft and beautiful mats allow women to experience the most natural parts of our lives with care, with privacy, with ease, and with dignity. " 

 

                  ~Melissa Michaels, Ed.D., founder and director of Surfing The Creative®                           International, the first contemporary youth leadership rites of passage                           program rooted in dance.

 

                  

 

 

Go to www.venusmatters.com and say goodbye to worrying about the sheets!

story:
Perodo Bathroom Collection

People spend an average of 1,5 years of their lives in the bathroom. It may not be too much but long enough to spend it in an environment that is nice and unique-looking. An exclusive and distinctive bathroom does not have to cost a fortune anymore.

Perodo is a brand that offers  bathroom furnishing made of mahogany plywood that can be designed according to the customer’s preferences using different shades of wood varnishes and different methods of material treatment.


Perodo is a brand from the small European country of Estonia and the products are one of a kind in the world.

We designed and finished the first Perodo washbasin almost eight years ago and our first bathtub was manufactured five years ago. Since then we have been engaged in product development and in testing the durability of the product. Today we have reached a point where we are ableto start the production, developing new products and offering these to customers.

The Perodo sink have been tested in different conditions. A good example is a sink that has been in everyday use by travellers at the Estonian EXPO Center at Tallinn Airport for two years, and is still in mint condition. The attached video has been filmed at the airport.


Why is Perodo so special?

Many manufacturers offer wooden bathroom furnishing, however the quality of their products varies greatly and their prices are much more expensive than ours. At Perodo we make our products of plywood, and as such, we are one of a kind.

Operating in the European Union, we are obligated to follow strict technical and quality requirements in our work.Our products are handcrafted by trained professionals all the way to the final touch and post-production quality control.

We use waterproof mahagony plywood that we coat with a special high gloss varnish that is shock resistant and abrasion resistant. At Perodo we value highly the outstanding appearance of the product as well as its durability. We give a 2-year warranty on all of our products.  


Your Support

Up to this day Perodo has tested a number of solutions at their own expense. With the help of Indiegogo we wish to raise funds to procure the materials necessary for large volume production and to continue developing new products. Furthermore, we aim to take our products to many homes around the world. Raising the necessary capital and customer feedback on Indiegogo is of utmost importance to us.


FAQ:

Are the sinks heat and cold resistant? Yes. No damages due to extreme temperatures were detected during product testing.

Is it shock proof? Yes. Testing and everyday use of the product have shown that the high-gloss varnish we use is durable enough to withstand the shocks of falling drinking glasses, mirrors or smaller home appliances such as hair dryers, shavers, etc. The varnish can still be damaged if the sink itself is dropped during installation.

What is included? A washbasin ready to be installed, the drain valve and the cleaning kit are included in the current offer.

Is shipping included in the price? The prices shown here do not include transportation costs. The delivery is free for the supporters of the Indiegogo package.

Why should I buy the sink now rather than later on your homepage? The basins offered within the Indiegogo campaign are sold at cost price, thus you can be among the first to get yourself an exclusive product at a better price.


What Models Do You Offer?

We have started the production of standard basins that you can see in pictures and videos.

Over the next half a year we want to develop the entire product line of bathroom furnishings starting with shower cabins, shelves, mirror bases, and mosaic wall tiles and then continuing on with the production of bathtubs and with the development of toilet bowls. We have a vision that after one year we have at least four different basins and shower cabins in our product range and we plan to be capable of producing the furnishing items according to the customer's wishes and requirements.


Risks and Challenges

Shipping deadlines: there shouldn’t be any difficulties sourcing the materials, however, we accept the possibility of a short delay. Although we have looked into different options of delivering the finished products to our customers different reasons could prolong the transportation for a few weeks. We kindly ask you to take this into consideration.

Unsuitability of the pre-drilled holes: the basins have been developed taking into account the European standards and standards of larger countries. However, it may happen that the standard measurements of some regions’ pipes differ and that the holes needed for the basin or the drain are of another size. If you need the product with properties different from the specifications listed above, please let us know.

Defects: At Perodo we rely on very high standards and finish our products by hand. But there is always a small chance that there are deficiencies which reveal themselves later. Due to this, we offer a 2-year warranty during which we eliminate deficiencies related to the quality of our work. From then on, we offer a lifetime consulting warranty.

story:
Tara Dhatu – Realm of the Enlightened Feminine – is a non profit organization dedicated to uplifting and inspiring humanity through the sacred arts. Founded with the main intent to establish circles of dancers throughout the world, Tara Dhatu sponsors rituals and workshops of dance based on Tibetan Buddhist themes of awakened mind.

Since 1985, Tara Dhatu has traveled throughout the world sharing and teaching sacred dance, focusing on the Mandala Dance of the 21 Praises of Tara. This dance has been offered to many great Tibetan teachers with enthusiastic support, including His Holiness the Dalai Lama. The Tara Dance has been performed by thousands of women of all ages, nationalities, and walks of life.

The organization has offered annual retreats of the Divine Feminine for over 10 years, organized numerous pilgrimages of citizen diplomacy, and an array of Humanitarian Projects seeking to benefit Tibetans-in-exile as well as other groups in need. Tara Dhatu has grown to develop an array of materials available online as well as an Educational Program to support students and student teachers in the profound practices of Tibetan Buddhism. You may read more about Tara Dhatu’s work at www.taradhatu.org.

Amidst the clouds and the rolling hills of upcountry Maui, Tara Dhatu maintains a remote headquarters and residence for Prema Dasara, the Spiritual and Creative Director of the organization. When she is not traveling and teaching, she invites students to retreat on the property where she guides them in study and practice. She also uses her time at headquarters to develop materials for her students in meditation, ritual, prayer and sacred dance.

Because of it’s remote location, the property is “off the grid” supplying it’s own electrical power through solar collectors.  This solar system also supports the satellite internet service used to operate the day to day business of the non profit.  The system is quite out of date, and a recently crashed L-16 battery has left the system running on limited power. It is time to upgrade the system!

Because of the many improvements in the Solar Industry, all of the main components including interior lighting need to be replaced to support the new technology.  We have several excellent technicians who will help us, and we have set up this campaign to raise money to support this endeavor.  Any amount of support is greatly appreciated.  If one of our Donation Packages does not suit you, feel free to visit www.taradhatu.org and click the Donation link on the homepage.  We also have an array of products, Digital Downloads and donation options available in our Online Dharma Emporium. Visit shop.taradhatu.org to explore our Dance the Goddess Dharma Shop today!  


**Update - November 21, 2013**

Thanks to all of our early supporters for joining in our endeavor to manifest this solar system for Tara Ling Maui! Tara Dhatu has been involved in uplifting humanity through the sacred arts for over 30 years. It is through your generosity that we may continue the work of Tara Dhatu to benefit to all beings. Your donation will touch the lives of many!

A special thanks to Lena Grace for her $250 donation, and congratulations on receiving your Weekend Retreat Perk here at Tara Ling Maui.  We look forward to connecting with you and co-creating a magical experience together!

Another special thanks to a very generous Anonymous donation of $500! 
We have also received a generous donation of two used solar panels from a dear friend of the dharma community here on Maui.  We share so much joy and gratitude!
Our joy is YOUR joy!

Thank you all very much, and please share this campaign with your friends, family & community.

story:
Short Summary

Building off of RFID technology, Park Pass allows drivers to pay for their parking fees as they exit the parking garage. A scanning system detects when a car enters and exits, tracking the duration of parking time and charging the driver accordingly. Stopping to pay with cash, credit card, or spare change will be unnecessary. All you have to do is drive straight through the exit and be on your way! 

This system works with an RFID (radio frequency) tag or with an existing EZ Pass tag installed in member drivers' cars and with an on-site scanner at the garage. Our system will calculate the charge and remit funds electronically to the garage, allowing the driver to instantly drive out of the garage without waiting in a line to pay.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for funds to develop the backend software to connect the payment systems of various parking garages. Half the money will go to direct development while the other half will go towards marketing and implementation.

    The Impact

    Our business speeds up the parking payment process and gets us out of the confusing maze that is a parking garage sooner. By allowing drivers to pay as they pass through the parking exit, our business offers a convenient and efficient method to maximize what we can do in their limited time every day. With Park Pass, we can maximize time to do what is most important to us: spend time with their family and friends, relax, catch up on sleep. 

    Park Pass is also dedicated to conserving the environment. Reducing paper ticket waste and gas exhaust, we hope to make parking more eco-friendly and keep parking garages clean.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you're interested in technology or computer programming, let us know! We would love to learn more about your experience and what you could offer to our team. Your suggestions and feedback about our idea is invaluable to us, and we'd love to hear your thoughts!

story:
Pour la version française, cliquez ici


SilentKeys is a Plug'n'Play USB keyboard that protects you both off-line and on-line. Keep control over your privacy and safeguard your computer from viruses, snooping and hackers. Protect your keystrokes from key-loggers. Go anonymous at the push of a button. Encrypt your data and safeguard access to Paypal, Facebook, bank as well as all your on-line accounts and credentials.

 

 

 

 


The SilentKeys Bundle includes:

  • SilentKeys Secure Keyboard
    Choose your color : cosy White or Travel Black 
    Choose your layout : US, UK, FR, DE and ES 
  • Padded carry pouch
  • 16GB microSD card 
  • USB cord 
  • User Guide
  • Dice   


 


It also shouldn’t mean leaving your front door wide open. Would you share your bank passwords, your private mail or even your medical records with your neighbor, the postman or the government?

Right now, strangers are exploiting your political and religious beliefs, your desires, sympathies and convictions and even things about yourself that you aren’t yet aware of. Given enough data and time, your behavior might even be predicted.

Protecting your privacy is not about having something shady or nefarious to hide, it is simply about your private things not being anyone else’s business. We all need a place where we can go and be free of the judgmental eyes of other people.

Some imply that citizens and businesses who take measures to avoid tracking or surveillance are weird, guilty or paranoid. This logical fallacy impedes debate and implies that it is normal for government workers and corporation marketers to know everything about us, whether we like it or not. This line of thinking shows no regards for our individual freedom, national Constitutions and the UN's Human Rights Declaration, all cornerstones of free societies.

Did you know 700 million people across the world changed their on-line habits following the NSA revelations?

No one in their right minds would allow strangers to install cameras in their bedroom ; stop them from doing it in your computer.

 

Need to access a sensitive website without sharing your real location? Want to research or share personal and professional matters (medical, political, financial etc) without letting everyone know everything about them?

SAB is a safe anonymous browser based on the renowned Tor Network Browser. We strengthen it by enclosing it inside a locked software container called a Virtual Machine. Inspired by Satya's compartmented design, it shields your OS from numerous Web threats, encrypts its own traffic and protects your anonymity. 


 


Satya Desktop allows for an all-inclusive, secure and private session. Fully autonomous, loaded from scratch and ignoring your current OS and hard disks, it is protected from insecure computers, infected downloads and removable media.

By encrypting all its traffic and data, it protects your security and anonymity and lets you work, browse and relax in full privacy. 

 

 

SilentKeys features a convenient USB port for your mouse or flash drives and for modular hardware security upgrades : Two-Factor Authentication, One-Time Passwords, Password Management, Hardware Bitcoin Wallets, etc. 

Non-exhaustive list of potential devices : Yubikey, Nitrokey, OnlyKey, ChaosKey, fingerprint scanner, SmartCard HSM reader, OneRNG, FST-01, Trezor, LedgerWallet.



Keyloggers record everything you type. They can be either malware that infects your system or small hardware chips plugged or inserted inside your computer.

SilentKeys physically bypasses external and laptop keyboards and includes a buffer Hub chip to hinder hardware key-loggers. Additionally, by loading Satya, all software keyloggers hidden inside the default Operating System are unable to even load.


We love Open ; we are keen on transparency and we strive to make our products as universally-compatible as can be. Security through obscurity (patents, undisclosed code) we do not support nor believe in for security products.


Satya Desktop is derived from the Tails Operating system. Tails is considered by many IT professionals, from Ed Snowden to the Electronic Frontier Foundation, to be the one of the safest solution available for privacy protection. Satya is a Tails fork : this means it is based on the Tails Project source code with added ergonomics, guidance and custom features we've developed.

Satya Anonymous Browser is based on the Tor Browser and Linux powered by Virtualbox.


SK and Satya are the result of a full spectrum security approach to secure each link in the privacy chain : the hardware, the software and the network.

Securing all of them at once in one place means truly securing your communications, your local files, your private documents and pictures, your browsing habits, your e-shopping and banking as well as professional research, remote connections and sensitive informations. 

 

 

 


« This is a very interesting project, especially the Secure Updates switch. » 
Security Analyst, Gandi.net Web Hosting

« It's a fantastic concept, and one of the nicest looking keyboards I've seen in a long while. »
H.Havoc | Previous Magazine

« We do a lot of R&D and setting up secure file and communication exchange channels with remote manufacturers and contractors would be much simpler if they all just had a SilentKeys. »
P.A. Coquelin | CEO, Mac Lloyd Sport Tracking

« I like the idea of a separate secure bubble for when I need anonymity, security, or both. »
P.Ourdanov | Early-backer

« I experienced first-hand the damage keyloggers can do when  my ex used one on my computer and I wouldn't wish it on anyone. »
A.Montarguet | Early-backer

« I may be 62 and not very good with computers but I still value my privacy. I like SilentKeys because of easy foolproof-ness and that it's all in one. » D.Nelson | Retired Teacher and Fan

 


SilentKeys was born out of the pain of suffering credit card fraud during Iann’s travel in India in 2012. A keylogger on on a cyber-café computer cloned his credit card info which was then used by someone to make fraudulent purchases on the Web.

The financial loss, the administrative and banking hassle and the delays in getting a replacement card delivered almost ruined his travel.

After returning home, the idea of combining a keyboard and OS to protect against hardware and software keylogging was tested out, initially with travellers and backpackers in mind. This is why the first two prototypes were made using off-the-shelf flexible silicon keyboards, so that they could be rolled up and tucked in a bag.


However it quickly became apparent that flexible keyboards while seemingly cool just aren’t great for typing. We tested overcoming some of the issues by trying to encase it in a hard shell but ergonomics and typing comfort were still unsatisfactory. After that we left the flexible path and focused on designing a real and proper keyboard that could be both portable and used all day. The initial result was promising. After two more iterations we settled on the final design, the one you’ll be getting by backing us.


 

We're Preevio. We design privacy projects that are open, legal and easy as the simple act of closing curtains or shutting doors. We focus our efforts on helping people safeguard their computers and defend themselves against today's security and privacy issues : mass surveillance, data and identity theft, commercial profiling, insecure OS-es and malicious software.

From our technical point of view we believe the answer lies first in education, then in cryptography, decentralized networks and open hardware.

Wary of the ongoing centralization and privacy-deprivation trend led by Big Data companies, we strive to both raise public awareness and design people-friendly safe havens .

We now live in a post-Snowden world, we've been warned : no one will protect our data for us. It’s not about having anything to hide, it’s about our privacy not being anyone else’s business.

Short Co-founders bio

Iann De Maria - CEO. Following network and system management studies he started his career as systems administrator and level 2 user support on NT4 & Win2000 in a training center back in 2001. His career gave him much insight into the endpoint and the sometime surreal relationships users have with it! Iann has worked for various groups including Philips-NXP, GDF-Suez, LVMH, Jones Lang Lasalle and a government agency.

Romain Pironneau - CTO. Programming is the family-business and he was the local computer wizard: his first real job was installing a full cyber-cafe at the age of 14. The biggest projects Romain has participated in have been working on a large videosecurity product and totally redesigning and rebuilding all the software solutions for an outdoor smart multimedia kiosk system, ViaDirect, as development team leader.
story_txt:
Pour la version française, cliquez ici






SilentKeys is a Plug'n'Play USB keyboard that protects you both off-line and on-line. Keep control over your privacy and safeguard your computer from viruses, snooping and hackers. Protect your keystrokes from key-loggers. Go anonymous at the push of a button. Encrypt your data and safeguard access to Paypal, Facebook, bank as well as all your on-line accounts and credentials. 





 










 





 





 





 The SilentKeys Bundle includes:

SilentKeys Secure Keyboard Choose your color : cosy White or Travel Black Choose your layout : US, UK, FR, DE and ES 
Padded carry pouch
16GB microSD card 
USB cord 
User Guide
Dice   












 






It also shouldn’t mean leaving your front door wide open. Would you share your bank passwords, your private mail or even your medical records with your neighbor, the postman or the government?
Right now, strangers are exploiting your political and religious beliefs, your desires, sympathies and convictions and even things about yourself that you aren’t yet aware of. Given enough data and time, your behavior might even be predicted.
Protecting your privacy is not about having something shady or nefarious to hide, it is simply about your private things not being anyone else’s business. We all need a place where we can go and be free of the judgmental eyes of other people.
Some imply that citizens and businesses who take measures to avoid tracking or surveillance are weird, guilty or paranoid. This logical fallacy impedes debate and implies that it is normal for government workers and corporation marketers to know everything about us, whether we like it or not. This line of thinking shows no regards for our individual freedom, national Constitutions and the UN's Human Rights Declaration, all cornerstones of free societies.
Did you know 700 million people across the world changed their on-line habits following the NSA revelations?
No one in their right minds would allow strangers to install cameras in their bedroom ; stop them from doing it in your computer.





 





Need to access a sensitive website without sharing your real location? Want to research or share personal and professional matters (medical, political, financial etc) without letting everyone know everything about them?
SAB is a safe anonymous browser based on the renowned Tor Network Browser. We strengthen it by enclosing it inside a locked software container called a Virtual Machine. Inspired by Satya's compartmented design, it shields your OS from numerous Web threats, encrypts its own traffic and protects your anonymity. 






 






Satya Desktop allows for an all-inclusive, secure and private session. Fully autonomous, loaded from scratch and ignoring your current OS and hard disks, it is protected from insecure computers, infected downloads and removable media.
By encrypting all its traffic and data, it protects your security and anonymity and lets you work, browse and relax in full privacy. 





 





 



SilentKeys features a convenient USB port for your mouse or flash drives and for modular hardware security upgrades : Two-Factor Authentication, One-Time Passwords, Password Management, Hardware Bitcoin Wallets, etc. 
Non-exhaustive list of potential devices : Yubikey, Nitrokey, OnlyKey, ChaosKey, fingerprint scanner, SmartCard HSM reader, OneRNG, FST-01, Trezor, LedgerWallet.







Keyloggers record everything you type. They can be either malware that infects your system or small hardware chips plugged or inserted inside your computer.
SilentKeys physically bypasses external and laptop keyboards and includes a buffer Hub chip to hinder hardware key-loggers. Additionally, by loading Satya, all software keyloggers hidden inside the default Operating System are unable to even load.

Final design

Prototype assembly and testing

story:
Elicto Anys Dual Action Vacuum Spin Mop

This two-in-one vacuum and spin mop removes dirt and liquids from any flat surface within your home.  If you have hard floors, then mopping and vacuuming are a necessity. Mopping gets rid of spills, grease, sticky buildups, hard dirt, and grime, while vacuuming gets rid of dust, hair, and other small particles. You can’t choose one over the other.

 

Elicto Anys uses powerful cleaning action and to get rid of this pointless hassle, and cut your cleaning time in half.

 



 

Elicto Anys is the last all-in-one map and vacuum floor cleaner you’ll ever need to buy. The powerful 600-watt cyclone can remove even the most difficult buildup from your floors and corners, and at 5.1kg (11.2 lbs.), the Elicto Anys is easy to transport between rooms and floors, even if lifting is required. It also has a set of wheels for easy transport on flat surfaces.

It can perform single functions, so you can use the spin mop without using the vacuum, and the filter – made to last several years between replacements – can also be removed for easy cleaning as needed. 


Equipped with wheel and swivel system, simply tilt on the wheels for easy navigation.

 

Check if the rotary plate and mopping are attached.
No need to spend money on buying new mop replacement attachments.
Simply pop this one in the washing machine and it will come out like new!

 

Removable HEPA filter and housing case makes cleaning your Elicto Anys very simple.
Simple remove and wash out with water.

 

Multi-tasking has never been easier with the Elicto Anys.
The Auto Shut Off technology will detect when the vacuum is not in use and will shut off automatically.

 

With a 28 foot cord length you can take your Elicto Anys anywhere in your home.
Simple wrap around the handle vertically for easy clean up.

 

Adjustable height makes Elicto Anys comfortable to use for people that are tall and short and everyone in between.

 

 


 

Wooden Floor / Clay & Ceramic Floors / Brick Floor
Flagstone & Bluestone Floors / Terrazo Floor / Soapstone Floor

 

 

 

 


Elicto Company is raising $5000 to fund the first production run of the Elicto Anys . The product been fully tested and had several user trials to examine the effectiveness of the spin mop and vacuum system. We are confident we have the perfect product.

Help your friends and family cut their floor-cleaning routine in half and have more time to spend doing the things they love! Share the campaign on your social media using our share tools, or drop our campaign link in an email and send it to anyone who would be ecstatic to have their own Elicto Anys.

story:
Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Pinterest | YouTube | hello@dingproducts.com | Press Kit

We’re making a simple, beautiful, smart doorbell that’s perfect for your modern home and makes your life easier.

Our smart doorbell is made up of three parts, a subtle doorbell button that sits near your door, an elegant doorbell chime that sits in the home and a free app for your smartphone. 

When a visitor presses the button, the chime 'dings' in your home, but it also connects to the Ding app on your smartphone, allowing you to talk with the person at your front door from wherever you are in the world.

 

At the moment there are either “dumb doorbells” that come with your house or are bought in a rush from a hardware store or “video doorbells” that are driven by technology, offering you more features than you could ever use.

At Ding we want to give your doorbell some love and also think about what more it can do for you. We believe that you need a doorbell to be:

  • beautiful, because you’ve already spent a month picking out paint colours. 
  • simple, that doesn’t need a lengthy user manual to setup or use. 
  • smart, because the rest of your life is already on your phone.  

  

We think that smart doorbells should look small, beautiful and contemporary to suit your modern home, so we made our Button and Chime as elegant as possible.  

 

The Button is as small and simple with a choice of colours and it's slender enough to fit on your doorframe. The Chime is a fabric covered speaker with a choice of textiles, that can either sit on a shelf or be mounted on the wall. 

 

We are making Ding in a CHARCOAL colour scheme which is subtle enough to suit most doors and interiors, as well as a BRASS DING *LIMITED EDITION*!

 

Use the Ding app to receive calls straight from your front door, keep track of all your visitors and also silence the interior chime when you need some quiet time in your home. 

 

 

 

 

Rather than trying to make it an all-in-one security cam, smart lock and motion sensor we want to provide simple, effective communication.

The Button connects to the Chime using DECT, the same technology found in cordless telephones. This provides an HD audio connection from the outside of your house to the inside. It has a great range indoors of 40m and is excellent at getting through the walls of your home. 

The Chime talks to your home router using WiFi, the quickest and easiest way to connect your doorbell to the internet.

The Button can be battery powered or hard wired to suit your home it has 3600 minutes of call time from one charge. This should last the average household 6 months with one caller each day from one charge. We recommend that you hardwire the button, but Ding will remind you when your Button needs charging if you choose battery power. 

 

  • Attach the Ding button to you door.
  • Place the chime anywhere inside your home.
  • Pair the chime to your WiFi...then you're ready to go!

Smart on the inside. Ding is a two part system meaning that unlike other smart doorbells, if someone steals your button they won't have access to your network.

It's good to talk. Ding gives you anonymity allowing you to choose how you answer the door, if you want to at all.

Stay in control. Ding doesn't control the locks in your house, so there's no fear of opening up your home to strangers.

 

John Nussey is a technologist, a proud early adopter of the Arduino prototyping platform and author of ‘Arduino For Dummies’.

Avril O'Neil is a designer and has taught design at a variety of universities, including Goldsmiths and Central Saint Martins.

We've been together for over 10 years working on many design and research projects, from prototyping secret products for entrepreneurs to building interactive installations for artists and museums.

To turn our idea into a product we've grown the team bringing together talented designers, engineers, technologists, developers, marketers and business advisors.

 

 

 

Ding was an idea that we had in the back of our minds for a long time – to design a doorbell that suited contemporary homes.

We were working as design consultants so rarely had time to develop our own concepts into something real. Until an opportunity came along that was perfect, the Design Council Spark!  

Over the following 4 months we set about defining exactly what Ding was and how we were going to make it. We went through dozens of prototypes to see what worked, found out what people liked and tested the user experience in the real world.

The Design Council saw promise in our idea, awarding us with funding and named us their most innovative product. We used this funding to further develop Ding with award winning product designers at Map Project Office.

With Map we focused on making Ding simple and beautiful, considering what would make a good button, where the chime would live in the home and how to make it suit modern homes. There were lots of prototypes!

We got married and fresh off our honeymoon we entered another accelerator called JLAB. This gave us the opportunity to work with leading UK retailer John Lewis. Here we've received amazing insight into the retail world and are still working with their buying team to launch Ding after Kickstarter.

To make sure we're getting it right we've been constantly getting feedback. Talking to early adopters at The Gadget Show Live, Kickstarter super backers at London Design Festival and meeting with interior design bloggers. 

 

We've now reached a point where we're really proud to show you Ding. We've assigned our manufacturing partner and are eager to take Ding into production. We’re huge fans of Kickstarter and and IndieGoGo and are really excited to have you join us on our journey.

We started Ding with the simple idea of re-thinking the doorbell. Once we have our smart doorbell in people's homes we have plans to apply the same thinking to other forgotten products.

At Ding we believe that anything is possible with technology, but our real challenge is to figure out what people really want from their smart products so that they integrate seamlessly into our lives. 

 

 

Follow our progress on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest! You can also subscribe to our newsletter on our website. 

 

For any enquiries please Email us directly at hello@dingproducts.com  

A huge thank you to everyone who has supported us throughout our Ding journey so far! We feel so lucky to have so many wonderful family and friends who have offered their time, words of wisdom and skills to help make Ding what it is. We couldn't have done this without you! 

 

 

Shipping rates will vary country to country so please select the drop down menu for your chosen reward. We can ship to most countries throughout the world. We are working with a fulfilment company to make shipping as simple as possible but please be aware that you will be responsible for any charges or taxes that apply to your area.

UK $10 USD/£8 GBP. EU,US and Canada $20 USD/€16 EUR. AUS,NZ,JP $30 USD.

We feel so blessed to have found each other, and even more so to have the love and support of so many at this time in our lives. With your contribution it will help us pay for our wedding expenses. Every contribution is a blessing and we are eternally grateful for each one. We understand not everyone can contribute however we are very thankful for all your love and support. We’re so happy to have you as part of this moment and look forward to seeing you on August 2, 2014!

Love,

Jess & Gil

story:
When kittens are in need, heroes from around the furry fandom HOP into action!

Pocari Roo Saves the Kitties!

ArtworkTee and Pocari Roo are teaming up to supporting a charity in NYC that helps care for sick kitties, and find them good, loving homes - Flatbush Cats! Did you know that there are over 500,000 street cats in New York City? These sweet kitties don't usually get the medical care they need when living on the street - Flatbush provides a safe, comforting environment for them to get treatment and recover, before being found a happy home, or being neutered and returned to where they were found.  

You can learn more about Flatbush's mission in this short video: 

We wanted to help out this great organization, and we thought, why not make an adorable "beanie baby" style plush of Pocari Roo for you to take home? Inspired by the immense support of our previous fundraiser, all proceeds after costs (like making the plushies, shipping, etc) go to help Flatbush Cats with their important mission. 

About the Charity

Flatbush Cats is a TNR-focused cat rescue organization focused on reducing and managing the outdoor cat population in Brooklyn - the rescue is run by a team of volunteers, who work tirelessly to help save the lives of as many kitties as they can. This includes cats that are sick or injured - Flatbush helps these kitties get well and find new homes.

Flatbush has the following areas of focus for their outreach:

  • Cat rescue and medical care
  • Finding cats forever homes through adoption
  • Trap, neuter + return (TNR) assistance
  • Free or low cost cat spay/neuter for low income residents
  • TNR training and mentoring
  • Community food bank for colony caretakers who actively practice TNR

  • Rescue and fostering support

As a small, community-focused organization, your donation makes a huge difference. Food, medical care, milk, and other expenses add up quick, even for a small rescue. With your help, Flatbush can rescue more cats and help them get well. You can learn more about the charity by visiting their website: https://www.flatbushcats.org 

Find and follow them on social media too - they post so many pictures of cute kitties! Check them out on Instagram and Facebook.

About Pocari Roo

Pocari Roo is a YouTuber, fursuit maker, and artist from down under in Australia - and loves plushies! 

Pocari is passionate about cat rescue and suggested Flatbush as the charity to support - we thought, what better way to raise money for this good cause than a plush of Pocari Roo?

(Why does he get to ride around in a Bugatti?!)

We designed and created a beautiful, soft plush that is so cuddleable! Pocari tweaked the design until it was just right - and now it's available for you to get to support the charity.

The Rewards

Pocari Roo and ArtworkTee created some awesome rewards for you to get - with your donation, you can get any (or all) of these cool items:

Limited Edition Pocari Roo Plush ($30 plus shipping)

Plush is made of minky and stuffed with soft polyester. The size is 6 inches, or 15.25 cm. It's the perfect "beanie" size for taking with you everywhere you go!

(Sleepy kitty for scale)

 Exclusive Poster - Featuring artwork by Paco Panda ($15 plus shipping)

We are honored to get to work with Paco Panda, a very talented artist in the furry fandom to create this poster!  It's Pocari Roo hanging out in Central Park, NYC with a lot of cute kitties - The posters are approximately 11x17 inches for US orders, or A3 size for international orders (297 x 420 mm).

Pocari Pin - High quality black nickel and enamel ($12 plus shipping)

An adorable pin of Pocari Roo as a plush, designed by the blue sodaroo herself. It's 2 inches wide by 1.12 inches tall, and has two pins on the back for holding securely to your bag, hat, etc. The material is raised black nickel for the outline and backing, and hard enamel for the interior designs.

3 awesome tshirt designs - American Size S-6XL. High quality ArtworkTee.com tshirt, 100% cotton, Gildan softstyle tshirt, printed in the USA.

1. Roo Crew Design by Pocari Roo and Kiba Swiftpaw

2. Plush Crazy Design by Kiba Swiftpaw

3. Pocari Shirt Design by Ferwildir

We are so excited to make and ship these rewards to you!

 

Fundraising Goals

Our target for the fundraiser is 5,000 USD in donations. This enables them to buy food and supplies, medical care for sick kitties, and rescue even more cats. 

With this campaign, we are donating all profits to the charity, i.e. the amount raised minus the costs. These costs include things like card processing, fees which go to Indiegogo and Backerkit, and the costs to produce the rewards. We are keeping these costs as low as possible so that the maximum amount can be donated to Flatbush Cats.

The estimates in our graph are based on a quantity sold of approximately 75 bundles (as that was the most popular item for preorders).  The exact percentage will depend on a number of factors, such as number of units sold, the amount of stretch goals reached, and which items are sold vs others. The percentage could vary up or down by about 10% depending on these factors. The graph above does not include shipping, because of the large variation in shipping costs to different regions. Regardless, we will work tirelessly to keep costs as low as possible so that Flatbush gets all the help we can give. Whenever there is an opportunity, we will reduce costs without compromising quality.

(Picture above from the Flatbush Cats Facebook page).

 

Stretch Goals

As we raise more money for Flatbush Cats, your shipment will include even more great merch with designs by Pocari Roo and Paco Panda. The more we raise, the more rewards you get, so make sure to share the campaign with your friends!

For the stretch goals, depending on how many goals are reached, a number of small, fun items will be added to each order. For each milestone, an additional item is added, like a sticker or postcard. The more we raise, the more you get!

Sponsors

The campaign is being coordinated by ArtworkTee, a furry tshirt company.

ArtworkTee.com

This campaign would not be possible without our other amazing sponsors, including:

AwooNews.com

Paco Panda

Risks & Challenges

To help keep problems to a minimum, we have completed the design work and made sure that all potential rewards are ready even before starting the campaign. The team of 5+ people who work for ArtworkTee.com are ready and willing to meet challenges that happen during the production or shipping process.  One of the most important considerations is keeping costs as low as possible - our goal is to keep the total costs of rewards to approximately 23% of the total donation amount or less. If unforeseen circumstances arise, such as a much higher price than quoted for the printing by our third party supplier, it is possible that the cost of rewards may be higher. If that is the case, we will do everything we can to lower the costs.  

We have made our estimates based on approximately 75 bundles sold, and one risk/challenge is if a significantly lower or higher amount is sold. If a significantly lower amount (for example, 25 donations), then the cost per piece will be, unfortunately, higher than expected. If a significantly higher amount is sold, then even though it will result in much more money for Flatbush, it may take longer to fulfill the rewards, because of the small size of our team. If that is the case, we will bring on temporary workers and volunteers who can help package and ship the rewards to the donators.  Our team is highly skilled and experienced, having experience in inventory management and packaging from many years working at conventions. Whatever challenges arise, we will be able to overcome them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to make a donation, don't worry - you can still help by spreading the word about this fundraising campaign! Jump on your computer device like the blue roo above and share our link on Twitter, Facebook and other social media platforms, and encourage your friends to donate.  Here is the shortlink to share: https://igg.me/at/pocariplush

If you have Twitter, please retweet our announcement tweet to help spread the word! 

Thank you so much for reading, and thank you especially for your support! You can make a huge difference - Consider donating to support Flatbush Cats' amazing work!

story:
It's modular  

Choose the number of modules, from one to seven, and join them together in endless combinations. Direct the light where you want just rotating the modules with your hands. Shape D-TWELVE in unlimited forms, dimensions, orientations, materials and colours, according to your needs and taste: use a single or double lamp to brighten a table or build an amazing lighsculpture with seven modules!

 

 

 

It's versatile 

D-TWELVE is intended to be used in many ways: choose from the available add-ons and explore all the possible applications. Place D-TWELVE on the night table or fix it to the wall. Use more modules to brighten a room with a pendant lamp or create a chandelier for the living room.

 

 

 

It's customizable

To match your taste and your home style D-TWELVE is available in three different materials: beech wood, concrete and screen-printed fabric. Choose the one you like most or personalize your lamp mixing two or three materials together. Moreover you can choose from three textile cable colors: white, black and orange.

 

 

How does it work?

Magnetic technology

Each module is dodecahedron-shaped and has three magnetized sides that allow the connection between the modules and the passage of current from one to another. Thanks to this innovative solution just one of the modules needs to be connected to the power grid. The magnets' radial arrangement makes the modules snap-in rotatable so the light can be easily directed as one wishes. Indeed D-TWELVE is sized to perfectly fit in to one's hand and is completely safe to touch, due to the extra-low voltage current.

High energy efficiency and durability

With less than 5 watts per module D-TWELVE is a high energy efficient lamp and unlike many lamps on the market, the LED can be easily replaced just by opening the acrylic glass and unscrewing it (even if the estimated LED life is 50000 hours!). The light source used is a warm white (2700 k) high luminous flux LED Luxeon K, produced by Philips Lumiled. This is one of the most advanced LED due to its high lumen density  and its low energy consumption (345 lumen, less than 5 watts). When the lamp is turned on, the holes on the back ensure heat dissipation.

How is it made?

Top quality materials 

We meticulously check the quality of our supplies to offer a reliable and durable product. D-TWELVE is manufactured with top quality materials:

  • the wood we use is European Beech wood. After CNC cutting, it is assembled by hand and polished with a natural benzene-free hardwax-oil;
  • the concrete cover is provided by a team of engineers experts on ultra-thin concrete furniture;
  • the screen-printed fabric is designed by a textile design firm with more than ten years experience in fashion accessories production;
  • all the metal components are powder-coated to ensure white finishing durability over time;
  • the textile cables are supplied by a company with over thirty years of experience.

 

 

Add-ons

Transforming D-TWELVE in a wall lamp, a table lamp or a ceiling lamp is quick and easy. Just attach one of the add-ons to the lamp:

  • WALL LAMP ADD-ON: a powder-coated steel plate;
  • TABLE LAMP ADD-ON: a beech wood handmade tripod;
  • CEILING LAMP ADD-ON: a self-balancing suspension system made of stainless steel wires and powder coated steel parts.

 

 

What Basic-TWELVE is?

Basic-TWELVE is a handmade concrete lamp shade we created for our (basic) supporters! It is designed for standard-sized E14 (SES) lamp holders and, thanks to three magnetized sides, it can be used alone or in multiple items combinations. Unlike D-TWELVE each Basic-TWELVE module has its own cable.

 

 

How can you help us?

  • Back our kickstarter campaign 
  • Share D-TWELVE project 
  • Follow Plato Design on Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Twitter or Linkedin

 

Rewards

 

 

 

D-TWELVE specifications

  • Dimensions: approx. 5'' x 5'' (13 x 13 cm) 
  • Cover materials: wood (beechwood), screen-printed fabric or concrete 
  • Lamp core material: powder-coated metal 
  • Magnets: super strong neodymium magnets 
  • Light source: Luxeon K LED - approx. 4,5 w; brightness: 345 lm; light color temperature: 2700 K (warm white) 
  • Cables: white, black or orange textile 
  • Weight: wood 0.8 lb (350 g) / fabric 0.9 lb (400 g) / concrete 1.2 lb (550 g) 
  • Power supply: LED Power Supply 36W 12V 3A

 

Production and delivery schedule

We’ll ship in November 2016:

  • April 2016: kickstarter campaign 
  • May 2016: kickstarter campaign 
  • June 2016: final product refinement 
  • July 2016: final product testing 
  • August 2016: purchase of materials and components 
  • September 2016: production 
  • October 2016: production 
  • November 2016: packing and shipping

International backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees. 

 ---> Backers from Australia, China and New Zeland are asked to contact us before ordering!

 

 

Who we are:

Plato Design is a design startup based in Rome, Italy, founded by Alessandro Mattei and Caterina Naglieri, both architects. 
Alessandro and Caterina previously worked in several European cities dealing with construction industry, interior design and academic research. In 2015 they decided to return to their city Rome and start the new adventure of running their own business. The company was awarded the Regione Lazio Fund for Creativity for the D-TWELVE lamp project. 
At Plato Design things are invented, prototyped and handmade, merging clear design, technological innovation and unique handicraft.

Follow us on:

facebook

instagram

twitter

pinterest

linkedin

 
Special thanks to:

 

 

 

Press:

Download PRESS KIT here

 

 

    Risks & Challenges

    People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

    • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles
    • Describe your plan for solving these challenges

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign
    • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that's all there is to it.

As seen on:
 
"This lamp is unlike any you’ve seen before" (BRIT+CO)
"Their lamp D-Twelve [...] explores the modularity, the versatility and the customizable design of lighting" (FUBIZ)
"If you’re looking to light up your room with a beautiful LED lamp, the customizable D-TWELVE light may be just what you’re looking for " (INHABITAT)
"This fully customisable modular lamp fits the user's unique style" (DESIGN INDABA)
 What is D-TWELVE?  As design lovers we know how difficult is to personalize what designers have drawn for our home. Many times we face the difficulty of finding something unique and precious at the same time. D-TWELVE is an innovative LED lighting system created to suit your changing needs thanks to its magnetic connections. Reshape D-TWELVE every time you need it and change D-TWELVE appearance every time you want.

story:
Vermont Family Network is teaming up with The Windjammer for our First Annual Windjammer Kickball Tournament to Benefit Vermont Family Network.  Since this is the first time everyone is doing this, we would like to present the VFM with a helpful and encouraging amount of funding that is produced by this event.  At the event there will be a table where VFN will be collecting any donations that are made.  Let's go out with a bang and give them something they deserve!  Let us present them with funding that they will be able to use for our Vermont community and show them how much we appreciate the difference they make.

So if you can't be at the tournament in person, this is a great way to donate to the VFN, and Vermont will show them our support on the kickball field!  All donations contributed here and on the field will go directly to the Vermont Family Network. 

The tournament will take place Saturday & Sunday, August 25th & 26th at the Essex Tree Farm Recreational Fields. 

 

Vermont Family Network

Vermont Family Network (VFN) promotes better health, education and well-being for all children and families, with a focus on children and young adults with special needs.  

To learn more about the Vermont Family Netowrk go to their website:

http://www.vermontfamilynetwork.org/

To stay connected or become involved click here ---> http://www.vermontfamilynetwork.org/family-network/become-involved/

The tournament will take place Saturday & Sunday, August 25th & 26th at the Essex Tree Farm Recreational Fields.
