Vermont Family Network (VFN) promotes better health, education and well-being for all children and families, with a focus on children and young adults with special needs.  
To learn more about the Vermont Family Netowrk go to their website:
http://www.vermontfamilynetwork.org/
To stay connected or become involved click here ---> http://www.vermontfamilynetwork.org/family-network/become-involved/

story:
Our mission is about empowering everyone to join the solar movement, with an easy-to-use method to choose solar as their energy source. This is accomplished with SunPort, the smartgrid solar delivery device.  Since our first crowdfunding campaign, we have passed many new milestones and we are excited about engaging with the IndieGoGo audience while retaining pre-order pricing. New milestones include:

•  ETL safety testing & certification

•  Beta app development

•  Field testing with 100+ members of our Dev Club

•  Case samples and colors finalized

•  QA process in place

•  Hardware upgrades so SunPort can handle up to 15A (not the original 10A)

•  IC certification so we can sell in Canada too (not limited to sales in the USA)

SunPort is about accelerating America’s shift to solar energy one plug at a time.  Each SunPort device allows its user to demand solar energy by simply plugging in, thus enabling every user to easily participate in crowdsourcing demand for solar, right through the exisiting power grid.  This is about playing a part in the Solar Movement.

SunPort uses real solar energy from certified solar farms. The power from an outlet can be from a myriad of different sources (coal, natural gas, nuclear, hydro, wind, solar, etc.) and the power itself provides no clue as to it's source.  In the 1990’s, America’s interest in using renewable energy was on the rise, so the renewable energy industry devised a way to separate renewable energy from the non-renewable kind. To do this, they created Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) which are tradable environmental commodities used to prove that one megawatt-hour (MWh) of electricity was generated by an eligible renewable energy resource and put into the power grid.  The solar-focused variety are called Solar Renewable Energy Certificates (S-RECs).  SunPort is basically a smart outlet adapter that allows you to take advantage of these S-REC's in an effortless way.  Once you plug it in, the device measures the electricity you take from your wall outlet, and automatically upgrades it to solar power by matching it to new solar added to the power grid, tracked using 3rd party certified S-RECs.

That’s the magic of it. Certified S-RECs represent an entire megawatt-hour of electricity (enough to power a typical US home for more than a month), so to make them more accessible to individuals, SunPort developed an ingenious way to break them up into tiny microcredits (called SunJoules) that you can use on a smaller scale.

When you plug in a SunPort, it measures exactly how much grid electricity is being used, retires a matching amount of SunJoules from the system and credits the SunPort’s owner with that amount of real solar use. It’s essentially a way to use solar energy in tiny nibbles, instead of purchasing whole megawatt-hour chunks, or installing your own solar panels.

So, when you use S-RECs, your money goes to a producer of solar power — even if it’s not the entity that directly provides electricity to your outlets. In this way, although the solar energy originates from solar panels, you don’t need to own them.  SunPort automatically demands solar for you, wherever and whenever you plug in.  No panels. No hassles. Instantly. Anywhere. Anytime. 



We are building a solar movement, not just a solar product. Our design has been influenced by these core beliefs:

> EASY TO USE - INTUITIVE PRODUCT.
SunPort is looks familiar and is so intuitive to use that it barely needs instructions.  What's more convenient or easier  than just plugging in, anywhere, anytime?

> MAKE A PERSONAL STATEMENT. 
When you plug-in with SunPort, you're making a statement about your conscious and conscientious choice. The SunPort is made for public use: coffee shops, airports, libraries, offices, dormitories... (of course using it in your home or apartment is fine too). It comes in four vivid colors (we have a low-key white one too, for you shy people) because we think it is important to make a splash for solar. We need to spread the message: "Solar is here. It's accessible. Get on board."

> ENGAGE. COLLABORATE. 
The SunPort communicates with the SunPort Phone App showing real time energy usage and how much you've upgraded to solar.  Like a fitness tracking app, you can connect and share with your social network, while also watching your impact and the collective result.  Challenge others with benchmarks and collaborate as you and your growing network become key parts of your local Solar Revolution. 

The SunPort Phone App is the central place for users to engage, learn & share.

Including features:

  • Instantaneous Power in Watts and SunJoules per device (animated)
  • Reload SunJoules
  • View how many solar panels are employed (animated)
  • View where the solar is coming from (animated)
  • View you and your community carbon footprint and impact




  • View daily, weekly, monthly and total usage (animated)
  • View total SunJoules used to help nonprofits
  • Check out the nonprofit projects you help support with SunJoule usage




  • Bluetooth enabled
  • Manage SunPorts in your home, office or anywhere


Not only do you create demand for more solar on the grid, your SunPort use helps fund nonprofit solar projects through a dollar-for-dollar match. Every dollar going to existing solar producers is matched by a dollar that helps build new solar panels for great causes. These projects are run through ReChoice, a non-profit organization we founded to give back through solar.

Choosing to use solar with SunPort is like buying organic food or fair trade coffee. You’re selecting a product with a higher level of scrutiny for where it comes from and how it is produced, because it matters to you. Your SunPort comes with unlimited solar for a whole year included in the price, so you can use it as much as you want.

For our planet and our future, we’d love to have you join us and become a part of the solar movement. SunPort lets anyone use solar, easily and affordably. The solar is real and the impact is powerful. If enough people demand solar, it will power an energy revolution. 

Video music ("Fish Delay" and "Massive") provided by INKY MUSIC

story:
What is PairLock?

"My Own Locksmith" had earned Germany's Red Dot Design in 2014. Two years were spent refining, testing, and improving the concept. Now, in 2016, it is officially released as "PairLock". The core value of PairLock is to offer higher security and simplify management, all while making it practical and applicable to any scenario.

2014 REDDOT AWARD      2016 IF AWARD

Why are we developing pairing lock?

Traditionally, carrying many locks around had been inconvenient. Losing keys, changing locks, and shared access proved to be quite hassling. This revolutionary design uses one key to unlock all locks using a blend of password functionality and standard key safety. On top of that, it's easy to manage and affordable.

 

 

 

FUNCTION

 

Key codes are changeable. Passcodes on Cylinder are also changeable.  Locks open when codes are the same. One to Many Concept: Change the digit wheels ( the combination) on OVIO Key, you can manage as many OVIO Locks as you want.

 

 

Digit Wheel: You can rota e the digit wheel to change the combination. Also, you can change the sequence of digit wheels. OVIO can customize the digit wheel to meet your unique safety requirement. If you are concerned about a standard 4 digit passcode offering not enough security, additional unique digit wheels will be available. 

 

 

Cylinder:  There are various forms of OVIO Locks utilize the OVIO Cylinder. Padlocks, Deadbolts and Door Locks. It comes with the passcode function to enhance the One Key For All application.

 

 

 

 Improving Your Renting Efficiency

  For anyone renting or sharing their space, the hassle of changing locks/keys is gone. Also, by having some digits of tenants’ passcodes in common, open space can be shared and individual room are not permitted.

 

 

Lost Key?– Be your own Key smith 

Unfortunately, you lost your key. You can have another OVIO Key to open your locks with your own combination of the digit wheels.

 

Avoid Power Off

Compare to the electrical locks on the market, OVIO provide you the worry-free solution. You don’t have to risk at any circumstance. Mechanical aesthetics has its merits.

 

Setup Passwords

 

 

 

 

Develop Flowchart

From the original design concept, OVIO has been re-engineering and modified for its best features as you’ve seen on the video. Now OVIO Keys, Cylinders and Padlocks are reaching its maturity and stable status. If we can collect enough funding to fulfill the machining/molding partners’ payment terms, instant production run will be on the way.

 

 

Time Line

talk in our forums
 
*Due to the size of a door latch has two major measurements, 2-3/4" and 2-3/8". Before you order your OVIO door lock, please specify your door fitting dimention.

story:
The Patented GlydeWrite Cleaning Shield is a new invention. It is a combination ultra microfiber screen cleaner and drawing shield. It allows you to draw on a tablet without experiencing "Palm Rejection". Each GlydeWrite comes with a High Quality fabric mesh Stylus.

Here's how it works:

• Clean & Polish your tablet screen

• Hook your Pinky in the loop

• Draw or Write without "palm rejection"

The GlydeWrite Cleaning Shield is an essential tool for creating art on an:

• iPad • Kindle • Nexus 7 • Surface • Xoom • Nook • Acer

When it came to the picking the screen cleaner quality is the #1 issue. After doing some research I chose Pristine Screens, a company in Colorado. They manufacture Ultra Premium Microfiber Screen Cleaners. You can use it to polish, then nicely slide your Glydewrite across the tablet screen.

The unit has a distinctive look. The top is a light weight laminated shield attached to a fuzzy adjustable loop. The bottom is a bright red ultra microfiber cleaner. It feels good on your pinky and helps you draw some nice art.

Dwight Howard was drawn in Sketch Club on an iPad using a fabric tip stylus and a GlydeWrite.

 


Backing is needed to pay for lawyers, production and advertising.

Once you draw with a GlydeWrite you won't put it down!

Help us get going!

story:
Let go of the noise of everyday life at home or work, and unleash your imagination while training your mind with LOGIFACES!

LOGIFACES is a set of 16 prisms, each with different top angles, hand-poured from concrete. There is only one rule to the game: Create a form by placing the prisms next to each other to form a continuous surface.

From here on, LOGIFACES can be a game for many situations:

  • A meditative tool: Tune out the noisy din of everyday life - finding the right solution focuses your attention and calms your thoughts

  • A creativity booster: Think of new forms and try to assemble them with a continuous surface.

  • A challenge for your logical thinking skills: Find the place for each prism in the equilateral triangle or any other given form - a challenge for even the most experienced gamers.




Why are we on Indiegogo now?

During Autumn 2014, we've raised 185% of our $15,000 funding goal with LOGIFACES, and since then, we've been growing even further. After a year, we've decided that we liked what the Indiegogo platform had to offer, so we activated our InDemand campaign to continue reaching Indiegogo's community. 

We've also evolved our brand and product portfolio during 2015, and now we've become LOGIDEEZ, currently crowdfunding our second product, LOGIPLACES: Puzzle out your landscape!


"This sure as hell beats sudoku as a way to wake up your brain in the morning." - Cool Material




A toy you'll be proud to exhibit.


The LOGIFACES origins: How did 3D modeling technology influence the world of analogue games?

Two architects from our team, Zsanett Benedek and Dániel Lakos were inspired by 3D modeling software using triangles (or faces) as their basic elements to create complex forms and surfaces. LOGIFACES started out as an idea to bring these complex geometries to a real, non-virtual space. They created the first version of the game from wood, but later started experimenting with concrete, and realised that the weight and touch of the material really capture the essence of the game.


A beautiful toy you'll be proud to exhibit in your home or office.

The LOGIFACES experience comes in the form of 16 concrete prisms delivered in a one of a kind box. The concrete of the prisms is from a secret recipe used by our concrete manufactury, and one of its main specialties is that it comes in three beautiful colors.


Taking the puzzle experience to a new level.

Concrete takes the puzzle experience to a new level with its different touch and mass. We pour, grind and polish each piece, utilising our award-winning, many years of experience in the production of design objects.



Display it in your home or office when you’re not playing with it.

Our special packaging gives you the opportunity to display LOGIFACES when you’re not playing with it - it enriches your spaces by showing the essence of the design. When you’re playing with LOGIFACES, you don’t need to worry about packing up afterwards!



The challenge: Show your best at this blend of digital thinking and the ancient puzzle, Tangram.

There is only one rule to LOGIFACES: Create a form by placing the prisms next to each other to form a continuous surface.

The 25-piece set contains 11 different types of prisms, each of them identifiable by the height of their three vertices. These heights can be 1, 2 or 3 units.

Much like the ancient Chinese puzzle, Tangram, the geometry of the prisms originate from the simplest blocks and the goal is to use both the creative and logical sides of your brain.


A blend of contemporary and ancient

When we created LOGIFACES, our inspiration came from the idea of blending 2D puzzles like Tangram with solutions used by contemporary graphics in 3D modeling software.

Computer graphics simulate complex surfaces, 3D forms and animations with the use of triangles. Even though computers have developed a bigger capacity that enable software to move beyond using triangles, this is a truly digital way of thinking that comes alive in the analogue world of LOGIFACES.

The original LOGIFACES set has several solutions to create an equilateral triangle. But there are many other possibilities to the game and we urge you to explore new forms beyond the basic triangle! Some of these forms were born at the first LOGIFACES meetup, where in anticipaton of our campaign, we met with interested LOGIFACERs to collect ideas and feedback about our prototypes.


An opportunity to develop yourself with your friends.

Playing LOGIFACES doesn't have to be a lone pastime, because thinking together with your friends is a whole new experience of the game. Not only do you have to find the place for each prism, you have to take into account how the others have moved the elements. And of course, the best new forms are born when friends have fun together!



A toy for kids and adults of all ages

For kids who like a special logic challenge, LOGIFACES is a great way to fill their time and develop themselves. From what we've learnt through seeing them play, they are the best at creating new forms!

Beyond concrete: Experience the real prism challenge with LOGIFACES made of glass!

When we thought of the original, concrete prisms, we were quick to realize that a more luxurious glass version would look amazing. If you're one for modern glass sculptures, this one will even help you tune out and develop your creativity.



Choose the best set for you!
Are you thinking of surprising a loved one for Christmas who would go crazy over a set of LOGIFACES? Now is the time to choose the LOGIFACES that fits them best and order it before Christmas!


Why support us?

We are a team of architects, designers and marketers representing Planbureau, a Hungarian architecture studio focusing on interior design.

Planbureau has been a great place for us to innovate and create new products, which we believe will gain international recognition by having the greatest friends and supporters around us!

Visit us and see our other works at planbureau.hu!

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I specify the color of my set?

After you’ve sent us your donation, we’ll be contacting you in e-mail to ask about the details, such as what color you choose for your set.

Can I get different colors in a set?

One full set (16 pieces) comes in one of the three colors of your choice.

If you choose the 16+9 set, you can choose what color you’d like for the 16 pieces, and you can choose another color for the other 9 pieces, if you feel like mixing it up a little.

In case of the Collector's Double Set, you can also specify two colors, one for each 16-piece sets.

How much does one set weigh?

One full set (16 pieces) weighs 1.5 kg / 3.3 lbs.

What does the concrete material contain exactly?

The sets are handcrafted from the finest concrete, but we cannot tell you its exact ingredients, because we have our own secret recipe designed for LOGIFACES. But we can assure you that all colors are from the highest quality with excellent durability.

Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@logideez.com!

When we thought of the original, concrete prisms, we were quick to realize that a more luxurious glass version would look amazing. If you're one for modern glass sculptures, this one will even help you tune out and develop your creativity.








Choose the best set for you!




Are you thinking of surprising a loved one for Christmas who would go crazy over a set of LOGIFACES? Now is the time to choose the LOGIFACES that fits them best and order it before Christmas!










Why support us?

We are a team of architects, designers and marketers representing Planbureau, a Hungarian architecture studio focusing on interior design. 


Planbureau has been a great place for us to innovate and create new products, which we believe will gain international recognition by having the greatest friends and supporters around us!



Visit us and see our other works at planbureau.hu!


Frequently Asked Questions

How can I specify the color of my set?
After you’ve sent us your donation, we’ll be contacting you in e-mail to ask about the details, such as what color you choose for your set.
Can I get different colors in a set?
One full set (16 pieces) comes in one of the three colors of your choice.
If you choose the 16+9 set, you can choose what color you’d like for the 16 pieces, and you can choose another color for the other 9 pieces, if you feel like mixing it up a little.
In case of the Collector's Double Set, you can also specify two colors, one for each 16-piece sets.
How much does one set weigh?
One full set (16 pieces) weighs 1.5 kg / 3.3 lbs.
What does the concrete material contain exactly?The sets are handcrafted from the finest concrete, but we cannot tell you its exact ingredients, because we have our own secret recipe designed for LOGIFACES. But we can assure you that all colors are from the highest quality with excellent durability.


Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@logideez.com!

story:
LIGHT GAZA'S NIGHT 

Biography 

EMGAZA appeals founded in the last Israeli genocide over the Gaza strip. It aimed at helping Palestinians who got affected directly by the genocide, as well as medical facilities ( Clinics and Local NGOs). 

We established four successful appeals among six months. We helped so many disabilities with medicines, diapers and medical related equipment (Wheelchair, walker and crutches). 

Our humanitarian distribution plans based on the most affected areas in the strip. These areas are almost forgotten by International NGOs as well as humanitarian convoys due to many reasons 

- Location is far from city centers. 

- Location is so close to the Israeli Eastern fence ( Buffer Zone) 

- Prioritization issues based on MOH policy as they put the main hospitals on top to get aid. 

EMGAZA Team 

We are a group of Pharmacists, Paramedics, and logisticians  working voluntary with full spirit and ambition. We believe in peace and People's power. Our love for Palestine and its population drove us to choose this path irreversibly. 

EMGAZA Policy 

- Due to Israeli embargo and collective punishment policy,  we're totally depending on crowdfunding that allow us to get money and buy the needed items from the Gaza strip. 

- By purchasing items from Gaza's markets, we do support Palestinian economy. 

- No time to waste, By getting stuff from Gaza strip, we avoid borders and permissions that required if we are receiving it outside the strip. 

- Less expense, in addition of a previous point, we also avoid  transportation and logistic costs. 

Light Gaza's Night

Gaza Strip suffers from a lack of continuous electricity due to bombing the main power station by Israel in 2006. 

This shortage touched many aspects and made life hard to live. There are so many attempts to fix this problem but because of Israeli blockade it made it harder. 

Gazans tried to bear this issue by finding other alternatives such as Candles, Electrical generators, and torches. These alternatives were not sufficient due to these reasons:

- Candles are so dangerous to light at home since it may burn it if care doesn't exist. ( So many death cases reported most of them kids) 

- Electrical Generator needs oil that is not available all the time, and even if, is so expensive after closing Tunnels with Egypt. 

- Rechargeable torch is the best solution especially if it has LED flashlights that can resist more hours. These kind of flashlights (LED) are expensive, and not everyone can afford it. 

Goals

- To provide and deliver LED flashlights to the needy families. Our delivery plan will be based on families who have kids, students, and sick people. 

- Part of funds will go to help some disabled with diapers. 

Items want to Purchase 

LED flashlights with different sizes and recharging capacities

Distribution Plan

Our distribution method based on data and lists already prepared by local NGOs scattered at different places in the Gaza Strip. 

Photos from our first humanitarian action - Rafah City

For more Photos check this Link and Keep your donation On. 

https://www.facebook.com/hani.s.salamah/media_s...


Follow-up 

Since we hit target, We will update you as always with written reports, Photos, and video films 

Check Stage 1 video report 


Check our ex-appeals at these links 


Team Leader

I'd like to thank you for massive support, love and trust. Gaza's people rely on us, and we rely on you. Keep your big heart beating towards Gaza. God bless you in advanced. 

Love & Respect from my end

Dr.Hani.Siliman.Salamah

story:
This is where I live: mountain map of the Rossland Range in my home in Rossland. Get one of your local mountains by selecting Custom mountain map as your perk!

The wood-carving robots live in the valley

I’ve been working on making beautiful, tactile, custom wooden globes for two summers now.

I’m nearly there, but I have a problem.

I live in the mountains.

The wood-carving robots live in the valley, 2,000 feet down a twisting, mountain road.

As a part-time paramedic, I see the accidents that happen on that treacherous road on the worst days of winter.

To finish work on these globes, I need a wood-carving robot of my own, right here where I live.

With your help, I can create a wooden globe for my home, for yours and for many others’, a captivating reminder that this is where we live, this planet is our home.

Down to the fine grain

The wood-carving robot I need to create these globes – a ShopBot Desktop CNC router with essential accessories – will cost $15,000 Canadian, delivered to my door.

I can cover the first $10,000; I need your help with the remaining $5,000.

In return for your pledge, I’ll send you a perk from a simple thank-you note carved from 1/8" plywood to a magnificent 12" diameter globe carved from fine North American hardwood.

I’ll be able to deliver some of the perks sooner than others. I’ve already created prototypes of the continent dome maps and the mountain maps: I’ve generated the files that tell the CNC router how to carve these 3D relief maps; all I need is the CNC router to start making them and sending them to you.

The globes will take longer. I’ve created prototypes of the pieces of these globes, but with limited access to a CNC router, I haven’t yet made a complete globe. So there’s work to be done. If it’s a globe you’re after, take a look at the delivery dates and the challenges outlined below, and make sure you’re comfortable with the risks and the wait times.

All the maps and globes will be precision machine-carved from fine North American hardwood and painstakingly hand-finished with museum-grade microcrystalline wax.

I can’t tell you how much I’m looking forward to packing up the first maps and globes and shipping them to you, wherever you are!

OK, doctor, tell me the worst

I’ve already eliminated some of the biggest risks in the making of these globes:

  • I’ve proved that I can get a beautiful finish in maple wood by carving maps of the local mountains;
  • I’ve fine-tuned the contrast between the oceans and the continents by carving North America and Antarctica as they would appear on a globe;
  • I’ve experimented with ways to carve both sides of each separate piece;
  • I’ve tried different ways to join fourteen pieces into a globe.

But there are challenges to come:

  • I need to finalize the methods for carving both sides of each piece and for joining fourteen pieces into a globe;
  • I need to pay particular attention to the alignment of the carving on the two sides of each piece and on adjacent pieces, so that the mountains line up seamlessly across the globe;
  • I need to prove the design of the simple wooden stand I’ll be supplying with each globe.

Remember, these globes don’t exist yet, because it’s hard to get enough time with the wood-carving robots down in the valley. That’s why I need your help. With a CNC router of my own, I’m confident I can make these globes a reality.

Who is this globe guy anyway?

Oops, sorry, in my enthusiasm to tell you about my globes, I left it a little late to introduce myself.

I'm Mark.

I'm a globetrotter who's been to all seven continents, and lived for a time on four of them, including Antarctica.

I'm a maker who can't stop creating: furniture, software, visualizations, books, maps and globes.

As a developer, I’ve conceived, implemented and released countless innovative software products, in fields as diverse as film editing and scientific simulation; so you know I’m a doer.

As a writer, I’ve completed four books, two of which have been published and went through many rounds of revision with myself, my agent and my editor; so you know I’m a finisher.

As a paramedic, I’ve attended to countless life-threatening injuries and illnesses, intervening decisively in the lives of others in their moments of crisis; so you know I’ll keep calm and do whatever needs to be done.

Let’s make the world out of wood

I really want these beautiful, tactile, custom wooden globes to exist. If you do too, there’s something you need to know.

This isn't a marketing campaign by an established company with dozens of employees and a mailing list of thousands. This is just me, Mark, with my one-person company, Kootenay Village Ventures Inc., trying to get this thing off the ground.

Which means that your contributions won't be going to pay off marketing consultants or video producers, they'll go straight into buying the carving machine I need to make my globes.

But it also means that the only way this is going to happen is if you help me get the word out.

Do you know someone who needs a globe in their life? (In my opinion, everyone needs a globe in their life.) Please point them to my website goodwoodglobes.com or this Indiegogo page igg.me/at/goodwoodglobes

If you’re on Instagram or Twitter, follow me @goodwoodglobes and re-tweet my campaign launch video. Use the buttons at the top to share this page on Facebook, Twitter or your own website.

In return for your early support, I’ve made the deepest discounts I can on the prices I’ll have to charge for my maps and globes in future. I’m also offering free shipping in the US and Canada, and 50% off shipping to the UK and the EU, even though it’ll cost me anywhere from $20 to ship a small world map within Canada to $300 to ship a 12" globe to the UK.

Thank you so much for helping me make the world out of wood!

Check out a higher-quality, no-captions version of my campaign video at vimeo.com/315131569

Thanks to NASA and Wikipedia for giving access to the public domain images and footage used in my video. Mappa Mundi, Bede, De natura rerum from the Bodleian Libraries, University of Oxford, used under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International licence.

I'd love to hear your thoughts! You can reach me at goodwoodglobes.com/contact

story:
Your phone is your key. Download the app on any iOS or Android device and unlock your safe immediately.

 

If your smartphone has a Fingerprint Scanner, so does your safe. Allow the QuickSafe App to use you phone's biometric technology for extra protection of your valuables. 

Have Face ID? We've got you covered on that, too. By utilizing the biometric technology in your smartphone, you can take extra comfort in knowing your valuables are secure. 

Access your belongings immediately- without ever taking your phone out of your pocket. While your bluetooth connected device is within range, touch a small access point on the bottom of your SmartSafe to open. 

SmartSafes will keep track of the actions it takes. You can see who opened your safe and when.

 

 

If you don't have a smartphone, or just don't want to connect one,  use one of the 4 included RFID cards to open the safe. Touch the RFID key to the access sensor, and the safe pops open. 

Disguised to look like a regular fresh air return vent and engineered to fit between 2 X 16" center studs (standard spacing in most homes and offices), the SmartVent blends in on any wall. Simply open the App on your phone and you have immediate access to its contents..

 

The SmartShelf is one of the most convenient ways you can hide and secure your valuables. It looks just like an ordinary shelf so it blends in on any wall-effectively hiding your valuables in plain sight and adding a touch of decoration.

YOU'LL GET TO CHOOSE YOUR COLOR AND STYLE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS

 

It all started when my dad, Mike, saw a couple major flaws in the security solutions that were being offered at the time. The first major flaw was that there weren’t any safes that offered immediate access. When you’re locking something up that you need daily access to-like medication, for example- spinning a dial or typing in a code can be very inconvenient and time consuming. We found that this inconvenience really discouraged people from locking up dangerous medications-and even firearms. We’re left with people leaving highly addictive prescription medications out in the open-where anyone can access them-and we are left with people leaving loaded firearms in accessible nightstand drawers-where children and teenagers can get to them. We saw this as a huge problem and knew that the only solution would be to design a safe that offers immediate access. The second major flaw that needed to be addressed was that the safes that were on the market were not hidden or discreet. This made them easy targets for thieves. The two key elements we decided to focus on were Immediate Access and Hidden-in-Plain-Sight, and that’s when we designed QuickSafes.

How long do the batteries last?

The batteries last for 1 year. We recommend changing the batteries at the time you change your smoke detector batteries. 

What batteries do the SmartSafes use?

All of our SmartSafes use 4 x AA batteries. 

What happens if the batteries die?

Each of our SmartSafes are designed to use a backup battery pack- just in case you forget to change the internal batteries. You can watch these videos to see how the backup battery pack works with the SmartVent or the SmartShelf.

What accessories come with my SmartSafes?

All of the SmartSafes will come with 4 RFID Keys (2 Cards, 1 FOB, 1 Token) and a backup battery pack.

Will my RFID Keys open all other SmartSafes?

No, each safe has its own unique RFID keys. Only your keys will open your safe.

A special thanks to all those who helped make this possible. Mike Mercer, Roger Comstock, Tucker Debevec, Kristin Wankier, Vince Warner, Bethany Martin, and the Flickinger Family,

story:
WHAT IS BIBLEZON?

Learn, live & Practice your catholic faith! Take your catholic faith with you everywhere with this sleek holy tablet. Whether you want to read the bible, daily scriptures, pray rosary, read your favorite catholic book or simply learn more about your catholic faith, you want to have biblezon on your side.  Most of all, you'll love the ability to learn, live and organize your catholic faith in one place …….. Without any distraction. 


THE PURPOSE:

The primary purpose of the biblezon tablet is to create a pathway to holiness by providing a platform where Catholics can learn, live & practice their faith daily.

THE VISION:

The main vision of the company is to be the innovative leader in engaging Catholics to live and practice their faith.


OUR STORY

The story of Biblezon is one of Faith, Hope, and Love of the catholic faith. I have a solid history of faith which defines my decision to launch this product. I believe deeply in the Catholic Church and Its mission. Like many other Catholics, my faith was not the center of my life. I was busy with other earthly things and didn't care much about my catholic faith. When I got married, I wanted a change for my family. Most especially I wanted to raise my kids catholic but how could I raise my kids catholic if I don`t know the faith?  It is then that I embarked on a faith journey. A faith journey that will help me discover a lot of amazing things about my catholic faith. I have found great peace and joy by practicing and living my faith and I believe every catholic can do the same, which is why I invented the Biblezon tablet so that we can all stay focus on our catholic faith and grow our relationship with God. It is the main reason why we are here; to live the faith, know the faith and to be in communion with God.

As a devout catholic, I spend most of my time reading the bible, studying the catechism, going to mass frequently, meditating on daily readings, knowing the saints, praying the rosary, reading many catholic books and many other activities. I sometimes felt frustrated with the many books and materials I have to carry about just to practice my faith. I thought having a  place where I could put my faith life all in one position was the solution. The idea of biblezon starting developing. I normally have different apps on my phone that I use to practice my faith daily. One morning, I wanted to read the daily meditations but found myself on Facebook and some other days I find myself either checking my email or doing something else. It was then that the idea of biblezon was fully born. I need a separate space for GOD and I believe we all do. My favorite verse from the bible.

"Do not love the world or anything in the world. If anyone loves the world, love for the Father is not in them. For everything in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—comes not from the Father but from the world. The world and its desires pass away, but whoever does the will of God lives forever"  -John 2:15-16

I believe biblezon will create an environment where Catholics can practice their faith free from distraction and from the things of the world. I also believe that it is important to separate earthly things from spiritual things thereby honoring God. He deserves it!



HOW BIBLEZON WORKS?

When you buy the tablet, you will be prompted to create an account with your name, email and also include a personal photo (not required). After you create an account, the home screen will pop-up. You will then be able to access all your catholic materials (bible, catechism, daily readings, prayers, rosary, shop & many more). Users will also be able to pray together, ask questions about their faith and connect with other Catholics. 



WHERE WE ARE NOW?

We have been able to create a basic prototype with the biblezon logo and a custom android launcher. As you know, manufacturing can be very expensive so we need to raise money to complete manufacturing, customize the tablet to look catholic and develop the various catholic applications.




FAQ.

1.  How is biblezon different from iPad and other tablets?

Biblezon is a holy tablet that is focused on your catholic faith only. No distraction!

2.  Why not create just an app since most people already have phones & tablets?

First of all, we don`t think these devices are meant for worship and creating another app won`t help achieve our mission to engage Catholics to practice their faith.

3.  How will biblezon help Catholics grow their faith and relationship with God?

Biblezon will achieve its mission by providing a holy platform that is focused on faith only. We also have apps that are very interactive and users can ask questions, prayer together and connect with other Catholics.

4.  What is the purpose of the tablet?

The purpose of biblezon is to create a pathway to holiness by engaging Catholics to learn, live & practice their faith daily

5.  Does biblezon connect to the internet & social media?

There will be no access to the internet or social media however users can access popular catholic websites and blogs.

6.  How much will the tablet cost?

The price of the tablet will range between $99 - $119 but our real price is holiness.

7.  When will the tablet be available?

As you know launching a new product takes time & money. We are looking to start selling and distributing the tablet by November.
story_txt:
WHAT IS BIBLEZON?Learn, live & Practice
your catholic faith! Take your catholic faith with you everywhere with this
sleek holy tablet. Whether you want to read the bible, daily scriptures, pray
rosary, read your favorite catholic book or simply learn more about your
catholic faith, you want to have biblezon on your side.  Most of all,
you'll love the ability to learn, live and organize your catholic faith in
one place …….. Without any distraction. 


THE PURPOSE:The primary purpose of the
biblezon tablet is to create a pathway to holiness by providing a platform
where Catholics can learn, live & practice their faith daily.THE VISION:The main vision of the
company is to be the innovative leader in engaging Catholics to live and practice
their faith.
OUR STORY
The
story of Biblezon is one of Faith, Hope, and Love of the catholic faith. I have
a solid history of faith which defines my decision to launch this product. I
believe deeply in the Catholic Church and Its mission. Like many other Catholics, my faith was not the center of my life.
I was busy with other earthly things and didn't care much about my catholic
faith. When I got married, I wanted a change for my family. Most especially I wanted to raise my kids catholic but how could I raise my kids catholic if I don`t know the faith?  It is then that I embarked on a faith journey. A faith journey that will help me discover a lot
of amazing things about my catholic faith. I have found great peace and joy by
practicing and living my faith and I believe every catholic can do the same,
which is why I invented the Biblezon tablet so that we can all stay focus on
our catholic faith and grow our relationship with God. It is the main reason
why we are here; to live the faith, know the faith and to be in communion with
God.As a devout catholic, I spend most of my time
reading the bible, studying the catechism, going to mass frequently, meditating
on daily readings, knowing the saints, praying the rosary, reading many
catholic books and many other activities. I sometimes felt frustrated with the
many books and materials I have to carry about just to practice my faith. I
thought having a  place where I could put my faith life all in one position was
the solution. The idea of biblezon starting developing. I normally have different
apps on my phone that I use to practice my faith daily. One morning, I wanted
to read the daily meditations but found myself on Facebook and some other days I find myself either checking my email or doing something else. It was then
that the idea of biblezon was fully born. I need a separate space for GOD and I believe we all do. My favorite verse from the bible."Do not love the world or anything
in the world. If anyone loves the world, love for the Father is not in them.
For everything in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and
the pride of life—comes not from the Father but from the world. The world and
its desires pass away, but whoever does the will of God lives forever"
 -John 2:15-16I believe biblezon will create an environment
where Catholics can practice their faith free from distraction and from the
things of the world. I also believe that it is important to separate earthly
things from spiritual things thereby honoring God. He deserves it!
HOW BIBLEZON WORKS?When
you buy the tablet, you will be prompted to create an account with your name,
email and also include a personal photo (not required). After you create an
account, the home screen will pop-up. You will then be able to access all your
catholic materials (bible, catechism, daily readings, prayers, rosary, shop & many more). Users will also be able to pray together, ask questions about
their faith and connect with other Catholics. 

WHERE
WE ARE NOW?
We
have been able to create a basic prototype with the biblezon logo and a custom
android launcher. As you know, manufacturing can be very expensive so we need
to raise money to complete manufacturing, customize the tablet to look catholic
and develop the various catholic applications.






FAQ.
1. 
How
is biblezon different from iPad and other tablets?

Biblezon
is a holy tablet that is focused on your catholic faith only. No distraction!

2. 
Why
not create just an app since most people already have phones & tablets?

First
of all, we don`t think these devices are meant for worship and creating another
app won`t help achieve our mission to engage Catholics to practice their faith.


3. 
How
will biblezon help Catholics grow their faith and relationship with God? 

Biblezon
will achieve its mission by providing a holy platform that is focused on faith
only. We also have apps that are very interactive and users can ask questions,
prayer together and connect with other Catholics.

4. 
What
is the purpose of the tablet?

The
purpose of biblezon is to create a pathway to holiness by engaging Catholics to
learn, live & practice their faith daily

5. 
Does
biblezon connect to the internet & social media?

There
will be no access to the internet or social media however users can access popular
catholic websites and blogs.

6. 
How
much will the tablet cost?
The
price of the tablet will range between $99 - $119 but our real price is
holiness. 
7. 
When
will the tablet be available?

As
you know launching a new product takes time & money. We are looking to
start selling and distributing the tablet by November.

story:
Imagine if all seeds, fruits, leaves, stems, herbs and vegetables were 100% natural (without chemicals or fertilisers) and easily available to you. That is our goal: to turn the world into a greener, smarter and healthier place. CoolFarm works with all kinds of plants, at your house and big farms!


CoolFarm - The product

CooFarm is a Wi-Fi enabled smart system, designed to control plant growth in a hydroponic environment (a process without soil). With our system inside a vase, and its connectivity to our web and mobile App dashboard, the plants’ needs are fully covered with minimum intervention from the user.

The process of growing food is the same that NASA is using to grow plants in space, aeroponics. It allows plants to grow faster; they are less susceptible to pests; and on top of everything it spends less water and energy. But, we went a step further and made our system intelligent.



CoolFarm´s brain is connected to a set of sensors that provide the necessary environmental variables. In the end, the user just needs to fill the vase with water and nutrients, and power up the system.

You will be able to control your plant growth through fun and user-friendly Apps, whether you're using a smartphone, a laptop or a tablet. You will be able to share all plant data, your progress and ideas on social networks such as Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus.



Be a part of a wide community that has the same passion as you. Have fun and stay healthy!


The goal is to deliver people the best way to grow natural 100% food in the fastest way and without spending time. Also, CoolFarm is clean (no dirt); space saver and pretty (creating design vases in vertical structures); funny and social (with the use of mobile Apps and Web platforms); and made to be used in extreme weather conditions. Furthermore, our system can be used in large hydroponic farms, making the industry control easier and more profitable. The CoolFarm system has a pending patent.


Project history

Everything started in one of the founders small cultivation at his apartment. We found ourselves discussing how the supermarket veggies aren't tasty and smelling like they should smell; how challenging it is to find healthy and quality fruit and vegetables in the city; and how difficult it is to dedicate ourselves to a sustainable homemade agriculture.

Recent studies show that the amount of nutrients found in fruit and vegetables in general has been decreasing at an alarming rate. This is why biological food markets and community farms are becoming such a huge phenomenon in big cities. So, we understood that we were not alone in this dialogue and we realised that there is a huge market looking for solutions.

After recognising these facts we started searching and studying the best and fastest way to grow our own food at home, without knowledge, or losing time and space.

The result was a combination of artificial intelligence and web-based applications to control all the plants needs’ with minimal interference from the user.


Help us launch CoolFarm :)



We have the first prototypes done. We can prove that our idea works. Our next goals are: to develop the final Web/Mobile applications and to make a final prototype with a cool design to present it to the market.

We invite you to be part of our team and contribute as you can to help us make this product available in the market.



We will spend the next three months in the Lisbon Challenge, powered by Beta-i – the coolest European startup acceleration program. This period will be fundamental to get our prototype with Web & Apps integration ready. With your help, we will be able to accomplish it! We promise awesome perks for you! 

Check out our featured apron to cook CoolFarm vegetables once it is out in the market! Contribute with 20€ to get one!



And don´t forget to spread the message and use Indiegogo share tools.


The Team




The members of the CoolFarm team have known each other for a long time. In fact we have grown together, in the same city and in the same group of friends. We have also created CoolApps(e), a trophy winner and worldwide company that creates extremely detailed and interactive Websites and Apps.

The CoolFarm leaders are:

Gonçalo Cabrita: the electronics magician and a PhD student in Robotics Engineering at the University of Coimbra. http://pt.linkedin.com/in/goncabrita

Liliana Marques: CoolApps(e) Co-founder, project manager and a PhD engineer. http://www.coolappse.com/lmarques/cv.pdf

João Igor: CoolApps(e) Co-founder and CEO that comes from Design, Communication and Multimedia licentiate degree. http://pt.linkedin.com/in/joaoigor

Our team is truly experienced, passionate, creative and dedicated, composed by designers, robotic engineers, software developers and botanical researchers that have accomplished international publications in most credible technical and scientific journals and conferences; as well as international grants and awards. We are well organized and trustworthy for what we are reaching for.

LET´s make homemade agriculture easier, prettier, smarter, funnier and social :)

story:
Latest Reviews Published Here:

Thanks for Martijn Wester's review.

 
 
 

As the best alternatives to Philips hue light strips with only 30% price, Aurora, the smart, LED, dimmable, colorful and extendable light strips, would light up your home with your imagination.

Choose from over 16 million colors to set the mood of a room, highlight furniture or fixtures or create architectural features in your living spaces.

The aurora can help to create a right atmosphere for almost any indoor scenes, such as, run them along shelves, under a TV, around room and stairs, or highlight the furniture or wall, etc. Thanks to the flexible material and extendable features, it can either provide long-lasting large ambient light for the whole room or the small atmosphere for the private corner.

Compatible with Google Assistant and Alexa, Aurora give the users the opportunity to give some creative flair and make something smarter and more special.

 

Yeelight Aurora could be applied to various areas of our daily life. It could improve the atmosphere of your home to provide you and your families a happy time. In addition, to enhance the illuminating brightness of your house, it could notify you to do whatever you plan. With the beats of music, Yeelight Aurora even could change colors.

 

How does it work?

 

Rhythm with Music

(Please turn on your speaker first!)

Brightness and color of the RGB LED strip light changed with the rhythm and melody of any type of music. Let’s brings out the passion and dance with Yeelight Aurora!

 

Pick the color from items

By simply adjusting the color upon the color panel or pick a specific reality color by phone lens, you can easily create the ambient lighting for the party, accent lighting to highlight some special features, task lighting for up-close work, or a flattering glow for a romantic meal.

 

Alarm to wake you up

By setting the sunrise option, the strip will begin a gradual sunrise where the light gets brighter and colder as it gets closer to your actual wake up time. Let’s illuminate the whole day life by waking up around with this colored sunrise simulations.

 

Sync with Cooking Clock

There are reasons why you might want to set a timer for your lights. Maybe you’re cooking with a sleeping baby in the house and you don’t want your traditional loudly one ring when it hits zero. In that case, you can set your kitchen lights to blink, or even change them to a different color to let you know that your brownies are done.

Or, maybe you know you’re going to fall asleep reading, so you want your lights to automatically turn off in a half hour or so. Essentially, Aurora can be the sort of a silent alternative to loud timers and provide you with a visual alert rather than an audible one.

 

One touch to change scenario

Aurora provides multiple recommended formulas for universal scenarios, sunrise, sunset, dating night, movie, birthday party, romance, home, flash notify, candle flicker, and continuous upcoming ones. Just one simple touch, Aurora would make the scene come to life that’s best suited to the mood.

 

Brightness

As a LED light strip, Aurora can be used to highlight the painting, bookshelf, works of art, or any other certain elements. In addition, it can also provide sufficient brightness for reading and working scenarios.

 

 

The Aurora’s compatibility with Amazon Alexa, the Google Assistant, IFTTT, and MIJIA, combined with multi-language skills, give us the chance to use our home-tune to control the light strip on an Amazon Echo, a Google Home, or any other smart devices. Of course, the Yeelight App and smart button also provide the most powerful function that creates the atmosphere for special moments.

 

 
 

The Yeelight 3rd-party control protocol is a feature designed for developers and fans of IoT. Users can develop their own applications and programs to discover and control Yeelight Aurora by using their favorite platform or language.  This control protocol uses an SSDP-like discovering mechanism and JSON encoded controlling command, developers can discover and control their devices dynamically under the same LAN.

 

 

Disadvantages of other light strips

 

Product display

 

Flexible printed circuit

The FPC is the fundamental of the light strip.  The flexibility of light strips depends on the consistency and stability of the performance of light beads in the strip. The following pictures contend the best quality FPC and latest automatic welding technique by Yeelight Aurora.

 

PU adhesive

The adhesive of Yeelight Aurora is mercury-free PU adhesive, which is anti-aging, resistant to bending, environment-friendly, much more expensive than other adhesives and certified by SGS. As for the glue dripping process, Yeelight Aurora adopts non-dust free automatic dripping.

 

ID design

Yeelight devotes a lot to designing the circuit layout and screen printing. The picture below shows the difference between Yeelight Aurora (the bottom one) and other light strips. For perfect appearance, the redundant solder spot, bare circuit, redundant words, and signs are removed. Yeelight also opens a mold to protect the two ends of Aurora light strip, to prevent the virtual welding.

 

Aided tape handles

In addition, Yeelight designs two aided tape handles (like the following picture) for users to open back tape easily.

 

Can be cut

 

Multinational replaceable plug

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Yeelight team is led by Eric Jiang, CEO and founder, and Daping Liu, COO and Co-founder. The team was founded in 2012 and has been committed to the development and promotion of smart lighting products. It published its first product in San Francisco in 2013, joined Xiaomi Ecosystem in 2014. As a leading smart lighting brand in the industry, Yeelight team started the cooperation with Google, Microsoft, and Amazon, becoming the first batch of lighting brands in China supporting Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, and Microsoft Xiaobing. The Yeelight team aims to present fine art pieces loved by smart home users and enable you to design your home with smart lighting!

 

All of our employees

 

 

 

About us

1. Who is Yeelight?

Yeelight is an emerging innovative enterprise that was founded in 2012 with the help of an American incubator, SOSven-true. Yeelight devotes to creating a new, high-quality, and comfortable lighting experience to users with the smarter user operation, providing a personalized and superior quality lighting that people require.

2. Why did you choose Indiegogo for the global launch, and what’s your future plan?

The reason to why we choose Indiegogo for our global launch is that there are many backers on Indiegogo who have to possess the passion and desire to influence the innovative technology field. We are confident that Aurora would be loved and promoted by them, even at the most professional perspective.

 

Service

1. What kind of warranty do you offer?

We provide a 1-year warranty. In this case, if the strips become defective, we will provide a free replacement.

2. What is your return policy?

If you are an overseas buyer, we will evaluate the shipping cost and provide a quota.

 

Shipping & order

1. How long do I need to wait and how can I track my products?

We will begin our funding on Sept 9th and end on Oct 9th. After Oct 9th, the package will be shipped in order, the weight of the package depends on your region. After the package is shipped, a tracking number will be provided.

2. Who is responsible for the shipping fee, additional taxes, duties or vat/gst?

The backers will be responsible for shipping fees, additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST.

3. I want to change my order, what should I do?

If you want to cancel, change, or add on to your order, feel free to contact our customer service and they will help.

 

Production

1. Who is Yeelight Aurora for?

Yeelight Aurora is designed for those who are looking for a durable, reasonably priced, and well-designed smart LED Strip Light.

2. Is Yeelight Aurora extendable? What’s the max length?

Yes, it is extendable and the maximum length is 10 meters.

3. Will the functions of Yeelight Aurora and the APP be updated in a reasonable timeframe?

Yes, we will regularly update the Firmware and App with new functions.

4. Can I control the Yeelight Aurora using two mobile phones at the same time?

Yes, as long as you log in the same account, you can control it on different mobile devices.

5. What’s the rated power of Yeelight Aurora? How many LED lamps are there in one light strip?

The rated power of Yeelight Aurora is 7.5W. There are 24 LED beads in a 2 meter Aurora light strip.

6. Can I cut the light strip?

Yes, we have “cut marks” designed on the strip and you are able to cut to any length that is indicated.

7. Can I control several light strips using one mobile phone?

Yes, you are able to make a light group that includes multiple strips.

8. Can I use a 1m Extendable strip alone?

Nope, the strip extension does not have adapters so you will need to use the 2m base.

9. What’s the rated input?

The strip works with 110-240V, 50/60Hz.

10. Are there requirements for the phone model?

No, as long as you have the “ YEELIGHT” App on your mobile, Aurora can be used with any phone model.

11. Do I have to control Yeelight Aurora by APP?

It’s not necessary, Aurora provides multiple ways to control it. Other than the App, you can also control Aurora by using the physical buttons, or an AI speaker such as Google Home.

12. How do I reset Yeelight Aurora?

Unplug the power adapter, press the on/off button and plug in the power adapter at the same time. Then, hold the button for 5 more seconds until the strip begins to show red, green, blue in that order. Release the button and the indicator LED will turn Yellow, which means you have successfully reset.

13. How do I install Yeelight Aurora?

After resetting Aurora, you can add Aurora in the “Yeelight APP” or “Mi App” found in the app store. You will find detailed instructions in the APP.

14. Is Yeelight Aurora compatible to smart home systems? What are they? What can they do？

Aurora supports MI Home, Google Home and Amazon echo. This means Aurora can be an IOT device.

15. Can I voice control Yeelight Aurora?

Yes, you are able to voice control Yeelight Aurora by connecting it to an AI speaker such as Google Home and Amazon Echo.

16. What’s the difference between Yeelight Aurora and Yeelight Lightstrip(color)?

Yeelight Lightstrip is our 1st generation LED strip. As the 2nd generation strip, Aurora is extendable with a maximum length of 10 meters.

17. How far away can I be while using my phone to control Yeelight Aurora?

Aurora is controlled via Wifi, this means you can control Aurora anywhere you want as long as you are connected to the Internet.

18. I see that the Yeelight extendable light strip is on sale. Have you sold Yeelight Aurora before?

Indiegogo will be the first place that we are selling Yeelight Aurora. However, some sellers out there may be using the 1st generation strip as the 2nd generation to sell.

19. If I have purchased other Yeelight products in the past, can I use the products along with Aurora? If so, how?

Yes, if you have other Yeelight wifi products, you can create a group with Yeeliight Aurora. Lights in the same group can be controlled at the same time.

Yeelight devotes to creating a new, high-quality, and comfortable lighting experience to users with the smarter user operation, providing a personalized and superior quality lighting that people require.2. Why did you choose Indiegogo for the global launch, and what’s your future plan?The reason to why we choose Indiegogo for our global launch is that there are many backers on Indiegogo who have to possess the passion and desire to influence the innovative technology field. We are confident that Aurora would be loved and promoted by them, even at the most professional perspective. Service1. What kind of warranty do you offer?We provide a 1-year warranty. In this case, if the strips become defective, we will provide a free replacement.2. What is your return policy?If you are an overseas buyer, we will evaluate the shipping cost and provide a quota. Shipping & order1. How long do I need to wait and how can I track my products?We will begin our funding on Sept 9th and end on Oct 9th. After Oct 9th, the package will be shipped in order, the weight of the package depends on your region. After the package is shipped, a tracking number will be provided.2. Who is responsible for the shipping fee, additional taxes, duties or vat/gst?The backers will be responsible for shipping fees, additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST.3. I want to change my order, what should I do?If you want to cancel, change, or add on to your order, feel free to contact our customer service and they will help. Production1. Who is Yeelight Aurora for?Yeelight Aurora is designed for those who are looking for a durable, reasonably priced, and well-designed smart LED Strip Light.2. Is Yeelight Aurora extendable? What’s the max length?Yes, it is extendable and the maximum length is 10 meters.3. Will the functions of Yeelight Aurora and the APP be updated in a reasonable timeframe?Yes, we will regularly update the Firmware and App with new functions.4. Can I control the Yeelight Aurora using two mobile phones at the same time?Yes, as long as you log in the same account, you can control it on different mobile devices.5. What’s the rated power of Yeelight Aurora? How many LED lamps are there in one light strip?The rated power of Yeelight Aurora is 7.5W. There are 24 LED beads in a 2 meter Aurora light strip.6. Can I cut the light strip?Yes, we have “cut marks” designed on the strip and you are able to cut to any length that is indicated.7. Can I control several light strips using one mobile phone?Yes, you are able to make a light group that includes multiple strips.8. Can I use a 1m Extendable strip alone?Nope, the strip extension does not have adapters so you will need to use the 2m base.9. What’s the rated input?The strip works with 110-240V, 50/60Hz.10. Are there requirements for the phone model?No, as long as you have the “ YEELIGHT” App on your mobile, Aurora can be used with any phone model.11. Do I have to control Yeelight Aurora by APP?It’s not necessary, Aurora provides multiple ways to control it. Other than the App, you can also control Aurora by using the physical buttons, or an AI speaker such as Google Home.12. How do I reset Yeelight Aurora?Unplug the power adapter, press the on/off button and plug in the power adapter at the same time. Then, hold the button for 5 more seconds until the strip begins to show red, green, blue in that order. Release the button and the indicator LED will turn Yellow, which means you have successfully reset.13. How do I install Yeelight Aurora?After resetting Aurora, you can add Aurora in the “Yeelight APP” or “Mi App” found in the app store. You will find detailed instructions in the APP.14. Is Yeelight Aurora compatible to smart home systems? What are they? What can they do？Aurora supports MI Home, Google Home and Amazon echo. This means Aurora can be an IOT device.15. Can I voice control Yeelight Aurora?Yes, you are able to voice control Yeelight Aurora by connecting it to an AI speaker such as Google Home and Amazon Echo.16. What’s the difference between Yeelight Aurora and Yeelight Lightstrip(color)?Yeelight Lightstrip is our 1st generation LED strip. As the 2nd generation strip, Aurora is extendable with a maximum length of 10 meters.17. How far away can I be while using my phone to control Yeelight Aurora?Aurora is controlled via Wifi, this means you can control Aurora anywhere you want as long as you are connected to the Internet.18. I see that the Yeelight extendable light strip is on sale. Have you sold Yeelight Aurora before?Indiegogo will be the first place that we are selling Yeelight Aurora. However, some sellers out there may be using the 1st generation strip as the 2nd generation to sell.19. If I have purchased other Yeelight products in the past, can I use the products along with Aurora? If so, how?Yes, if you have other Yeelight wifi products, you can create a group with Yeeliight Aurora. Lights in the same group can be controlled at the same time.

story:
I’m Mark Tavolino and I'm a general contractor. I’ve been in construction for 23 years, grew up in Chicago and now live in the suburbs with my wife and three kids. I've always been organized, and love coming up with ideas to make things better.

Playing sports with my kids and their friends is where the Lock & Roll Organizer began. My in-laws lived in the cul-de-sac where everyone played - they weren't the most organized bunch. Walking through the clutter of sporting equipment and garden tools in their garage, watching the kids struggle to find what they were looking for, is where the Lock and Roll idea was born.

I built the first prototype with my bare hands, their garage was finally organized and neighbors were asking me to build more to help organize their backyards, patios, and basements.  The uses for the Lock & Roll organizer were limitless!

So what do we need to get the Lock & Roll Organizer in stores? Making our product in the USA is important to us, not only to help create American jobs but also keep production close to home to ensure a quality product. That's why we have sourced a manufacturer right here in the Midwest. UPDATE:  As of 1/17, through manufacturer negotiations and fundraising we have raised enough to start manufacturing! 

The Lock & Roll Company is officially established and we have a team of manufacturing, marketing and retail experts to guide us through the launch process. We have already raised over $200K from outside investors and a lender is committed to help fund any and all purchase orders once the initial capital is raised.  We only need capital to help operations until we are in stores.

Home Depot, Sam's Club, and Costco brokers, along with QVC, Amazon and Houzz have all expressed interest, they are just waiting for a tooled product before placing orders.

If we can raise (NOW ONLY $150K as of 1/17), we can make it all happen. So help us reach our goal. Check out our great perks and help spread the word on our Facebook page and with the Indiegogo share tools.

All best, 

Mark

story:
We are the voice for every person who has had the nail biting frustration of trying to find a Parking Spot. 

If you've been there "and we know you have" then please donate to our short comedic film. Even though this is a short film it will take a budget to complete and be competitive . For this reason we are on Indiegogo and hope you can help us accomplish our goal of $2,500 to $5,000. Are you still looking for that Parking Spot?

For your contribution you will receive:

  • For $5 you receive a thank you on the films website and FB page.
  • For $10 you receive a thank you plus a digital download of The Parking Spot.
  • For $25 you receive credit in the film plus all from above
  • For $50 you receive a digital copy of lead song O Solo Mio sung by lead actor and writer Mario Corry plus all from above.
  • For $100 you will be invited to a screening of "The Parking Spot" plus all from above
  • For $250 you will get a special screen credit along with everything from above
  • For $500 you receive an Associate Producer credit in the film plus all from above. 
  • For $2,500 you receive an Executive Producer credit in the film plus everything mentioned in the other tiers

Thank you again!!

Cast and Crew Include:

  • Cathy Curtin - Orange is the new Black, Wolf of Wall Street, Bourne Legacy
  • Mario Corry - Bridge of Spies, Power, Law and Order
  • Dave T. Koenig - The Blacklist, Red Oaks, The Following.
  • Maggie Champagne - Inside Amy Schumer
  • Johnnie Mae - Boardwalk Empire, Wolf of Wall Street, Louie
  • Jay Cusato - Multiple award winning director A Box Came to Brooklyn. When Broomsticks Were King

story:
It’s happened to me many times, leaving me frustrated and annoyed. I've been asking myself for years why there wasn't a product that would solve this dilemma. I called countless automotive stores, walked tons of aisles, even searched Yahoo when Google results turned up nothing. I drove myself crazy trying to find a product to solve my problem. So I decided to take matters into my own hands and make a product that could keep a vehicle’s side windows clean and dry, while maintaining a factory appearance.


ViperSwiper™ Side window Wipers gives you optimum vision through your vehicle side windows. Providing you with the safest possible view of your surroundings.


ViperSwiper™ Side Window Wipers gives you maximum visibility through your side windows without having to leave your vehicle to clean the windows; all while maintaining an original factory appearance.


ViperSwiper™ Side Window Wiper has a Patent Pending no hassle, easy to attach wiper designed to keep your side window clean and clear.

ViperSwiper™ Side Window Wiper is just the first of several products being designed and brought to market this very moment. These wipers are durable, reliable, and best of all they are practically invisible, merging flawlessly with your car’s original design. Simple and understated, but with results you can see and love. No detail was over looked during technical development and we perfected each design so that it satisfies the needs of each and every customer. After all is said and done, we’re just one step away from fulfilling our goal, and ultimately with your help yours as well!

ViperSwiper™ Side Window Wiper fits most vehicle models and makes. For a compressive list of models it does not fit, click here.

Twitter
Facebook
Instagram
www.viperswiper.com

Risks & Challenges

We at ViperSwiper™ are very confident in our ability to deliver the Side Window Wiper in a timely manner. If the Side Window Wiper is successfully funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for production and distribution of the Side Window Wiper. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to make this a great experience for our backers.

story:
To place an order, please go to www.feltmark.com.

 

Imagine the Possibilities — Light Different.

The new Ellum Solar is an intuitive smart light, embedded with sensors that illuminate the dark when motion is detected. Meaningfully designed, the Ellum attaches magnetically and has a touch dimmer to manually adjust the brightness of the light, wherever you need it. Thoughtfully simple, a solar panel spans the bottom of Ellum, making charging wire free and always available.

 

Reworked, refined and distilled, the new Ellum is inventive design that is purposefully formed. The body and mount conceals the aligning neodymium magnets, allowing the Ellum to be adjustable and easily detachable. The underside conceals a huge solar panel and LED diffuser. Precision made from solid hardwood, it is handcrafted in-house by Feltmark in Los Angeles.  

 

Charging made simple.

 
 

1 Day Charge = 6 Months of use

Designed to be — Light Your Way

The Ellum is much more than a motion sensor light. With features that matter, it's bright enough to be a desk lamp, and portable enough to be a light you have with you anywhere you go. Being wireless and solar charging, it's there where you need it, adding convenience and safety when needed.

 

 

 

 

Where you need it,

 

 

 

When you need it,

 
 

Anywhere

 
 

And it's so much more...

 

 

How would you use the Ellum Solar?

Specifications

Features

Different Modes

  • Motion Sensor - illuminates when motion is detected when dark.
  • Touch Dimmer - illuminates and adjusts brightness by touch.
  • Lamp Only - Disable motion sensing and illuminates only by touch.
 

American Black Walnut

 Hard White Maple

 

Rewards

  • $54 - Early Bird: 1 Ellum in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple 
  • $59 - 1 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple 
  • $108 - Early Bird: 2 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($54 each)
  • $118 - 2 Ellum in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($59 each)
  • $162 - Early Bird: 3 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($54 each)
  • $177 - 3 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($59 each)
  • $270 - Solar Set: 5 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($54 each)
  • $432 - Solar System: 8 Ellum's in either American Walnut or Hard White Maple ($54 each)
  • $490 - Special Edition Solar Set: 5 Ellum's in either Wenge or Zebra Wood ($98 each)
  • $784 - Special Edition Solar System: 8 Ellum's in either Wenge or Zebra Wood ($98 each)

 

Timeline

 

Felt • A sensation given by an object or material when touched. 

Mark • A level or stage that is considered significant. 

Feltmark® is a Los Angeles based studio brand made from an intersection of multidisciplinary backgrounds in philosophy, industrial design and bespoke manufacturing. Our studio crafts versatile home accessories that embody patience, craftsmanship and usefulness.

Felmark was created in 2015 by childhood friends - James Choi and David Okum. Passionate about design, both went on to become award winning designers in their respected fields. Graduating from the Design program at Otis, James went on to work on critically acclaimed films and television with various studios; ending his time with the design team at Apple after 3 years. David has studied Product and Environmental Design at Art Center in Pasadena. He started his design practice in 2013, past experiences include works with Herman Miller and Bernhardt Design.

story:
As many of you already know there was a fire this last weekend at my daughter's father's apartment that ended in total loss.

I set up this campaign to help with replacing everything that was lost. 

My daughter had a good portion of all of her belongings in her dad's apartment.

I'm hoping to help them replace most of what was lost as well as make sure my daughter has a great holiday season.

The funds donated will help pay for additional lodging costs as well as replacing all the needed items that were lost in the fire.

 

The attached video is the news story about the fire, their apartment was on the top floor.

You are able to donate via PayPal or credit card. 

 

If you would like us to receive the funds right away using PayPal to make your donating will make sure of that.

 

Thanks for all of your support!

Laura

story:
Hello, My name is Glenn M Smith, and I live in Muskoka Ontario, Canada. I want to change the world to a place of Peace through teaching people what unconditional love really feels like, and this is why I'm going to do it.


I believe that love is the way. I am no longer going to sit idly by and let all the negativity and hate run rampant in our world. I believe we are all connected and that we came from love and are to return to love. I believe when people have their soul mate in their lives, they can then see the world as a loving place.


I'm going to teach people how to attract their soul mate to them and this is how I am going to do it. I am creating the 'Smart Love System', the same steps I followed to attract my soul mate, Sharon, into my life. Before Sharon came to me I always felt an emptiness in my heart even though I was in a long term marriage. I left that marriage and discovered these nine steps on my own.


I am going to be teaching contributors like you the 9 steps through 9 FREE tele-seminars and everyone who supports this campaign will be notified of the tele-seminar schedule.


If you help me to raise the $9,700.00 I need for the production and editing of the audio version of the 9 steps, you will get access to the teaching to attract true love to you. Everyone that helps contribute (no matter the amount given) will get the perks outlined to the right and notified when the product is complete.


I want to help you to attract your soul mate to you. Please join me in this campaign.


The Smart Love System

9 Weeks to a New Love, a New You, a New Life



Just Nine Weeks to Love.


Join me, attract your love...

Love and light,

Glenn


What Others are Saying:


"You are the love Glenn and I even hear it in your voice when I hear you on Radio. You create a non-judgmental and unconditional space for all that have the joy and privilege to cross your path." 

Lynette H.


"Glenn, I'd follow you to the ends of the earth! xoxo"

Bonnie K.


"I wanted to say how thankful I am for getting to know your energy and how amazing you are.  Reading your book has placed me in a space of unconditional love and understanding to the male energy like I have never done before."

Elena R.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please use the share tools to spread the word about my Smart Love System campaign. The more people who share this with the world the better off our world will be. Thanks
