story:
My Story

Hello, my name is Luke Prince and I am a senior computer science major at Tennessee Technological University in Cookeville.

I go about grocery shopping in a section-organized manner. Using a 3"x5" notepad, I subdivide a page into 4 sections and work my way through the list clockwise. In the upper right corner I shop for the fruits and veggies, then the meats in the bottom right, next the misc, and cold stuff last. My store's layout makes following this particular order most useful. On days that I have more shopping to do than usual, I will flip the page and start another subdivided list.

By taking my list and subdividing it into sections, I usually memorize a section's worth of items with only one glance at the list, and check them off after loading my cart. Another time saving piece comes in by having less distance to travel since I have trained myself to not leave a section until the sub-section of the list is finished.

My current findings in both the Android and iOS app markets seem to indicate that there is not an application that facilitates this kind of compartmentalized list making. I want to get the ball rolling! My goal is to implement a useful electronic version of my list method in Android with tablets as the initial build target (Ice Cream Sandwich), then handsets, and lastly build an iOS port if time and user interest are favorable.

Free, Libre, Open Source Software

To encourage participation in Android software development, I have made the decision to open source the MUGL project. Since I am new to Android programming, I hope to learn from people with more experience and an interest in the project that could help build it and contribute code enhancements, as well as comment on where I could do better.
 
I plan on pairing MUGL soon with the AGPLv3 license, and would like to rely on donations for the application to support it, as I would rather focus on making a good product rather than filling it with advertisements.
 
Interested? Visit the MUGL GitHub page to look into the code so far and let me know what you think. I am currently working on the most basic list portion of the application, and hope to have it be feature-complete before moving on to building sections and lists.
 
To install the latest build of MUGL, visit the Google Play page for the project.

Feature Goals

For the "complete" release of the application, I have the following features in mind as my goals:
  1. Coupon token - a visual indicator you may place on items to remind you to use a coupon for the item. Handy for short timeframe coupons on items that you may only buy on occasion.
  2. Starred items - place a star next to items that are more important than others.
  3. List sorting - sort by status (checked/unchecked), sort alphabetically, sort by starred.
  4. Item memorization - lists will store easily selectable, recently used items for making filling in a list quick with minimal typing required to expedite list building.
  5. Section memorization - option to toggle section memorization for items, using most recent section as auto-placement criterion.
  6. Arbitrary length lists - store practically a boundless number of items and lists within the app.
  7. Offline list backup - locally stored, exportable XML for restoring lists to a device.
In the future, enhancements may include:
  1. Broad device support. iOS, tablets, smartphones, potential web app.
  2. List sharing/online backup - email, text, or upload to Dropbox.
  3. Graphical User Interface - improve layout and application design based on user feedback. More customizable skins.
  4. Reminder notifications for specialized deadline lists (such as appointments, assignments, etc).
  5. Specialty lists - support for niche list building/features based on customer feedback.
As you can see, these features may be fairly involved, and I feel they will take quite some time for me to implement on my own, hence my F/LOSS approach for this first project.

The Impact

MUGL will help people save money to on their first trip to the grocery store. It will achieve this by helping them remember that pesky coupon they usually forget for chips, promote sticking with their list (avoiding impulse buys), and saving walking/browsing time by only shopping a section once. Even more time saving will come in on subsequent list making as MUGL saves previous items for future list construction.

For general list use, MUGL will in the future be limited only to your imagination... keep a list of movies you want to watch, birthdays, todos, or classroom assignments. Suggest a specialty list to me and with time permitting, I may be able to integrate it into the app in a future release!

What I Need & What You Get

The MUGL project's campaign will have its monies used in the following ways:

  1. Android development reference books.
  2. Snacks and caffeine. ;-)
  3. Potential bounties for feature implementations.
  4. Testing hardware purchase if project funding gains momentum.
See "Other Ways You Can Help" section below for information on how you can contribute to the project.
 
In return, I am offering a gathering of interesting perks, mostly self-produced photography and humorous research papers. Each tier higher than the base tier of $1 donations will get each lower tier's perk as well. For example, if you donate enough to get Perk 3, then you also receive Perks 1 and 2 as well.
 
Note: All perks gifting a prerelease feature "complete" APK copy of MUGL can only be fulfilled upon completion of MUGL. All other perks will be fulfilled regardless of MUGL's completion. :-)
 
In the unfortunate event of the project not getting fully funded occurs, I will use whatever portion this campaign gathers to pay for Android development books. It would be a super stress-relief if the project started off near-black profit wise (with the exception of time spent developing), and would motivate me to continue to give it my all. This is going to be a multi-front learning experience and I will still be carrying through with the project regardless of how well funded it ends up being.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in the project and would like to help out as an alternative to donating (or in addition to), you can boost the project in the following ways:

  1. Share this project with your family and friends. Even if you aren't  up for donating, spreading the word is a great help and well appreciated.
  2. Suggest features/improvements to the mentioned app elements.
  3. Keep me motivated by sending encouraging messages to me!
  4. Volunteer in development. I am a novice Android programmer and any gratis help I get would be heavenly!
  5. Volunteer artwork. Icons and some other imagery may be very basic without some Photoshop wizard's touch. If your artwork gets used, I will give your name and website as a contributing artist for the project in the "About" section.
  6. Donate old hardware. The more devices I can test the project on, the better!

Special Thanks

I would like to thank Jerry and Cynthia McDaniel for generously donating a ASUS Transformer Prime for development of the application. Also, thank you Summer Olmstead for helping with brain storming this fundraiser and being involved in early app development.
 
Thank you for looking at this humble IndieGoGo campaign and taking time to read through. I am thankful for your time and consideration, and hope to hear back from you (yes, you!) soon!
story_txt:
My Story
Hello, my name is Luke Prince and I am a senior computer science major at Tennessee Technological University in Cookeville.I go about grocery shopping in a section-organized manner. Using a 3"x5" notepad, I subdivide a page into 4 sections and work my way through the list clockwise. In the upper right corner I shop for the fruits and veggies, then the meats in the bottom right, next the misc, and cold stuff last. My store's layout makes following this particular order most useful. On days that I have more shopping to do than usual, I will flip the page and start another subdivided list.By taking my list and subdividing it into sections, I usually memorize a section's worth of items with only one glance at the list, and check them off after loading my cart. Another time saving piece comes in by having less distance to travel since I have trained myself to not leave a section until the sub-section of the list is finished.My current findings in both the Android and iOS app markets seem to indicate that there is not an application that facilitates this kind of compartmentalized list making. I want to get the ball rolling! My goal is to implement a useful electronic version of my list method in Android with tablets as the initial build target (Ice Cream Sandwich), then handsets, and lastly build an iOS port if time and user interest are favorable.
Free, Libre, Open Source Software
To encourage participation in Android software development, I have made the decision to open source the MUGL project. Since I am new to Android programming, I hope to learn from people with more experience and an interest in the project that could help build it and contribute code enhancements, as well as comment on where I could do better.
 
I plan on pairing MUGL soon with the AGPLv3 license, and would like to rely on donations for the application to support it, as I would rather focus on making a good product rather than filling it with advertisements.
 
Interested? Visit the MUGL GitHub page to look into the code so far and let me know what you think. I am currently working on the most basic list portion of the application, and hope to have it be feature-complete before moving on to building sections and lists.
 
To install the latest build of MUGL, visit the Google Play page for the project.
Feature Goals
For the "complete" release of the application, I have the following features in mind as my goals:

Coupon token - a visual indicator you may place on items to remind you to use a coupon for the item. Handy for short timeframe coupons on items that you may only buy on occasion.

Item memorization - lists will store easily selectable, recently used items for making filling in a list quick with minimal typing required to expedite list building.
Section memorization - option to toggle section memorization for items, using most recent section as auto-placement criterion.

Broad device support. iOS, tablets, smartphones, potential web app.
List sharing/online backup - email, text, or upload to Dropbox.
Graphical User Interface - improve layout and application design based on user feedback. More customizable skins.
Reminder notifications for specialized deadline lists (such as appointments, assignments, etc).

As you can see, these features may be fairly involved, and I feel they will take quite some time for me to implement on my own, hence my F/LOSS approach for this first project.

Even more time saving will come in on subsequent list making as MUGL saves previous items for future list construction.
For general list use, MUGL will in the future be limited only to your imagination... keep a list of movies you want to watch, birthdays, todos, or classroom assignments. Suggest a specialty list to me and with time permitting, I may be able to integrate it into the app in a future release!

The MUGL project's campaign will have its monies used in the following ways:

Android development reference books.
Snacks and caffeine. ;-)
Potential bounties for feature implementations.
Testing hardware purchase if project funding gains momentum.

See "Other Ways You Can Help" section below for information on how you can contribute to the project.
 
In return, I am offering a gathering of interesting perks, mostly self-produced photography and humorous research papers. Each tier higher than the base tier of $1 donations will get each lower tier's perk as well. For example, if you donate enough to get Perk 3, then you also receive Perks 1 and 2 as well.
 
Note: All perks gifting a prerelease feature "complete" APK copy of MUGL can only be fulfilled upon completion of MUGL. All other perks will be fulfilled regardless of MUGL's completion. :-)

story: Let's give RA a special gift as an appreciation of everything she has done for us over these four years! <3

story:
Margaret River Fire Box

This project is about building a prototype for a wood stove with a turbocharger. 

My name is Neil, and I live in Western Australia. And long story short, I want to weld up a prototype of an extremely efficient high performance wood burner stove, with a turbocharger that I have designed. 

A turbocharger will mean that the stove will have more air, and higher pressure, so this means a hotter and more efficient fire.  This means  you need less wood fuel, and a cleaner burn with less smoke.  There are a lot of environmental benefits if you have an efficient wood burner, and a stove with a turbocharger will be very efficient. The prototype will be built out of stainless steel, and will look something like this -

The burner will be a two stage device, which basically means that you burn the wood fuel in the first stage, and then you burn the smoke in the second stage - this ensures complete combustion and almost no smoke.  The air flow thru the burner will be very important, and is central to the projects technical success.  

In addition to less pollution, a high performance burner will be able to use wood scraps like twigs, garden cuttings, bark and so on as fuel - rather than only wood logs like standard wood burners. So by contributing to this project, you will be helping reduce waste and carbon emissions.

What the project needs

To progress this project it will need crowd funding of $2,750.  The funding will pay for the components that will be used to build the prototype.  As this is basically a 'backyard' project, there will be no overhead, or labor costs. The items that need to be purchased are as follows -

  • The cutting of the sheet metal by a laser cutter will be a major expense.
  • The bearings and shaft will also be purchased.
  • The hinges and hatch fittings will be purchased.
  • Welding consumables like gas, tungsten and filler rods.
I will provide regular updates of the work progress.  You will be able to follow it on the project website.  Also, if you contribute to the project, your name will be listed as a backer on the project's website - www.margaretriverfirebox.com 

The source of the project name “Margaret River Fire Box" comes from sitting on the veranda of the house in the picture below - 

This house had a lame wood burning stove, and I thought that I would like a stove with a turbocharger, just like the turbo on the little car we were driving - which went like a rocket.  And now I would like your help to make project this happen!

THE IMPACT - less waste & cleaner air!

If this project is successful, this will be good for the environment because it will mean that less wood will need to be burnt. And the air will be cleaner!

I have some experience with systems engineering and project management, so I know about some of the problems that can happen, when you take an idea like this to market.  The good thing about crowd funding is that it is a low risk way to get a project off the ground - so it's a very good thing.
  
You Can Help!
If you can’t contribute financially, not to worry, you can still make some noise on your social network, this help will be critical to the success of this project.  And there is a lot more information on our project website - margaretriverfirebox.com

story:
UPDATE: CES 2016

The past week members of our team have been attending the 2016 Consumer Electronics Show. There, Oomi received an Innovation Award in the smart home category! Innovation Awards are given to products that stand out in their design and engineering. We're excited that Oomi has been well received and can not wait to show off more of what it can do!



UPDATE: November 19, 2015

We know everyone is looking forward to receiving their Oomi.  We are working diligently to get everything finalized to get ready to ship to our backers, but we have some exciting news to share.  Starting today, you can get a sneak peak of Oomi at Target Open House in San Francisco.  
Starting tomorrow, we'll also be offering a great deal on a limited number of Oomi kits - don't miss your one last chance to get a great deal on Oomi before it's available at retail. Check back here often!!! 

Thank You, ComOOMIty!

Wow! Look what you've done comOOMIty! You've made Oomi the highest funded smart home system on any crowdfunding platform. We are humbled and thrilled by the response to our simplified approach to smart home. You've fired us up to get moving on to the next steps in our journey to bring you the best smart home solution on the planet!

Don't forget to go to www.Oomi.com and sign up for our newsletter for the latest updates, and get the inside edge on exclusives and specials.





See The Campaign


WELCOME TO YOUR SMARTER HOME.

Your time at home is precious. Oomi helps you make the most of it.
Home Security: Notifications anywhere in the world.
Entertainment: Movies, Music and Internet at your finger tips.
Comfort: Your environment as your like it.
Ambiance: Lighting exactly the way you want.
Oomi does all of this simply and sets up in under 5 minutes. 

SIMPLE TO SET-UP

Setup in Action - Smart Home Made Simple

EASY TO USE

Oomi Touch is the ultimate controller. "No more of this 'smartphone control makes everything super amazing' nonsense." (thanks, Slashgear) Oomi Touch is stunning. It is encased edge-to-edge in glass with a fully capacitive display and tactile buttons for quick control of your entertainment. You'll wonder how you ever lived without it.


Strikingly Functional

The responsive display of Oomi Touch is fully customizable so you can control what matters most to you.


Tactile Controls

Oomi has physical buttons to quickly pause your movie or skip to the next song on your playlist.


TV + Music + Ambiance

Oomi Touch is the only controller you need. Goodbye remotes.

USEFUL OUT OF THE BOX



Oomi is Useful

Oomi Cube is the brain of your smart home. Most smart homes would call it their "hub". Hubs usually don't do much.  Oomi Cube is packed with 8 environment sensors, a night vision camera, and a bit more. Having sensors inside of Cube allows it to know more about your home. When your Oomi Cube knows more it can do more for you. For example, because Oomi Cube already has a light sensor in it, your home can brighten your lighting when a room gets darker automatically.


Oomi helps manage your home

YOUR PERFECT HOME

You are unique. Your home should be too. We made some incredible accessories so you can create a home that does exactly what you need.


Oomi Cam is the ultimate security accessory. It contains a siren, sound detection, and night vision, just to name a few of its features. It's also weatherized so that you can put it anywhere inside or outside your home.


Light affects the way we feel. Set Bulb to a forest green or songbird blue to change the atmosphere of a room. Wake up naturally with Bulb's gradual sunrise effect or relax after a long day with a warm sunset hue.


Plug is the easy way to turn an outlet into a smart outlet. Control a hard to reach lamp wirelessly or monitor the energy consumption of your appliances. Best of all, Plug has a USB port on the side to charge your devices without taking up an outlet.


Oomi LED Strip is the ultimate aesthetics enhancer. Put them under your bed or behind a cabinet to illuminate a room. Set your lighting to a dim lust red, or a powerful midnight blue. Strip is 9 feet long and trimmable so that you make it shorter if you need.


MultiSensor gives you more insight into what is going on inside of your home by detecting motion, temperature, light, UV rays, vibrations, and humidity. It can notify you if something suspicious happens or turn on your lights when you enter a room.


Improve your security by knowing when doors and windows are opened or closed. Put it on cabinets containing valuable or dangerous items to keep them safe. Have your pantry lights set to come on as soon as you open the door.


What if you could know about a flood before it was a problem? Now you can. Place Water Sensor under a leaky sink or in a flood-prone basement to get notified whenever water is around. You can also use Water Sensor to monitor the water level of a tank.


We have two special accessories

Streamer is the ultimate television companion. It streams HD media directly from the internet to your television. Quickly catch up on your shows on Netflix or HBO GO.

Oomi air monitors air contaminants to make sure your air is healthy. It senses PM2.5, which are EPA monitored particles that are one fortieth the width of a human hair.


Connecting accessories

With Oomi, adding accessories to your home is as simple as you would expect.


The Ultimate Controller

SMARTHOME DOES NOT MEAN IOT

It might seem like a no-brainer that your smart home should work even when your internet is down. Oddly enough, that hasn't been the case. With Oomi, it finally is.

IMPROVE YOUR HOME SECURITY

With Oomi your home is not only smarter, it is more secure.  But we recognize that everyone's security needs are different, so we have created three perfect options so you can create the perfect system for you and your family.  Out of the box, Oomi offers a numbers of security enhancing features at no additional cost:


Deter

Robbers target empty homes. Have your home mimic your lighting patters while you're away so it appears occupied.


Detect

With 8 different sensors including glass break and motion detection, you will know when something is wrong.


Notify

Oomi will notify you if anything seems out of place in your home while you're away.

If you want even more security, you can add Personal Home Monitoring Plus (PHM).


Finally, you can have your Oomi home professionally monitored by a UL listed central monitoring station. This provides the same emergency response service offered by most home security companies, but with Oomi you don't have to make an appointment or have a stranger in your home to install.
And, in most cases, with 24/7 professional monitoring you can save money on your homeowner's insurance.  Even better? Right now you can get a $40 discount off the regular price.


Pick the Perfect Security Package 

SOME MORE DETAILS

Oomi is coming world-wide

We also have phone apps

Oomi Touch will make you never want to use a phone app to control anything in your home ever again. That being said, we don't expect you to carry it around with you. We've got a great app that allows you to monitor and control your home from anywhere in the world.

Oomi is smart. Really smart.

With Oomi, you can design the intelligent home of your dreams.  But we offer you more than just the ability to create automated recipes based on “if this then that” logic. Oomi learns how you live. It learns what you do to keep your family safe and your home comfortable.  It learns how you like to relax, and how you like to have fun.  Then, it makes recommendations on what it can manage for you, so you can spend more time on the things that matter the most.

Security is important. We've got you covered.

We want your home to be secure.  Sometimes the simplest solutions are the best. That's why we've created this magnetic lens cap cover for the camera, so you can be sure prying eyes are kept at bay.  We also use 128-bit encryption for every communication, both between devices inside your home and between your home and the cloud. These are just two of 7 unique security features we have built in to the Oomi system.  You can learn more here.

COMOOMITY

Too many manufacturers like to hook you in to their products.  They build great systems, but later reveal that ONLY the products made or sold by them will work. Oomi is different.  We made our system incredibly easy to use through our innovations, but we also realize that there are many great products made by many great companies.  Our goal is to seek out some of these great technologies, and then make it as easy as possible to use these products with Oomi.

Indiegogo - Core: Holographic Stereo Speakers ($1,400,000 Funded)
Indiegogo - Luna: Smart Bed ($1,100,000 Funded)
Indiegogo - Flic: The Wireless Smart Button ($850,000 Funded)

Integrate other products into your Oomi System

No one wants to be locked into a closed ecosystem. That's why we're integrating  Oomi with some exceptional technologies. We've built Oomi with the next generation of Z-Wave, the most widely used wireless home automation technology.

You can connect all sorts of things to your Oomi home, from door locks that secure automatically when you go out, to air conditioners that cool your home when you're coming back.

Inside Sneak Peek: Partner Device Integration

STRETCH GOALS

$600,000
Oomi Door/Window Sensor

$800,000
Oomi Cam

$1,000,000
White Touch

$1,400,000
White Oomi Accessories

Here's when things will happen

STRETCH GOALS

OUR TEAM

We are Fantem, the creators of Oomi. We believe that time at home is precious. It's when we get to pursue our passions, relax, and be with the ones we love. So we asked the question: how can we help everyone get more out of their time at home? Our answer: simplify aspects  of everyday life - like security, entertainment, and comfort - to allow you more time to focus on what matters most. We have created Oomi. With Oomi, we believe we can revolutionize the future of smart homes by removing the complexity and frustration associated with existing systems.

Winston Cheng
12 years experience in technology and entrepreneurship with over 8 years in smart homes. He has already taken 2 start ups to multi-million dollar profitability. Silicon Valley born and bred, he is a EECS geek from Cal Berkeley.


Colin Marshall
20+ years broad spectrum experience including business development, marketing, strategy, execution, entrepreneurship and investment. Georgetown University alumnus, he actually knows what a Hoya is.


Chris Hall
20+ years CE industry veteran, many spent with some of the worlds most recognized brands. Now focused exclusively on smart homes, he has successfully mentored several start-ups from the garage to more attractive digs.


Rodny Mella
Industrial design guru and artist, his 19+ year portfolio includes work with Disney and race cars.  With over 7 years in smart homes he now dreams of bringing elegance to the connected home.


Shivaun Ryan
Having completed her degree in IT and Business at Trinity College in Dublin, Shivaun now focuses her attention on the development of all things connected, specifically targeting end user adoption and ease of use.


Brian Hirsh
With his degree in Marketing and Economics from the University of Miami, Brian has dedicated himself to the creation and popularization of technology that redefines the way in which we all live our lives.

In addition we have over 150 other dedicated team members committed to building a smarter future.

FAQ


1. Creating My Oomi

Tech scares me. Should I buy Oomi?
Yes! Oomi is incredibly simple and requires no technical knowledge.

Which accessories should I get?
It really depends on what you want out of your home. If you want to make your home more secure then Oomi MultiSensor would be the best option. If you want to monitor secure or dangerous areas of the home, then Oomi Door and Window Sensor is great. Oomi Bulb is ideal for those who want to change the ambiance of a room. Oomi Plug is fantastic for convenience as well as those interested in monitoring their energy consumption.

How many accessories do I need?
The more accessories you have the more robust your system will be. There is also synergy when a home has multiple accessories. We find that 3+ accessories is the point at which you really start to enjoy the benefits of having a smarter home.

Can I add more accessories later?
Of course! To add new accessories to your Oomi system simply tap them with your Oomi Touch. 

How do I select my accessories?
A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

How do I purchase additional accessories?
We'll be selling some additional accessories during the campaign through spontaneous flash sales at a discounted Indiegogo price. Additionally, we'll be introducing a few perks at the end for individual accessories.

How will I know about flash sales?
If you've bought an Oomi pack then you'll be notified via email. You can also follow us on our Facebook and Twitter pages to make sure you stay in the loop.

How much will more accessories cost?
We're offering all of our early backers the best price here on Indiegogo. After the campaign is over they will retail for $49.99 per accessory.

Can I get a second cube for my office?
You sure can! You can buy an Oomi system for anywhere you want to make smarter or more secure.

I want to get get notified, how can I join?
Donating as little as a dollar will get you on the Indiegogo list for all future updates. We'll also make posts on our Facebook and Twitter pages as well as to our email subscribers.

2. Purchasing Questions

How do I know my purchase went through?
You will receive a confirmation email within the first 24-36 hours after your purchase. Sometimes the orders take longer to process.

I haven't gotten my confirmation email yet, should I be worried?
We're getting to everyone's emails as quickly as we can, but it could take as long as 48 hours to hear from us. If it's been longer than that then something might be wrong. Not to worry, just email us at contact@oomihome.com and we'll help get everything straightened out.

How do I select my accessories?
A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

How do I select my Oomi Cube color?
It's the same process as the accessories. A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

Does shipping cost extra?
Shipping for the United States is free. International shipping is an extra $39 per kit. Other limited time perks have their shipping cost listed in the perk description.

How do I add international shipping to my purchase?
You can pay for shipping by purchasing the International Shipping Add-On perk. 

I forgot to add my international shipping cost... what should I do?
Oops! No worries, you can go ahead and pay the shipping cost now. Make sure you are logged in with the same Indiegogo account you used to purchase your Oomi. When the campaign ends we will make sure everything is as it should be. If you haven't added the shipping cost or if you paid too much by the end of the campaign we'll send you an email and get everything worked out.

I ordered two perks, do I pay full price shipping for both of them?
Take $8 off for additional perks that ship together. If all your perks ship in October, pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk. If you also have perks that ship in January (Oomi Cam, Oomi In-Wall Dimmer, and H2Oomi), again pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk.

I'm ordering a flash sale perk but already ordered a kit, do I need to add more shipping?
Take $8 off for additional perks that ship together. If all your perks ship in October, pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk. If you also have perks that ship in January (Oomi Cam, Oomi In-Wall Dimmer, and H2Oomi), again pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk.

I overpaid shipping, what should I do?
Just hold tight, after the campaign is over we'll be emailing everyone who has overpaid.

Is there a monthly fee?
Nope. Once you buy Oomi you are good to go.

Do you have a warranty?
Yes, we have a 12 month warranty that covers any manufacturing defects. If you ever have a problem with any part of your Oomi system just contact us and we'll do our best to make it right.

Can I return my Oomi?
Unfortunately no, all of our sales here on Indiegogo are final. But, if you are having a problem or are unhappy with your Oomi you can always contact us and we will try to work something out.

I want to become a distributor. Who should I contact?
Please reach out to our team at contact@oomihome.com.

3. Privacy and Security

Can I turn off the camera?
Yes!
The camera has a notification light hardwired into its power supply. This means that whenever the camera is capturing video, the light will be on. Additionally, we have a physical power shut off toggle. When toggled off, the power connection to the camera is broken and there is no way to turn the camera back on without having physical access to your Cube. We also include a magnetic lens cap for your camera which snaps onto the font of Cube blocking the camera all together, so we've got you covered.

What does Oomi think about Privacy?
We know that privacy must be taken incredibly seriously when it concerns your home. We will always be transparent about how your data is used to help you. Our policy is that your data belongs to you and should be used to make your life better.
If you have any concerns about your privacy please reach out to us and we will answer all of your questions as clearly as we can.

Does my data leave my home?
Oomi processes your data anonymously in the cloud. This allows you to control and monitor your home from anywhere in the world. It also allows your home to use our advanced intelligence algorithms to start automating your devices.

Do I need to have my data processed in the cloud?
No. We do everything to secure the privacy of your data. Still, we know that some people would prefer to avoid it all together. You are free to opt out of anonymous cloud processing at any time. Features that require cloud processing will no longer work. You may opt back in later if you choose.

Is my data secure?
To create a secure system we use 128-bit AES encryption for every communication, both the communications between devices inside of your home as well as those between your home and the cloud. We also have six additional unique security measures put in place to make sure that your system is safe. You can learn more here.

4. Technical Questions

Does Oomi support other smart home products?
Yes! There are some fantastic smart home products out there that you might already have. You will be able to integrate the most popular products into your Oomi system right from the start. We will continue to integrate others in the future as well.

Does Oomi support other Z-wave devices?
Yes. Oomi has the latest generation Z-wave chip in it and is compatible with all previous generations of Z-wave devices.

Will my devices be set to the right Z-Wave frequency?
Yes. We will ship the devices set to the appropriate frequency for your shipping address. If you want them set to a frequency other than the one for the area they're being shipped to, please contact us at contact@oomihome.com.

Will you have an Oomi phone app?
Yes. Oomi Touch is meant for inside your home. We're making iOS and Android apps so that you can monitor and control your home remotely.

How much will the apps cost?
They are going to be free, of course.

What happens if the internet goes out?
Don't worry, your house will still work. Some functionality does require access to the cloud and will be temporarily unavailable until your internet is back up. Most notably, the Oomi phone apps will not be able to control your home.

What if the power goes out?
If your power goes out then your Oomi system will temporarily be down. As soon as you get power again everything will be back up and running. 

What is the range of Oomi Cube?
Outdoors Oomi has a range of 100 meters. Inside your home the range depends on what type of home you have. The accessories build a mesh network, which means that the more you have the better signal all of them will receive.

Do I need to recharge my accessories?
Most of our accessories draw power from whatever they're plugged into. The two exceptions are Oomi Streamer which comes with a power cable and Oomi MultiSensor which uses a preinstalled CR123A battery. MultiSensor will work for over 2 years before needing its battery replaced.

Why Z-wave and not ZigBee?
A lot of people are curious about this one. In a nutshell, Z-wave offered what we needed. ZigBee is a fragmented standard. Even if we had the latest ZigBee chip inside of Oomi there would be many ZigBee products that wouldn't connect. Most of the devices people want to connect to their Oomi systems use either Wi-Fi or Z-Wave. We want to spend our time making our system more robust and intuitive.

Will you be releasing an API?
Yes, and No. We get this question a lot.  We understand that there are many users out there, especially early fans of home automation where API was all but required to do the things they wanted to do.  But we believe this is also one of the things that has prevented mass adoption of smart home technology - the perception that you need to have a technical background, just to do cool things.  We have elected to go a different route with Oomi, and at this time we are focusing our efforts on creating the best user experience we can so that all can enjoy a great smart home experience. We also want to be able to provide the best customer support we can. In our opinion, to properly support an API community requires dedicated resources to support that effort, not just leave it up to some chat rooms or a corporate FAQ that gets updated once in never.  So no, we do not plan to release our API to individuals when we launch. For some of you, we realize that may mean that Oomi may not be the best choice at first.  That being said, an API is something we value and is currently available to select partners, and will be available to end consumers in the future when we are ready to be 100% behind it.
story_txt:
UPDATE: CES 2016
The past week members of our team have been attending the 2016 Consumer Electronics Show. There, Oomi received an Innovation Award in the smart home category! Innovation Awards are given to products that stand out in their design and engineering. We're excited that Oomi has been well received and can not wait to show off more of what it can do!



UPDATE: November 19, 2015
We know everyone is looking forward to receiving their Oomi.  We are working diligently to get everything finalized to get ready to ship to our backers, but we have some exciting news to share.  Starting today, you can get a sneak peak of Oomi at Target Open House in San Francisco.  
Starting tomorrow, we'll also be offering a great deal on a limited number of Oomi kits - don't miss your one last chance to get a great deal on Oomi before it's available at retail. Check back here often!!! 

Thank You, ComOOMIty!
Wow! Look what you've done comOOMIty! You've made Oomi the highest funded smart home system on any crowdfunding platform. We are humbled and thrilled by the response to our simplified approach to smart home. You've fired us up to get moving on to the next steps in our journey to bring you the best smart home solution on the planet!
Don't forget to go to www.Oomi.com and sign up for our newsletter for the latest updates, and get the inside edge on exclusives and specials.






See The Campaign




WELCOME TO YOUR SMARTER HOME.

Your time at home is precious. Oomi helps you make the most of it.Home Security: Notifications anywhere in the world.Entertainment: Movies, Music and Internet at your finger tips.Comfort: Your environment as your like it.Ambiance: Lighting exactly the way you want.Oomi does all of this simply and sets up in under 5 minutes. 






SIMPLE TO SET-UP



Setup in Action - Smart Home Made Simple





EASY TO USE




Oomi Touch is the ultimate controller. "No more of this 'smartphone control makes everything super amazing' nonsense." (thanks, Slashgear) Oomi Touch is stunning. It is encased edge-to-edge in glass with a fully capacitive display and tactile buttons for quick control of your entertainment. You'll wonder how you ever lived without it.



Strikingly Functional
The responsive display of Oomi Touch is fully customizable so you can control what matters most to you.



Tactile Controls

Oomi has physical buttons to quickly pause your movie or skip to the next song on your playlist.



TV + Music + Ambiance
Oomi Touch is the only controller you need.  Goodbye remotes.





USEFUL OUT OF THE BOX



Oomi is Useful
Oomi Cube is the brain of your smart home. Most smart homes would call it their "hub". Hubs usually don't do much.  Oomi Cube is packed with 8 environment sensors, a night vision camera, and a bit more. Having sensors inside of Cube allows it to know more about your home. When your Oomi Cube knows more it can do more for you. For example, because Oomi Cube already has a light sensor in it, your home can brighten your lighting when a room gets darker automatically.


Oomi helps manage your home






YOUR PERFECT HOME

You are unique. Your home should be too. We made some incredible accessories so you can create a home that does exactly what you need.





Oomi Cam is the ultimate security accessory. It contains a siren, sound detection, and night vision, just to name a few of its features. It's also weatherized so that you can put it anywhere inside or outside your home.


Light affects the way we feel. Set Bulb to a forest green or songbird blue to change the atmosphere of a room. Wake up naturally with Bulb's gradual sunrise effect or relax after a long day with a warm sunset hue.


Plug is the easy way to turn an outlet into a smart outlet. Control a 
hard to reach lamp wirelessly or monitor the energy consumption of your appliances. Best of all, Plug has a USB port on the side to charge your devices without taking up an outlet.


Oomi LED Strip is the ultimate aesthetics enhancer. Put them under your bed or behind a cabinet to illuminate a room. Set your lighting to a dim lust red, or a powerful midnight blue. Strip is 9 feet long and trimmable so that you make it shorter if you need.


MultiSensor gives you more insight into what is going on inside of your home by detecting motion, temperature, light, UV rays, vibrations, and humidity. It can notify you if something suspicious happens or turn on your lights when you enter a room.


Improve your security by knowing when doors and windows are opened or closed. Put it on cabinets containing valuable or dangerous items to keep them safe. Have your pantry lights set to come on as soon as you open the door.


What if you could know about a flood before it was a problem? Now you can. Place Water Sensor under a leaky sink or in a flood-prone basement to get notified whenever water is around. You can also use Water Sensor to monitor the water level of a tank.




We have two special accessories



Streamer is the ultimate television companion. It streams HD media directly from the internet to your television. Quickly catch up on your shows on Netflix or HBO GO.

Learn More




Oomi air monitors air contaminants to make sure your air is healthy. It senses PM2.5, which are EPA monitored particles that are one fortieth the width of a human hair.
Learn More




Connecting accessories
With Oomi, adding accessories to your home is as simple as you would expect.


The Ultimate Controller




SMARTHOME DOES NOT MEAN IOT


It might seem like a no-brainer that your smart home should work even when your internet is down. Oddly enough, that hasn't been the case. With Oomi, it finally is.




IMPROVE YOUR HOME SECURITY


With Oomi your home is not only smarter, it is more secure.  But we recognize that everyone's security needs are different, so we have created three perfect options so you can create the perfect system for you and your family.  Out of the box, Oomi offers a numbers of security enhancing features at no additional cost:




Deter
Robbers target empty homes. Have your home mimic your lighting patters while you're away so it appears occupied.



Detect
With 8 different sensors including glass break and motion detection, you will know when something is wrong.




Notify

Oomi will notify you if anything seems out of place in your home while you're away.

If you want even more security, you can add Personal Home Monitoring Plus (PHM).


Finally, you can have your Oomi home professionally monitored by a UL listed central monitoring station. This provides the same emergency response service offered by most home security companies, but with Oomi you don't have to make an appointment or have a stranger in your home to install.
And, in most cases, with 24/7 professional monitoring you can save money on your homeowner's insurance.  Even better? Right now you can get a $40 discount off the regular price.



Pick the Perfect Security Package 




SOME MORE DETAILS

Oomi is coming world-wide

We also have phone apps

Oomi Touch will make you never want to use a phone app to control anything in your home ever again. That being said, we don't expect you to carry it around with you. We've got a great app that allows you to monitor and control your home from anywhere in the world.
Oomi is smart. Really smart.
With Oomi, you can design the intelligent home of your dreams.  But we offer you more than just the ability to create automated recipes based on “if this then that” logic. Oomi learns how you live. It learns what you do to keep your family safe and your home comfortable.  It learns how you like to relax, and how you like to have fun.  Then, it makes recommendations on what it can manage for you, so you can spend more time on the things that matter the most.
Security is important. We've got you covered.

We want your home to be secure.  Sometimes the simplest solutions are the best. That's why we've created this magnetic lens cap cover for the camera, so you can be sure prying eyes are kept at bay.  We also use 128-bit encryption for every communication, both between devices inside your home and between your home and the cloud. These are just two of 7 unique security features we have built in to the Oomi system.  You can learn more here.




COMOOMITY

Too many manufacturers like to hook you in to their products.  They build great systems, but later reveal that ONLY the products made or sold by them will work. Oomi is different.  We made our system incredibly easy to use through our innovations, but we also realize that there are many great products made by many great companies.  Our goal is to seek out some of these great technologies, and then make it as easy as possible to use these products with Oomi.
Indiegogo - Core: Holographic Stereo Speakers ($1,400,000 Funded)

Indiegogo - Luna: Smart Bed ($1,100,000 Funded)

Indiegogo - Flic: The Wireless Smart Button ($850,000 Funded)





Integrate other products into your Oomi System

No one wants to be locked into a closed ecosystem. That's why we're integrating  Oomi with some exceptional technologies. We've built Oomi with the next generation of Z-Wave, the most widely used wireless home automation technology.
You can connect all sorts of things to your Oomi home, from door locks that secure automatically when you go out, to air conditioners that cool your home when you're coming back.

Inside Sneak Peek: Partner Device Integration




STRETCH GOALS






$600,000Oomi Door/Window Sensor








$800,000Oomi Cam








White Touch Reveal
$1,000,000White Touch








$1,400,000White Oomi Accessories




Here's when things will happen




STRETCH GOALS






OUR TEAM

We are Fantem, the creators of Oomi. We believe that time at home is precious. It's when we get to pursue our passions, relax, and be with the ones we love. So we asked the question: how can we help everyone get more out of their time at home? Our answer: simplify aspects  of everyday life - like security, entertainment, and comfort - to allow you more time to focus on what matters most. We have created Oomi. With Oomi, we believe we can revolutionize the future of smart homes by removing the complexity and frustration associated with existing systems.

Winston Cheng12 years experience in technology and entrepreneurship with over 8 years in smart homes. He has already taken 2 start ups to multi-million dollar profitability. Silicon Valley born and bred, he is a EECS geek from Cal Berkeley.


Colin Marshall20+ years broad spectrum experience including business
development, marketing, strategy, execution, entrepreneurship and investment. Georgetown University alumnus, he actually knows what a Hoya is.


Chris Hall20+ years CE industry veteran, many spent with some of the
worlds most recognized brands. Now focused exclusively on smart homes, he has
successfully mentored several start-ups from the garage to more attractive
digs.


Rodny MellaIndustrial design guru and artist, his 19+ year portfolio includes
work with Disney and race cars.  With over
7 years in smart homes he now dreams of bringing elegance to the connected home.


Shivaun RyanHaving completed her degree in IT and Business at Trinity College in Dublin, Shivaun now  focuses her attention on the development of all things connected, specifically targeting end user adoption and ease of use.


Brian HirshWith his degree in Marketing and Economics from the University of Miami, Brian has dedicated himself to the creation and popularization of technology that redefines the way in which we all live our lives.
In addition we have over 150 other dedicated team members committed to building a smarter future.


FAQ



1. Creating My Oomi
Tech scares me. Should I buy Oomi?
Yes! Oomi is incredibly simple and requires no technical knowledge.

Which accessories should I get?
It really depends on what you want out of your home. If you want to make your home more secure then Oomi MultiSensor would be the best option. If you want to monitor secure or dangerous areas of the home, then Oomi Door and Window Sensor is great. Oomi Bulb is ideal for those who want to change the ambiance of a room. Oomi Plug is fantastic for convenience as well as those interested in monitoring their energy consumption.

How many accessories do I need?
The more accessories you have the more robust your system will be. There is also synergy when a home has multiple accessories. We find that 3+ accessories is the point at which you really start to enjoy the benefits of having a smarter home.

Can I add more accessories later?
Of course! To add new accessories to your Oomi system simply tap them with your Oomi Touch. 

How do I select my accessories?
A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

How do I purchase additional accessories?
We'll be selling some additional accessories during the campaign through spontaneous flash sales at a discounted Indiegogo price. Additionally, we'll be introducing a few perks at the end for individual accessories.

How will I know about flash sales?
If you've bought an Oomi pack then you'll be notified via email. You can also follow us on our Facebook and Twitter pages to make sure you stay in the loop.

How much will more accessories cost?
We're offering all of our early backers the best price here on Indiegogo. After the campaign is over they will retail for $49.99 per accessory.

Can I get a second cube for my office?
You sure can! You can buy an Oomi system for anywhere you want to make smarter or more secure.

I want to get get notified, how can I join?
Donating as little as a dollar will get you on the Indiegogo list for all future updates. We'll also make posts on our Facebook and Twitter pages as well as to our email subscribers.

2. Purchasing Questions
How do I know my purchase went through?
You will receive a confirmation email within the first 24-36 hours after your purchase. Sometimes the orders take longer to process.

I haven't gotten my confirmation email yet, should I be worried?
We're getting to everyone's emails as quickly as we can, but it could take as long as 48 hours to hear from us. If it's been longer than that then something might be wrong. Not to worry, just email us at contact@oomihome.com and we'll help get everything straightened out.


How do I select my accessories?
A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

How do I select my Oomi Cube color?
It's the same process as the accessories. A few weeks after the campaign finishes we will send out an email to everyone about selecting their accessories. We'll include a link where you can let us know which accessories you want to be included in your kit.

Does shipping cost extra?
Shipping for the United States is free. International shipping is an extra $39 per kit. Other limited time perks have their shipping cost listed in the perk description.

How do I add international shipping to my purchase?
You can pay for shipping by purchasing the International Shipping Add-On perk. 

I forgot to add my international shipping cost... what should I do?
Oops! No worries, you can go ahead and pay the shipping cost now. Make sure you are logged in with the same Indiegogo account you used to purchase your Oomi. When the campaign ends we will make sure everything is as it should be. If you haven't added the shipping cost or if you paid too much by the end of the campaign we'll send you an email and get everything worked out.

I ordered two perks, do I pay full price shipping for both of them?
Take $8 off for additional perks that ship together. If all your perks ship in October, pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk. If you also have perks that ship in January (Oomi Cam, Oomi In-Wall Dimmer, and H2Oomi), again pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk.

I'm ordering a flash sale perk but already ordered a kit, do I need to add more shipping?
Take $8 off for additional perks that ship together. If all your perks ship in October, pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk. If you also have perks that ship in January (Oomi Cam, Oomi In-Wall Dimmer, and H2Oomi), again pay full shipping for the first perk and take $8 off each additional perk.

I overpaid shipping, what should I do?
Just hold tight, after the campaign is over we'll be emailing everyone who has overpaid.

Is there a monthly fee?
Nope. Once you buy Oomi you are good to go.

Do you have a warranty?
Yes, we have a 12 month warranty that covers any manufacturing defects. If you ever have a problem with any part of your Oomi system just contact us and we'll do our best to make it right.

Can I return my Oomi?
Unfortunately no, all of our sales here on Indiegogo are final. But, if you are having a problem or are unhappy with your Oomi you can always contact us and we will try to work something out.

story:
Aesthetics are somewhat lacking at the Dirty 330, and brothers have been working to improve that! We've put in elbow grease where we could, but we need funds to farther improve our Chapter House. 

We're looking to replace the light fixtures outside with something more visually appealing and less broken/yellow. This effort would cost $500, but the Executive Board has agreed to match donations 1:1! Just $250 from the alumni of Zeta Mu can help make this goal a reality.

Donate today! The founding fathers would have wanted it.

story:
Fed up with figuring out the complicated VPN settings?

It all started when I was working in China, I found a large number of websites blocked by the Great Firewall that were essential for me to access, such as my financial institutions in the US, as well as Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, just to name a few. I had used numerous VPN services and it was frustrating to deal with software installation and updating the server lists again and again. I had also tried different free or paid proxy services and found most of them with similar problems.

 

There came the original PlutoBoXX in September 2013, it is designed to solve the software installation and updating servers problems, but the setup procedure was a bit clunky, and the built in power supply was not necessary. The original PlutoBoXX only supports our VPN infrastructure (www.PlutoVPN.com), so there is a limited choice on servers.  PlutoBoXX is based on open architecture, using Open DD-WRT as a base; we added our own intelligent routing algorithm, and our own user interface. A patent has been filed for this concept, and we are the first of its kind on the market.


PlutoBoXX

I have used the original PlutoBoXX in China with great success! It is not a 100% smooth when watching a long streaming video, but most of the time it is stable. It can be slow at times depending on the type of Internet connectivity you use. Through analyzing and listening to our customers’ feedback, we set to kick off the second generation — PlutoBoXX II –it’s even more compact and easier to use. PlutoBoXX II has had major improvements over its first generation. Now, it is truly a Plug and Play device with no setting configuration from users. The device will automatically detect your connection method (via another router, or direct connection to Cable or DSL modem), and connect to the available VPN servers, or TOR bridges, without any user interaction. Advance users can still go to our website: www.PlutoBoXX.com and click “Go To My PlutoBoXX” to make changes. It is still based on Open DD-WRT software, and used OpenVPN protocol.

 

PlutoBoXXII


PlutoBoXX II supports TOR project, as well as our own VPN infrastructure. TOR is an open network that allows user to surf anonymously and securely. If you want to learn more about TOR, please visit:  "http://www.torproject.org" www.torproject.org.   

If you’re seeking anonymity, PlutoBoXX is the way to go. PlutoBoXX II works by routing your internet traffic through Tor’s network of randomly selected relays that are scattered around the world or through our own VPN infrastructure (depending on where you are).

PlutoBoXX II is the ultimate Internet security solution that secures your web surfing and maintains your anonymity and privacy with maximum protection.

We are looking to raise $7,500 for continued production of PlutoBoXX II. We need your support to bring internet freedom back in your control.

Why would you need PlutoBoXX II

Are you concerned about your online privacy and security?

Have you ever been frustrated by not being able to access the social sites, like Facebook or YouTube due to government internet censorship?

Have you ever been frustrated that you weren’t able to access the sites in your home country while travelling due to geo-based restrictions?

Tired of all the hassles of downloading / installing software of getting a VPN connection?

Are you looking for the best VPN services?

By connecting to PlutoBoXX II, you are able to unblock all geo-restricted websites and surf websites with complete anonymity, which means you have full access to watch your favorite TV programs or access any blocked / restricted websites in your place of residence.

By connecting to PlutoBoXX II, we provide you anonymity, privacy, and security online.

Benefits and Features of using PlutoBoXX II 

  • Plug & Play device – no set-up, no software installation

  • Instant access to VPN connection or TOR bridge, depending on which one is available

  • Ability to share

  • Unlimited bandwidth

  • Anonymous and secure internet surfing

  • Online security and privacy protection

  • Bypass geographical restrictions

  • Ideal for home and office

  • Compact and portable –2.2 x 2.2 x 0.71 inches (W x D x H)

  • Powered by micro-USB

  • Covers area of 160 -210 ft²

  • No subscription fees are required

 

Disclaimer: We do not encourage or recommend the use of our products in countries with restrictive control over the Internet. Users shall bear the full risk and any potential liability to the Government. 

 

Compatibility

Windows

Mac OS

Linux

iOS, Android

Contacting us

If you have any queries, concerns, or comments regarding our services or products, please contact us support@PlutoBoXX.com. Thank you.

Ways you can help

Support Us

We are concerned about Internet freedom and online security. PlutoBoXX II is a revolutionary device in the market. It is production-ready and just needs to bootstrap the production. Everyone can take a step to protect their own security and privacy. We love to see more and more people around the world enjoy internet surfing without restrictions.

Share our campaign

Help us spread the words out, share this page to your friends.

Shipping:

Shipping in the USA, China, Hong Kong and Macau is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country.

PlutoBoXX II will be available byJan 2015.

PlutoBoXX II's device is produced in "white" color. Please let us know what your preferred color  by writing to us at support@PlutoBoXX.com. Our goal is to raise $100,000 and once we do, we will have a colorful selection of PlutoBoXX II for you.


Q & A

Q. What devices / operating system are supported by PlutoBoXX II?

A. It could be the access point for multiple WiFi enabled devices, such as PC, laptop, tablets, smartphones, etc.

Q. What is the factory default setting of PlutoBoXX II?

A. Wi-Fi router with VPN connection.

Q. Is PlutoBoXX II user- friendly?

A. Yes, no user input, just simply Plug and Play - there is no set-up required. The LED light will come ON once the device is in connection. The first available VPN server is automatically selected.

Q. Do I need to pay subscription fees?

A. No subscription fees are required.

Q. What is Tor?

A. The Tor project is a non-profit organization that conducts research and development into online privacy and anonymity. The Onion Router is an Internet networking protocol and make it difficult, if not impossible, for any snoops to track your browsing habits or your location.

Q. Who owns Tor?

A. Tor is a free application and Tor protocol is open source, meaning anyone can view the code and incorporate it into their own software.

Q. What is the difference between Tor and proxy servers?

A. When you use a proxy, you leave a trail of log files around the internet.With Tor, it routes through several hops to obscure the IP address. Here’s the explanation: While using Tor, you connect from your router to an onion router, to another onion router, etc,etc.

Q. What is the difference between Tor and VPN?

A.The Tor servers route through different servers that making you untraceable online. For VPN, it routes through the servers and assigns a new IP address for all applications/data on your computer in order to access the information - one of the most significant benefits associated is its security, every bit of the data transmitted through the network is secured via 128bit encryption, that ensures users an anonymous and secure internet surfing and bypass geo-restriction and access any content you desire.

Q. Does Tor slow down the internet connection speed?

A. Since it jumps through sophisticated path of nodes in a random pattern,  depends on the distance / bandwidth between nodes, the transmission might be slower.

Q. Does Tor work in China?

A. The answer is NO, TOR is fully blocked in China, but we have another way to get around it. If in China, VPN might be the way to go if TOR is blocked. If in other countries, TOR might be the choice. User can always go to our website : www.PlutoBoXX.com , click “Go To My PlutoBoXX” and make changes.

Q. Can I change the SSID and password?

A. Absolutely! You can always change your SSID and password on our website : www.PlutoBoXX.com,  click "Go To My PlutoBoXX" and make changes,  as long as your PlutoBoXX II is connected. 

Q. Can I request a different color on my order?

A.PlutoBoXX II's device is produced in "white" color. Please let us know what your preferred color  by writing to us at support@PlutoBoXX.com. If we raise $100,000 or more, we will have a colorful selection of PlutoBoXX II for you.
story_txt:
Fed
up with figuring out the complicated VPN settings? 
It all started when I was working
in China, I found a large number of websites blocked by the Great Firewall that
were essential for me to access, such as my financial institutions in the US, as
well as Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, just to name a few. I had used numerous
VPN services and it was frustrating to deal with software installation and
updating the server lists again and again. I had also tried different free or
paid proxy services and found most of them with similar problems. 

 

There came the original PlutoBoXX
in September 2013, it is designed to solve the software installation and
updating servers problems, but the setup procedure was a bit clunky, and the
built in power supply was not necessary. The original PlutoBoXX only supports
our VPN infrastructure (www.PlutoVPN.com),
so there is a limited choice on servers. 
PlutoBoXX is based on open architecture, using Open DD-WRT as a base; we
added our own intelligent routing algorithm, and our own user interface. A
patent has been filed for this concept, and we are the first of its kind on the
market. 

PlutoBoXX 
I have used the original PlutoBoXX in China with great success! It is not a 100% smooth when watching a long streaming video, but most of the time it is stable. It can be slow at times depending on the type of Internet connectivity you use. Through analyzing and listening to our customers’ feedback, we set to kick off the second generation — PlutoBoXX II –it’s even more compact and easier to use. PlutoBoXX II has had major improvements over its first generation. Now, it is truly a Plug and Play device with no setting configuration from users. The device will automatically detect your connection method (via another router, or direct connection to Cable or DSL modem), and connect to the available VPN servers, or TOR bridges, without any user interaction. Advance users can still go to our website: www.PlutoBoXX.com and click “Go To My PlutoBoXX” to make changes. It is still based on Open DD-WRT software, and used OpenVPN protocol.

story:
We're not making rocket ships. They're simply AMAZING door covers made from athletic fabric.

DoorFotos are perfect for interior and exterior doors and take less than 28-seconds to install

Our Story

DoorFoto was born in 2018 with a simple goal…to offer Tampa residents a unique, more vibrant and stimulating option to decorate the doors of their homes during the Gasparilla Pirate Festival.

The Gasparilla Pirate Festival, started in 1904, is a several week long celebration in Tampa recognizing the mythical Spanish pirate legend, Jose Gaspar.  Hundreds of thousands attend the parades and community events during this unique season, and there is an air of Tampa pride as residents decorate their homes and doors.

We soon realized that we had stumbled onto something special as any door can be decorated with any image, any time of the year, for any reason.

 

Everything You'd Expect

 

 

Why Crowdfunding?

We are currently shipping over 1,000+ different images from our library of holidays and special occasions categories.  Sports licensing is different... and expensive.  NCAA schools want proof that consumers want your product.  With your help, we are going to use our crowdfunding money to secure 10 NCAA licensing contracts.  Customers already love our product and so will sports fans!  By supporting us, you will receive discounts up to 50% off our existing library of images at DoorFoto.com (THESE DO NOT INCLUDE ANY NCAA LICENSED IMAGES) and the chance to vote for your favorite NCAA team.  The schools that get the most votes will be the licenses that we target first.  So if you love this idea and want to show your school spirit, make sure to share this link with all your school friends!  Even if you don't care about NCAA licensed images, you can still support us and get a great discount off an amazing product.

 

How Will The Money Be Spent?

When you contribute to our campaign not only will you get a DoorFoto, but you will also get to vote for your favorite NCAA school.  Based on the level of contribution you could get 1x vote all the way up to 500x votes.  The schools that get the most votes will be the licenses that we target first.  NCAA has a licensing application fee per school.  This ranges anywhere from $250 - $2,500.  Our goal is to acquire 10 licensing contracts based on the schools that get the most votes.  In addition to this per-school fee, there is a one-time application fee of $1,000...so that's why we need your help.  We are currently shipping product, so when you contribute to our campaign you will get a DoorFoto, BUT it will NOT be a NCAA licensed image. You will get to pick from our 45 existing categories with over 1,000+ images.

What's The Risk In Backing This Campaign?

That's the great thing about this campaign.  You will receive a DoorFoto when you back us, as we are already shipping our product.  Just read all the great reviews below from DoorFoto.com.  Unlike other campaigns that are raising money at the idea stage or prototyping stage, we are already at the shipping stage.  The only risk that you are taking is that the school you vote for does not get enough votes to make the top 10 and therefore we will not be initially targeting them for NCAA licensing.

 

But...How Does it Work?

This is a great question as DoorFotos are made from athletic fabric.  Well, what does that mean?  There are other companies out there on the web that sell door covers made from decal materials, vinyl or some type of adhesive that is supposed to stick on your door.  They are cheap--even cheaper looking--and painful to install!  Trust us, we ordered all of them and tested each one.  Some require double-sided tape or special hooks on your door, and one type even peeled the paint from one of our doors.  DoorFotos are different as our athletic fabric is a blend of polyester and spandex, very similar to athletic clothes made by Nike, Under Armour or yoga wear made by Lululemon.  Because we use athletic fabric that is washable, reusable AND stretchable, our DoorFotos simply wrap around the face of the door like a fitted bed sheet.  As a result, you get a stunning image on the front of your door and it doesn't impact the back side of the door.  No tools are needed to hang a DoorFoto and installation should take you less than 28-seconds. 

 

 

What Size Door Does it Fit?

For manufacturing reasons, we are focused on the (4) most common sizes of 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 and 30x80 for exterior and interior doors.  Because DoorFotos are made out of a polyester/spandex blend they do have a little stretch so don't worry if your door is not exactly 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 or 30x80 as there is about 1" leeway in each direction. so if your door measures 35x79 or 33x80 then the DoorFoto will fit just fine.

How Do I Measure My Door?

Though DoorFotos are fabricated with 'stretchable' fabric, it is important to still measure your door to ensure the best possible fit. 

To measure your door, simply pull a tape measure across the width of your door while the door is open (measure the door itself, not the door opening).  Record or remember the number of inches the door width is (in inches).  Do the same by measuring the height of the door, while the door is open, measuring top to bottom.  Simple...that is the DoorFoto difference!

Measure width of the door:

 

Measure height of the door:

 

What About the Door Knob and Door Handle?

Great questions!  With our fabric DoorFotos you simply stretch the material over the door handle or door knob for a clean professional finished look. Because of the athletic, stretchable fabrics that we use it is easy to still access your door knob or door handle simply by moving aside the fabric to get access. When you don't need to get access to the door handle, knob or keyhole, simply cover it up with the fabric (watch video below).

 

Now Shipping!

Inspiration + Perspiration =

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Will I be getting an NCAA DoorFoto with this contribution?

A: NO. To be clear, we don't yet have licensing for NCAA images.  The purpose of this campaign is to raise money to purchase the licenses through the NCAA application process.  By contributing, you will earn votes for your favorite NCAA school for eventual licensing, and get to pick a DoorFoto from our library of over 1,000+ existing images at DoorFoto.com

Q: How do I get my perks?

A: After the campaign ends in 30-days everyone will receive an email with a customized coupon code that will allow you to go to DoorFoto.com pick out your favorite image and when you checkout and use your customized coupon code, it will $0 out your shopping cart.

Q: How does the voting work?

A: After the campaign ends in 30-days you will receive an email survey from us that will allow you to pick your favorite team that you want to vote for. We will apply the number of votes to each team and send out a final email within the week letting everyone know the top 10 teams that we will be targeting for NCAA licensing.

Q: How do I install a DoorFoto?

A: This is one of the greatest things about our product....IT IS SIMPLE TO INSTALL. Our DoorFotos are more like a fitted bed sheet. They are made out of a special blend of fabric and simply wrap around the face of the door. No tools, no cutting, no adhesive tape etc, etc, etc. The only thing you might need is a little step stool (depending on how tall you are) to reach the top of the door.

Q: How does the DoorFoto accommodate for the door hinges and door handle or door knob?

A: With our fabric DoorFotos you simply stretch the material over the door handle or door knob for a clean professional finished look. Because of the athletic, stretchable fabrics that we use it is easy to still access your door knob or door handle simply by moving aside the fabric to get access. When you don't need to get access to the door handle, knob or keyhole, simply cover it up with the fabric.

Q: What does the back of my door look like with a DoorFoto on it?

A: DoorFotos are made with stretchable fabric, elastic banding at the top and bottom, and corners sewn.  The amount of area the DoorFoto takes up on the BACK of your door is very minimal, with a small triangular area wrapped around the back corner of the door, so as to keep the DoorFoto in position and with the right amount of tension. 

Q: Can I re-use and wash my DoorFoto?

A: DoorFotos are made from athletic fabric...the same kind of fabric that you might be wearing right now from Nike or Under Armour. Because of this reason it is easily machine washable and can be put in a dryer without any worries about the color fading or shrinking. Yes, not only can you wash our DoorFotos, but you can use them over and over and over again. It is really that simple. And when you are not using your DoorFoto you simply fold it up like any other piece of clothing and store it away. This is what makes this product so great....the ease of use, durability and brilliant colors that won't fade in the washing machine.

Q: Where are DoorFotos made?

A: All of our fabric DoorFotos are made right here in the United States. To be more specific...in beautiful Tampa, Florida. We custom-fabricate every DoorFoto per order using the highest quality equipment and materials.

Q: What if I don't see the size that I need?

A: For manufacturing reasons, we are focused on the (4) most common sizes of 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 and 30x80 for exterior and interior doors. Because the DoorFotos are made out of a polyester/spandex blend they do have a little stretch so don't worry if your door is not exactly 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 or 30x80 as there is about 1" leeway in each direction. So if your door measures 35x79 or 33x80 then the DoorFoto will fit just fine. If you are unsure, email us.

Q: How Do You Make a DoorFoto?

A: We use a printing process called dye-sublimation to create our DoorFotos. Although there are other printing methodologies that we could use, we found that through extensive testing dye-sublimation provided us with the widest color gamut which gives us/you the most vivid and stunning imagery. 

 

DISCLAIMER: We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by or in any way officially connected to the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA). We don't have college licenses now but plan to apply for licenses after this campaign has been funded.
