To be clear, we don't yet have licensing for NCAA images.  The purpose of this campaign is to raise money to purchase the licenses through the NCAA application process.  By contributing, you will earn votes for your favorite NCAA school for eventual licensing, and get to pick a DoorFoto from our library of over 1,000+ existing images at DoorFoto.comQ: How do I get my perks?A: After the campaign ends in 30-days everyone will receive an email with a customized coupon code that will allow you to go to DoorFoto.com pick out your favorite image and when you checkout and use your customized coupon code, it will $0 out your shopping cart.Q: How does the voting work?A: After the campaign ends in 30-days you will receive an email survey from us that will allow you to pick your favorite team that you want to vote for. We will apply the number of votes to each team and send out a final email within the week letting everyone know the top 10 teams that we will be targeting for NCAA licensing.Q: How do I install a DoorFoto?A: This is one of the greatest things about our product....IT IS SIMPLE TO INSTALL. Our DoorFotos are more like a fitted bed sheet. They are made out of a special blend of fabric and simply wrap around the face of the door. No tools, no cutting, no adhesive tape etc, etc, etc. The only thing you might need is a little step stool (depending on how tall you are) to reach the top of the door.Q: How does the DoorFoto accommodate for the door hinges and door handle or door knob?A: With our fabric DoorFotos you simply stretch the material over the door handle or door knob for a clean professional finished look. Because of the athletic, stretchable fabrics that we use it is easy to still access your door knob or door handle simply by moving aside the fabric to get access. When you don't need to get access to the door handle, knob or keyhole, simply cover it up with the fabric.Q: What does the back of my door look like with a DoorFoto on it?A: DoorFotos are made with stretchable fabric, elastic banding at the top and bottom, and corners sewn.  The amount of area the DoorFoto takes up on the BACK of your door is very minimal, with a small triangular area wrapped around the back corner of the door, so as to keep the DoorFoto in position and with the right amount of tension. Q: Can I re-use and wash my DoorFoto?A: DoorFotos are made from athletic fabric...the same kind of fabric that you might be wearing right now from Nike or Under Armour. Because of this reason it is easily machine washable and can be put in a dryer without any worries about the color fading or shrinking. Yes, not only can you wash our DoorFotos, but you can use them over and over and over again. It is really that simple. And when you are not using your DoorFoto you simply fold it up like any other piece of clothing and store it away. This is what makes this product so great....the ease of use, durability and brilliant colors that won't fade in the washing machine.Q: Where are DoorFotos made?A: All of our fabric DoorFotos are made right here in the United States. To be more specific...in beautiful Tampa, Florida. We custom-fabricate every DoorFoto per order using the highest quality equipment and materials.Q: What if I don't see the size that I need?A: For manufacturing reasons, we are focused on the (4) most common sizes of 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 and 30x80 for exterior and interior doors. Because the DoorFotos are made out of a polyester/spandex blend they do have a little stretch so don't worry if your door is not exactly 36x80, 36x96, 32x80 or 30x80 as there is about 1" leeway in each direction. So if your door measures 35x79 or 33x80 then the DoorFoto will fit just fine. If you are unsure, email us.Q: How Do You Make a DoorFoto?A: We use a printing process called dye-sublimation to create our DoorFotos. Although there are other printing methodologies that we could use, we found that through extensive testing dye-sublimation provided us with the widest color gamut which gives us/you the most vivid and stunning imagery.  DISCLAIMER: We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by or in any way officially connected to the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA). We don't have college licenses now but plan to apply for licenses after this campaign has been funded.

story:
The Purrfect Cat Box™  is completely safe for your cat(s)! Our cats have been using and loving the Purrfect Cat Box samples for years. Plus, they are made right here in Colorado so there is no need to worry about the risk of contamination often found in products made overseas. Additionally, the inks used in printing on the box are compliant with the Toxics in Packaging Clearing house, as well as the Toy Safety Standard.

Hi, I'm Scott Salzman! I have two cats (and one dog) who share my home and, for the past 16 years, I have been working full-time as an inventor. My products have won awards and been featured in/on the Today Show, Good Morning America, Real Simple Magazine, Better Homes & Gardens, etc. 

Throughout my inventing career, I’ve done lots of shipping. And that results in piles of boxes laying around for my cats to play with. I started keeping some in the house for my cats and they began choosing the boxes over the nice beds that I had purchased for them. Well, those boxes often were dirty from shipping, had labels on them, were too big/small etc. Basically, they looked lousy. That’s when I started designing, and the Purrfect Cat Box™ was born. 

The Purrfect Cat Box is my newest project and it’s all set to manufacture. The box manufacturer is just down the road in Denver, CO and the project details have been worked out prior to the Kickstarter campaign launch. Therefore, I don’t anticipate any delays in shipping your Purrfect Cat Box(s). 

If you want to learn more about my other inventions, feel free to check out: Spotless Paw®, Mobile Meditator®, Spotless Swing® and Groovy Glove™.

Is the box safe for my cat? 

Yes. Our cats have been using samples of these boxes for years. The inks used to print the box are compliant with Toxics in Packaging Clearinghouse (CONEG) regulations, as well as the Toy Safety Standard (ASTM F963).

What size is the box? 

14” x 10” x 5” (36 cm x 25 cm x 13 cm).

When will you start shipping?

We will start shipping the Purrfect Cat Box in October!

Can you please explain your shipping costs? 

We have done our best to keep costs as low as possible. In fact, we are absorbing 30% of the shipping costs. Shipping prices have drastically increased in the last years for small companies like us. It is a part of online shopping; if you are not paying for it directly, it is included in the cost of the product. We hope that you understand.

Where are the boxes made? 

Denver, Colorado, USA

How long will my box last? 

That answer, of course, depends on your cat and if it has destructive tendencies. If it doesn’t get chewed up, puked in, etc. it can last for quite a while. Our first samples are about three years old and still in use. And the latest design is much sturdier than the original.

Can I use the Purrfect Cat Box for my dog?

Yes! We LOVE dogs and the box is the perfect size for small dogs. We felt the picture below was too cute not to share, so please enjoy! :)

story:
We are overwhelmed by all the support our swedish customers has given us as a small second hand shop located in Gothenburg and we are getting messages and customers from other cities asking us when we will be able to deliver  deliver to their down, and it´s now time to open up new shops so we can cover the vibrant cities Stockholm and Malmö and meet our customers demand. 

We provide luxury furniture and home electronics such as smart tv etc to a second hand price that is hard to refuse... the best part is that we deliver it for free ourselves. Join us in our journey to cover all of Sweden and latermore Scandinavia.

story:
What is HOOK?

Have you ever missed a place to hang your jacket, purse or scarf in a restroom?

This irritating and everyday problem is soon history. The only thing you need is a door in a normal frame, and HOOK.

HOOK is a universal, simple, cheap and clean portable hanger. HOOK is a standard credit card-sized format made of one piece of molded Polypropylene (PP). The product has two hinges, a reinforced hook-function and weighs a mere 3,7 grams. Keep it in your wallet and use it again and again.

HOOK is strong an an ant and smart as an elephant!
Just find it, fold it and fix it!

There is filed both an international patent application (PCT) and a design protection on HOOK.

What we need, and why

The last two years HOOK has been developed on sparetime and private savings.

Now we are raising $20,000 mainly for the steel production tool (injection moulding) and to be able to place the order for the first batch of HOOKs. After researching different producers we have found a potential partner and a price for the first series of HOOK. We will also use some of the money to make and launch a nifty web-shop for HOOK this autumn.

How does the awesome HOOK work?

HOOK is simple as:

FIND IT

Keep HOOK in your purse or wallet.
When in need pull it out from the card compartment.

 

Fold it

Fold the two hinges to a Z-shape. The hinges are designed to easily fold both ways. This makes HOOK useable on both the lock- and hinge side of the door.

 

Fix it

Place HOOK between the door and the door frame as you close the door. Pull HOOK downwards until it jams firmly. If the door fits poorly in the frame, place HOOK over one of the door hinges as you close the door. HOOK is ready for use!

…and does it really work?

Believe me! When the solution to the initial problem emerged in the shape of a card, we made several test models. These models were made of standard sheet plastic cards, and we have tested about ten of them in hundreds of toilets in five different countries through 2 years. The first functional prototype, as seen in this presentation holds 5 kg / 11 Lbs when optimally fixed in place.

How can you help?

You can help us by pledging and by spreading the word. All contributions from 20 $ guarantee you your very own HOOK with shipping included, so why wait?

Thank you for your attention and your support. We are available to answer your questions.

About me

My name is Bjørn Bye and I`m an industrial designer and copywriter from Oslo. During my carreer I have worked on a number of products with impact in Norway and abroad. One of them the is the babystroller Stokke Explory which has a global distribution and has a place in the design collection at MoMa, N.Y. Explory was developet during my time in K8 Industridesign, where I was one of three founders. I always find design for the simple, everyday problems the most rewarding to solve. This is the first product I take all the way to the shop – and yes, I really hope for your kind support. Besides myself I have two project co-workers who are paramount to the realization and marketing of HOOK.

story:
The Hydria Pot is a beautiful and simple water droplet collector designed by João Tomaz. It is designed to keep the roots of plants moist for longer periods.


The Story:

While I was involved in a reforestation activity I realized that a device could be created to provide water to the sensitive and fragile new root system of a plant in the first days of its life.
I visualized water droplet pictures and this became the direction for the design of the Hydria Pot.
The first design ideas emerged following research into ancient knowledge and natural systems such as the desert beetle that harvest moisture from the air with the own body every morning to drink water and survive.

I then studied energy efficient technology that also has minimum environmental impact, considering also locally sourced materials and simple irrigation methods.
The goal of the design was to create a simple, reusable, low energy impact object made from natural materials.
This resulted in the Hydria Pot - a locally sourced clay pot that collects air moisture and stores water droplets.

Design concept:

The project observed how animals and plants in different bionetworks collected and used moisture from the air to survive.
Morning dew is one of the most important resources for millions of small animals and plants; providing nutrients and water needed to strive and grow on this magnificent planet. Morning dew also evaporates as the sun rises. 


How Hydria Pot works:


The Hydria Pot is a Design mimicking Nature!

As night temperatures drop, condensation will form on the upper leafy part of the pot. Gravity driven water droplets will follow the metal veins and conduct the condensation into the clay pot, where it will remain until fully absorbed by the roots.
To optimise the Hydria Pot, water can be added during dry spells.
This porous pot can collect a reasonable amount of water which it releases slowly during the following days; it requires no energy and no maintenance.
This is an energy free device that can water your plants, saving you time and money It is the perfect gadget for your trees and plants!


Using Hydria Pot indoor provides moisture to your plants for about 5 days



Gardening tool for root moisture constant supply.


Morning dew collector.



Hydria Pot design scheme


Fundraising objectives:

$31,000 total
$10000 research & development
$10000 marketing
$11000 materials

Hydria Pot production & distribution will start as soon we have raised  sufficient funds.  We believe we can reach our estimated goal with your help. We are already working with our manufacturers on the production of the Hydria Pot and need further funds to manufacture and ship the first batch.

For each Hydria Pot sponsorship we will plant a tree to reclaim the Natural World!

For your contribution to Hydria Pot:

There is one exclusive reward for the true Hydria Pot enthusiast.  We shall be designing a unique top section which will be available for a limited time only.


PERKS - Your contribution 




The Hydria Pot pack includes:

·  One painted metal leaf.
·  One clay porous pot.
·  Instruction manual.


Hydria Pot Specs:

    • Simple to use - just dig a small hole in the ground next to the plant and insert the Hydria Pot until almost fully buried leaving 1cm of the pot above the ground.
    • Holds 350ml (11.8floz) of water.
    • Requires low maintenance and minimal energy input.
    • Fungus and bacteria free material.
    • Improves your plants health as the clay acts as a natural filter.
    • Minimal carbon footprint as the clay is locally sourced and produced.
    • Saves time watering plants by keeping them moist for a longer period.
    • Supplies enough moisture to prevent the delicate root system from dehydration.
    • A reliable, durable and reusable object. Made of long lasting materials.
    • The long amphora shape provides the perfect design to be easily removed from the ground and reused.


    Part of the funds for each Hydria Pot sponsorship will go towards planting hundreds of trees in Portugal, by certified tree organisation plant one tree.

    With your support we can make the Hydria Pot dream come true!

    Plant One Tree Logo

    Website: www.plantarumaarvore.org
    Facebook page: PlantarUmaArvore


      FAQ

      If my question hasn't been answered, who should I contact?
      All information is available on our website       http://hydriapot.com/press
      However, please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions by email to contact@hydriapot.com




      When will I receive my Hydria Pot?
      Estimated Shipping Date: March 2015
      We are working hard to get the Hydria Pot manufactured to the highest quality to ship as soon as possible.

      Is the Hydria Pot available to buy from retail stores?
      Not yet, but it will be available soon      .

      What species of trees will be planted?
      We are working with       Plant one Tree, the largest local certified organisation in Portugal who help generate awesome green forests by only planting native species such as Oaks (Quercusrobur) or Cork (Quercussuber).

      Where is Hydria Pot manufactured?
      The       Hydria Pot will be manufactured at the Design We Need headquarters in Lisbon, Portugal. The materials are locally sourced and produced using artisan techniques.

      How does the Hydria Pot work? What does it provide?
      The Hydria Pot is a simple device.  The base is made of clay and the upper part is painted metal. When optimal condensation conditions occur, gravity will conduct the water droplets into the porous clay pot. The accumulated water will be slowly released and absorbed by the surrounding plant roots, during the next few days.

      Does the Hydria Pot work in a plant container?
      Yes! The       Hydria Pot was designed to be used in a medium sized plant container. The dimensions of the Hydria Pot size are 12.9 x 3.1 In / 33 x 8 cm.
      Insert the Hydria Pot until almost fully buried leaving 1cm of the pot above the ground.

      Is there a charge for International Shipping?
      Yes, there is an additional international shipping charge of $12 in the $75 Perk.
      Please email us if you have any specific questions about postage charges.

      Marketing!
      YOU can be part of the genesis of Hydria Pot. Please tell your friends and family, and POST ON       FACEBOOK, TWEET,  PINTEREST and G+

story:
Along with the JOY of the Holiday Season, comes the Colds, Flus, Stress and Anxiety of making everything perfect for your loved ones.


Ovvio Oils will have you covered with your Natural Healing Holiday Survival Kit. 

When it comes you the physical, mental, and emotional health of you and your loved ones, don't buy just any cheap essential oils off the internet.  

Not all essential oils are created equal.   The truth is many companies will claim to have high quality and "pure" oils, but what they are really selling you are industrial grade and sometimes diluted oils from countries like China.  Things like distilling methods, harvesting techniques, chemical free soils, and place of origin matter with essential oils.

When we launched Ovvio Oils earlier this year, our aim was to build the company the right way, and partner with the experienced premium sources to bring only the highest quality and most potent oils anywhere in the world to our customers.   We introduced our oils on Amazon.com just a few short months ago, to an audience who is notoriously critical and public with their opinions, and the response has been overwhelming with over 140 (and counting) mostly 5 Star Reviews on Amazon (zero negatives so far)!  

As the adage suggests, when you build it, they will come, and boy did they come!

When people tried our first product called Inhale Respiratory Blend, word spread fast.  Even though we are one of the most expensive blends on the market (necessary for the premium ingredients we buy) we could hardly keep them on the shelves and our customers are demanding more. 

Why we need your help (and will make it worth your while)

We want more than anything to give consumers what they're demanding, but as a true mom and pop startup, we don't have the capital to grow at anywhere near the rate we need to.   That's where the idea of crowdfunding came in. 

What we want to develop for this Holiday Season

Our new Holiday Gift Set will be the perfect gift or just simply a kit to have in your own arsenal to prepare for the holidays.   Don't let yourself turn to chemical laden over the counter meds to combat your every ailment!  While those medicines have their place, they are extremely overused in our society, while natural alternatives are out there waiting to be taken advantage of. 


The Holiday Set (MSRP $149) Includes

  • Inhale - Respiratory blend.  The one that started it all. Inhale, a potent blend of six essential oils from different corners of the world which is free of anything that could harm you, your children or our environment. Packed with the goodness of 100% Pure undiluted Eucalyptus, Peppermint, Lavender, Rosemary, Cedarwood and Clary Sage, Inhale will give you instant relief from allergies and seasonal diseases.  (MSRP $39.95)

  • Unwind - Stress Relief Blend.  With the power of eight essential oils which are perfectly blended by our experts of over 20 years, this blend will put you at ease instantly, with its calming effect on the mind and body.  Ingredients include Lavender, Bergamot, Mandarin, Geranium, Clary Sage, Vanilla Elemi, Frankincense.  (MSRP $39.95)

  • 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Peppermint.  Remember what we said about not all oils being created equal?  That is certainly the case here.  Due to its extreme popularity, Peppermint oil is one of the most common oils for low standard companies mass produce, dilute, and knock off.   Rest assured that you will only get the best from us. Peppermint, which is one of the oldest medicines in the world, is a great cure for headaches, indigestion, and stomach problems, and will surely get your home smelling amazing to get you in the mood for Christmastime!  (MSRP 29.95)

  • 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Frankincense.  When we see other companies selling bottles of frankincense for under $10 we have to cringe.    In ancient and biblical times, the Egyptians held this oil sacred for its meditation enhancing and healing properties.  And today, the purest and most skillfully harvested and distilled frankincense oils still come from Egypt, which is where we go to import it. Experience Egyptian Frankincense for yourself, you will be amazed. (MSRP $49.95)

What They're Saying

As we stated, the response to our oils has been tremendous in just a short period of time! Here's one testimonial from our Ovvio Oils website:

"I have been a massage therapist for over 14 years and have an extensive collection of single note essential oils and essential oil blends. I am very particular about the quality and aroma, and try to avoid large manufacturers who do not disclose where they harvest their oils. I decided to purchase this oil because the seller appears to be very knowledgeable about the healing properties and harvesting methods of his/her suppliers."

And another enthusiastic customer:

"I been using this essential oil blend in the bath with our 2 little boys. It is really a nice blend. As soon as I opened the bottle and smelled the oil, my sinuses opened right up. I would recommend using this in a cold air humidifier if your little one is congested or sick. In our house we like to always put a nice EO in the bath, so this works perfectly."

Plus, here's a video testimonial:


What Funding Goes For

Because we are committed to not compromise on the top of the industry standards we adhere to when creating new essential oil products, development and sourcing costs are high for us. This gift set alone will cost over $20,000 to bring to the market.   We're looking for backers to help us make this product a reality, and any funding above what is needed for the gift set will be poured into the development of new and completely unique essential oil blends.

What's Next for Ovvio Oils?

We've been hard at work with our expert botanical oil development team dreaming up dozens of new products for 2014 and 2015.  We already have over twenty new formulas and single oils in the works, and would love to expand into many major offline retailers who have heard of our product yet demand high inventories.

A preview of things to come once the funding is available:

  • A Relaxation Blend
  • A Mood Enhancement Blend
  • A Sleep Help Blend
  • A Pain Relief Blend
  • A Germ Fighter Blend
  • A Muscle Relaxer Blend
  • A Natural Hand Sanitizer Blend

Just as we've turned heads with Inhale, we plan to make a big statement with each and every new blend to come.   Besides their effectiveness, we make each and every one smell amazing!  Which you'll appreciate if you've ever bought some the mass produced essential oil blends in the past.  

About Ovvio Oils

In 2008, Dayna was diagnosed with a condition called "Common Variable Immune Deficiency”. This causes her several recurring lung and sinus infections throughout the year, every year, along with other ailments that come with a compromised immune system.  

Discouraged by the effects over the counter medication was having on her liver, we set out to find alternative treatments for her respiratory issues, because taking too many over the counter medications such as pseudoephedrine causes other side effects and is hard on the liver.  When we later got word that her liver health is now suffering we set out to find other ways to treat her sinus and lung difficulties.   That’s when our association with essential oils started. We knew from our research about the questionable quality many products on the market. 

Given Dayna’s fragile health condition, we didn't want to use anything of questionable quality or diluted to a point that its effectiveness diminishes. The only way to be sure we used only premium quality therapeutic grade oils was to source them ourselves. We also ensured they came only from the regions of the world that had the specific soil conditions for each individual oil where it grows best.

That is how Ovvio Oils was born. ‘Ovvio’ is Italian for "Obviously, or Naturally, and was named for our love of Italy, the fact that we import oils from there, and because turning to essential oils was the obvious choice in our situation.  

An amazing advocacy group for her condition is the Immune Deficiency Foundation (IDF) http://primaryimmune.org/.  And in support of this foundation, 5% of all proceeds from this campaign will be donated to IDF. 

We are committed to helping others the same way we have been helped by finding natural healing through essential oils.  Check out the incredible reward packages we've put together for you!  Help us grow our company and make our mission a reality.  Thank you for your interest. 

Check out our products here and connect with our social media family here. 

Thank you in advance for helping to bring clean safe and effective essential oils from our home to yours!

story:
JellyTank is the ultimate jellyfish aquarium, one that solves all the problems that other tanks struggle with. A tank where pet jellyfish could thrive while keeping it affordable and low maintenance for owners.

  • A proprietary aquarium and flow bar design based on form & function, and backed by science with the assistance of a nationally accredited aquarium and research laboratory.
  • True laminar [pump driven] water flow similar-to what jellyfish would experience in their natural environment
  • A powerful Integrated mechanical and biological filtration system ensures optimal water quality and is easily accessible for maintenance and cleaning
  • A remote LED for easy lighting and mood changes
  • Tank is made of premium high-grade aquarium acrylic
  • Available in ultra-white or premium-black

 

  

 

 

 

We are currently growing moon jellyfish in our own facility preparing for the July/August launch of the JellyTank.  We are working with industry experts and marine biologists from across the nation to develop the best protocols and standards of practice to ensure we deliver the healthiest sustainable source of jellyfish available in the world today.

Our  aquaculture program will be overseen, staffed and managed by leading jellyfish aquaculture specialists in the country.  We are truly teaming up with the best and making sure our Jellyfish are happy and healthy!

  • Is this a freshwater or saltwater Jellyfish Tank?
    • ​JellyTank was designed for saltwater jellyfish.  
  • Where do I order jellyfish after purchasing the JellyTank?
    • Indiegogo doesn't allow us to sell the Jellyfish with the JellyTank, so we're giving our Indiegogo supporters a 50% coupon code on our website to order the Moon Jellyfish.  Once the campaign has completed, we will email you directions.
  • How many Jellyfish will fit in a JellyTank?
    • ​We haven't tested the capacity of the JellyTank yet, but we've had a total of 8 jellyfish in the tank ranging in size.
  • What do Jellyfish eat?  Where do I find the food?
    • ​Jellyfish eat baby brine shrimp.  We include a month's worth of jellyfish food in your starter kit.  The food can be found in most aquarium stores or on our website.  
  • Is the LED light controlled by an RF controller?
    • ​Yes.  We include a remote control that allows you to change the color of the LED light as well as change the brightness and speed.
  • What kind of Jellyfish do you recommend for the JellyTank and where do I purchase them?
    • ​We recommend Moon Jellyfish for the tank.  They are an incredible species that are easier to take care of.  We are currently growing Jellyfish in our facility and will have them available for sale on our website www.jellytank.com once the campaign has ended.

 

So who would have thought years later, while at a restaurant in Miami Beach, we would sit next to a HUGE jellyfish tank and end up falling in love.   Ever since that day, we've been fascinated with their tranquil movements and calming ways.

So a little over a year ago, we (Brock and Blake) ordered a desktop Jellyfish Tank for our office, a popular one we found online and spent over $400 to get it set up and going. After owning the tank for less than three weeks, the tank kept sucking the jellyfish through the grates and shredding them. It was very discouraging considering the tank was not only expensive, but we were killing jellyfish. So feeling defeated by these jellyfish tanks, we set out to design and develop a sustainable tank that would keep our jellyfish happy and healthy. A tank where jellyfish could thrive while keeping it low maintenance for owners. After a lot of research, trial & error, multiple designs, several prototypes and the assistance of jellyfish aquarium/aquaculture experts & professionals we are proud to present JellyTank.

 

 

Setting up the tank is very easy since the JellyTank already comes pre-assembled.

  • Fill your tank with 5 Gallons of Saltwater (Salt is included in your Starter Kit)
  • Add Bio Balls & Filter Pad
  • Plug in the LED light & Pump
  • Let the tank Cycle for 48 hours

And boom... once this is complete you will then visit our website to claim your Jellyfish.

Jellyfish are easy to maintain and require two major components.  Food and clean water!

  • Feed your Jellyfish at least once per day.  Twice per day if you would like to increase their size
  • Change 20% of the water weekly (1 gallon) and pull out any jelly food or waste daily.
story_txt:
Jelly Tank is a desktop jellyfish aquarium designed for the home, office or commercial space. Owning pet jellyfish are now easier than ever with our state of the art tank. The Jelly Tank is the most affordable aquarium that makes keeping jellyfish simple for anyone.
Our team of jellyfish experts have done extensive research on creating the best jellyfish tank that is user-friendly and easy to maintain.  We’ve put together a product that allows pet jellyfish to thrive in an environment without the worries of getting hurt. The tank utilizes a laminar water flow pattern which mimics the natural open water habitat of jellyfish.
     JellyTank is the ultimate jellyfish aquarium, one that solves all the problems that other tanks struggle with. A tank where pet jellyfish could thrive while keeping it affordable and low maintenance for owners.
A proprietary aquarium and flow bar design based on form & function, and backed by science with the assistance of a nationally accredited aquarium and research laboratory.
True laminar [pump driven] water flow similar-to what jellyfish would experience in their natural environment
A powerful Integrated mechanical and biological filtration system ensures optimal water quality and is easily accessible for maintenance and cleaning
A remote LED for easy lighting and mood changes
Tank is made of premium high-grade aquarium acrylic
Available in ultra-white or premium-black
      
 Color Choices: Ultra White or Premium Black
We are currently growing moon jellyfish in our own facility preparing for the July/August launch of the JellyTank.  We are working with industry experts and marine biologists from across the nation to develop the best protocols and standards of practice to ensure we deliver the healthiest sustainable source of jellyfish available in the world today.Our  aquaculture program will be overseen, staffed and managed by leading jellyfish aquaculture specialists in the country.  We are truly teaming up with the best and making sure our Jellyfish are happy and healthy!


Is this a freshwater or saltwater Jellyfish Tank?​JellyTank was designed for saltwater jellyfish.  


Where do I order jellyfish after purchasing the JellyTank?Indiegogo doesn't allow us to sell the Jellyfish with the JellyTank, so we're giving our Indiegogo supporters a 50% coupon code on our website to order the Moon Jellyfish.  Once the campaign has completed, we will email you directions.


How many Jellyfish will fit in a JellyTank?
​We haven't tested the capacity of the JellyTank yet, but we've had a total of 8 jellyfish in the tank ranging in size.


What do Jellyfish eat?  Where do I find the food?​Jellyfish eat baby brine shrimp.  We include a month's worth of jellyfish food in your starter kit.  The food can be found in most aquarium stores or on our website.  


Is the LED light controlled by an RF controller?​Yes.  We include a remote control that allows you to change the color of the LED light as well as change the brightness and speed.


What kind of Jellyfish do you recommend for the JellyTank and where do I purchase them?​We recommend Moon Jellyfish for the tank.  They are an incredible species that are easier to take care of.  We are currently growing Jellyfish in our facility and will have them available for sale on our website www.jellytank.com once the campaign has ended.

 Inspiration - Wyland Mural
Growing up in Sarasota, FL, we were always at the beach swimming in the water which sometimes lead to getting stung by a Jellyfish.  They didn't hurt for too long, but you quickly grew to dislike jellyfish and want to stay away from them if you ever came across them again.So who would have thought years later, while at a restaurant in Miami Beach, we would sit next to a HUGE jellyfish tank and end up falling in love.   Ever since that day, we've been fascinated with their tranquil movements and calming ways.So a little over a year ago, we (Brock and Blake) ordered a desktop Jellyfish Tank for our office, a popular one we found online and spent over $400 to get it set up and going. After owning the tank for less than three weeks, the tank kept sucking the jellyfish through the grates and shredding them. It was very discouraging considering the tank was not only expensive, but we were killing jellyfish. So feeling defeated by these jellyfish tanks, we set out to design and develop a sustainable tank that would keep our jellyfish happy and healthy. A tank where jellyfish could thrive while keeping it low maintenance for owners. After a lot of research, trial & error, multiple designs, several prototypes and the assistance of jellyfish aquarium/aquaculture experts & professionals we are proud to present JellyTank. Top of JellyTank - Easy Access to Jellies & Filtration Setting up the tank is very easy since the JellyTank already comes pre-assembled.
Fill your tank with 5 Gallons of Saltwater (Salt is included in your Starter Kit)
Add Bio Balls & Filter Pad
Plug in the LED light & Pump
Let the tank Cycle for 48 hours
And boom... once this is complete you will then visit our website to claim your Jellyfish.Jellyfish are easy to maintain and require two major components.  Food and clean water!
Feed your Jellyfish at least once per day.  Twice per day if you would like to increase their size
Change 20% of the water weekly (1 gallon) and pull out any jelly food or waste daily.

story:
Short Summary

OMG they sold our building and we have to move!  And soon!!

I got this news about a week before my vacation in Maui and to tell you the truth it knocked me right off my center…. for about 2 days…. What are we going to do?…. Where are we going to go?…… Then I woke up…..

Hi I am Reverend Gayle Dillon and if you had told me twelve years ago I would be the Senior Minister for a growing spiritual community in Santa Fe, NM I would have thought you were nuts and not very grounded in reality. Truth is twelve years ago I was a high functioning drug addict/alcoholic working in corporate America and living in Seattle.  Then in September, 2002 I walked into Center for Spiritual Living – Eastside in Kirkland WA and the experience changed my life. I started taking classes, all the classes, I actually devoured the classes and said “YES” to the new me. I am proud to say my sobriety date is October 19, 2002. I became a Practitioner. I met the love of my life (I mention that because he is our music director now). In 2010 I graduated from the Holmes Institute and opened Everyday Center for Spiritual Living in Santa Fe, NM. Of course there are lots more details to my story, but this isn’t about me.

What are we going to do?! 

We’ve only been in our current building for 6 months and fixed it up soooo beautifully and everybody loves it!

Where are we going to go?!

We have already moved 3 times since starting in our living room in Sept 2010 and affordable spaces are really hard to find in Santa Fe!

Then I woke up!!

OMG what an opportunity to play bigger, to have more impact, to walk our talk and not shrink from change.  Then a building fell into our laps almost out of the blue.  I actually looked at this same building 3 years ago but we weren’t ready for each other.  But now we are both single and the sparks are flying! We need each other! The building needs a loving tenant and I want to be of service in a neighborhood just where it sits.  Perfect.

What We Need 

Our building is a diamond in the rough and needs some TLC.

That’s where you come in.

Our request is for $15,000. I know it’s a lot of money but we have very big ideas to go with it! All the money raised is going to be used to polish this diamond and create a space that people will want to come to everyday. Our intention is to create a spiritual center that becomes a destination point for people traveling to Santa Fe and a permanent spiritual community for those looking for a place to BE. The building is 8000 square feet and the entire interior needs to be painted. A portion of the funding would be for purchasing paint and paint supplies (we have volunteers to do the painting). New carpet throughout, removing old ugly florescent lights and installing pleasant warm lighting. The bathrooms need stalls (don’t ask, just trust me). We are grateful to have a big kitchen but it needs to be remodeled too (an oven has already been donated!). As we grow we can knock out a couple of walls upstairs and voila! a balcony overlooking the sanctuary (very cool). Like I said its great space but it needs some TLC to shine.

We are taking this move a room at a time. Sanctuary first. ALL funds raised go directly to improvements and improvements only. As a bonus for you, because we are a nonprofit Spiritual Center all donations are tax deductible. For any donation of $50 or more you will receive a letter for your taxes with all the appropriate info included.

The Impact

Everyday Center for Spiritual Living exists to empower people to live joy-filled lives. It’s really that simple, and we do that by teaching among other things the spiritual practices of gratitude, meditation, forgiveness, intention and prayer. 

Visit our website at www.everydaycsl.org for the full spectrum of what we do.

The Center is named Everyday Center for Spiritual Living (ECSL) for a specific reason. Our intention is to be that place where people can gather Everyday. A place they want to be Everyday and a place where people grow and have community. ECSL is meant to be an Everyday experience. The intent of ECSL is to build community, offer pastoral care programs and be an active member of the Santa Fe community through outreach programs. The Center is "out of the box" in its design and feel. When you walk into the Center you enter into a bookstore and coffee house with comfy couches and a place to hang. The stage doubles as a venue for local and touring musicians, open mics, and poetry slams. In addition the bookstore and coffee house will provide us with a financial flow to aid in the support of all the programs we envision providing to our community and to the Santa Fe area. There is a meditation/prayer room where people can drop by throughout the day to pray, to meditate or to just sit with the Divine in silence. There is a room for movement.  To engage body, mind and spirit; be it yoga or tai chi or other forms of exercise that embodies being physical while staying grounded and connected. And many more possibilities. Of course there is the sanctuary for Sunday and weekday services plus events like Spiritual Talk Series, Spiritual Cinema and seminars of all kinds. We envision events that bring our community together and spread the ideas of this philosophy throughout the greater Santa Fe area.  We want people to come to our Center regardless of where they spend their Sundays. Yes we hope through all these offerings people will be drawn to our Sunday Spiritual Gatherings but more importantly is opening up this philosophy to people in entirely new empowering ways. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I have NO idea how to make things go viral; maybe I should add a cute cat video. Although we have fabulous perks, sometimes people can only give a minimal amount. What if this campaign went viral on Facebook, Twitter, etc. and everyone gave $1.00 – WOW that would be amazing. So if you could pass this on to all your email lists and post the link on your FB page we will surely meet our goal! It would be GREATLY appreciated.
