story:
Oreous™ is a team of young, experienced designers and innovators with an entrepreneurial flair as a common asset. Together, they have spent more than 24 months in research, development, engineering, design, craftsmanship, science, and technology in order to formulate the most advanced materials that make up the Oreous™ pillow, the comfiest and most technologically advanced pillow in the world!

The environmental impact in every single component, raw material, and production method in making the Oreous™ pillow has been carefully considered and given high priority, replacing traditional production methods and raw materials with new eco-friendly processes as part of our philosophy. Our microloops expanded using water instead of harmful gasses as an example, and the Lenpur cover is 100% biodegradable.

The Oreous™ manufacturing network in Italy has been fully optimized for mass production, sourcing the highest quality raw materials with the most advanced efficient machinery available, and they are ready to go.

SUPPORT US TODAY AND GET THE BEST SLEEP POSSIBLE!

Our microloops expanded using water instead of harmful gasses as an example, and the Lenpur cover is 100% biodegradable.The Oreous™ manufacturing network in Italy has been fully optimized for mass production, sourcing the highest quality raw materials with the most advanced efficient machinery available, and they are ready to go.SUPPORT US TODAY AND GET THE BEST SLEEP POSSIBLE!                Get Your Project Funded Today!

Even though we have achieved our original goal on Indiegogo , our mission is not nearly over yet. We have now introduced a new InDemand program with Indiegogo where you can continue to contribute to our campaign, so we can put more effort into the development, tooling and manufacturing of Tittle Light. We are committed to produce the best products we can, and we couldn't have done it without your generous support. So come learn more about us, and see how you can help us make Tittle Light come true!
















 














More information about Tittle on our website.

story:
About iacopo

my name is iacopo torrini. I am an italian architect living in japan since 1998. This is my 5th crowdfunding campaign: I`d appreciate if you check the previous ones for more details on my motivations and involvement with the traditional japanese carpentry.

→　https://igg.me/at/pocket-onsen

→　https://igg.me/at/hinoki-aroma-cards

→　https://igg.me/at/teahouse

→　https://igg.me/at/moon-shaped-bathub

 

Why daybed?

there are more daybeds around us than you can imagine. Think of the timeless designs of Lecorbusier's LC5 or Mies` Barcelona. There are many heavenly refined models by scandinavian designers such as Poul Kjaerhold, Ben Erikson, Carl Hansen, Martin Høgh Olsen or Craig Bassam and Scott Fellows. You can browse these items on the internet ... but here is a warning: there is so much wisdom in these minimal design I recommend to keep a low daily dosage if you want to avoid falling in love ... with a day bed!

Anyway, there are 2 features that are absent from all daybeds on the market:

①JAPANESE DESIGN: despite Japan`s traditional wood joinery techniques being among the most prized worldwide, there is no high end japanese design daybed on the market. The same can be said for the famous japanese lumber: you will not be able to purchase a daybed made with hinoki or sakura, nara or keyaki. Well...not until now...

② ALL NATURAL: I have a business card holder made of wood. 100% wood. The button to open it, the spring, the hinge are all made with wood essences which are most suitable for the function. Not a single part of metal. not a nail, not a screw. I have been using it daily for 18 years and all the joints are tight and the movements effortless like day 1.

Wood is wonderful. Wood is warm and electrically stable. On top of this: japanese wood is gently aromatic and has antibacterial, insect repellent and anti-allergic properties.

You probably see my point: it is the time for the world to have finally:

① a daybed made with japanese wood and japanese woodworking techniques!

② a daybed made without metal parts for a relaxing, healthy regenerating experience!

last but not least, let me add the third main concept point:

③ COMFORT WITHOUT COMPROMISE:
This project is developed giving high priority to the design (simplicity, sharpness, lightness) but when it comes to comfort, I know you will accept no compromise. The mattress is finished with fine full grain leather (other versions with japanese traditional fabrics etc. may be available upon request).  The filling consists of 90mm of hard chip urethane and 20mm of low repulsion urethane. The whole thing is wrapped with acrylic non woven fabric which allows the leather to move smoothly. The mattress side will be tightened at 90mm thickness while the filling is more than 110mm. This results in a sharp and tight edge and a soft yet supportive super comfortable mattress.

What We Need & What You Get

As explained in the introduction, I produced the first custom "SU~ DAY BED" (call it prototype if you prefer) for my client Michael.

The cost breakdown is as follows:

wood construction: 285,000 JPY

leather mattress and cushion: 165,000 JPY (3 hides necessary)

reinforced cardboard packaging: 15,000 JPY

total: 4037 USD (@112.69 JPY/USD)

crowdfunding campaign price: 4500 USD

indiegogo and paypal fees (5%+4%) = 405 USD

developer`s profit: 58 USD

costs not included:

shipping by ocean freight + delivery to your door (in case of UK) 160,000 JPY

your country import taxes and VAT will be billed to you directly from your customs.

my economic motivation:

I am looking at developing this product and being able to sell it directly from maker to end-user with a 25% profit (about 6,000 USD ExWorks) after the crowdfunding campaign is finished.

In case the campaign does not reach the goal: since this is a fixed funding campaign, in case I will not able to reach the goal, any partial contribution/donation will be refunded and I will continue to develop the SU~ DAYBED outside of indiegogo.

Details

The frame external size is same like a "kyoma" size (Kyoto-module) tatami: the golden ratio of tatami mats! 1910 x 855mm (leather mattress sizes are 1810 x 755mm). The leather is going to be joined with a simple double stitch quilting and thru stitching to keep the tufting in place.

The Impact

By helping us making this project take off, you are also helping preserving the Japanese traditional crafts, for the benefit of the future generations.

Traditional crafts are in a difficult conjuncture and if we do not find alternative markets and products suitable for the contemporary demand, the handcrafts will be threatened by the risk of extinction.

The KAKEHASHI project (japanese for BRIDGE) aims at bridging the techniques and aesthetic sensibility of the traditional carpenters towards a stable and brighter future.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please mention the "SU~ DAYBED" project on your blog, facebook, spread the word with friends!

Even if you have to spare just half a second, push a button on the Indiegogo share tools bar and the magic will happen!

Thank you for reading up to the end and enjoy an energetic, relaxing nap!

story:
As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

 

ShadeCraft is well known for our luxury innovations including award-winning umbrellas Sunflower and Blossom. We are excited to announce Suntable is the first product within our invention portfolio that invites consumers to act as unaccredited investors. Accessibly priced with a broader audience in mind, Suntable invites you to Step Outside and be a part of a world-class brand. 

 

Let your friends in on the good news…

ShadeCraft is excited to bring Suntable to amazing humans like yourself, but we are equally thrilled to have you as an investor in our brand's latest and greatest. Your pledge goes beyond product production, you’re helping us learn how to be better, do better, and create products that will shape the life outdoors of future generations. 

ShadeCraft has quickly become recognized as one of the leading innovators in both design and technology, and Suntable deserves the same recognition. That's why we are grateful for people like you! You can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, and Instagram.

story:
! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
NOW AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE - CLICK HERE
/ | \

/-/ | \-\

/-/-/ | \-\-\

/-/-/-/ | \-\-\-\

||

||

What inspired us to create the Kuroi Hana range is that cooking should be more than just an everyday task; it should inspire creativity. We believe that creativity in cooking comes from a combination of supreme quality materials, artisanal craftsmanship, and aesthetic beauty.

Based on our experience in knife making we carefully selected a supreme quality Japanese steel called AUS-10. With a hardness range of 58-60 HRC, high toughness, supreme sharpness and good corrosion resistance, this steel is ideal for the highest quality Chef knives.

Our blade consists of 67 layers of premium quality Japanese steel. This multi-layered steel has its origin in both Japanese samurai and Damascene sword making.

 

 

 We worked with London designer Christian Bird, to create a contemporary and effortlessly beautiful design that ensured our knives were of the highest quality, both aesthetically and functionally.

 

 

 

 

Every KUROI HANA blade consists of 67 layers of Japanese high carbon steel from Aichi steel corporation. Each layer also contributes to a combined layered effect known as the ‘Damascus effect’. The result is this amazing dark floral pattern. This is KUROI HANA.  

The steel core is of AUS10. AUS-10 is Aichi’s most well-rounded knife steel. With a hardness range of 58-60 HRC, high toughness, scary sharpness and good corrosion resistance, AUS-10 is the recommended grade for high-end chef's knives.

This innovative high carbon steel core also contains Vanadium which improves the wear resistance, toughness, and ease of sharpening. The remaining layers are formed by alterations of S/S 430 and S/S 431 steel to create an outer case, protecting the cutting core.

The blade cutting angle is 35º (17.5 on each side for optimal sharpness).

story:
The World's First Mobile Pet Cam

Made for Dogs and Cats. End Pet Boredom and Separation Anxiety. See and interact with your pets remotely. Moves on carpet and hardwood floors.  

 

End Pet Boredom and Separation Anxiety

Leaving pets home alone can be stressful for pets and you. 
Stay connected with your fur babies no matter where you are.

Entertained While You're Away

Play an interactive game of laser chase, butterfly tease, or feather tease. 
You can even control which direction the laser points!

Built to Last

Made with industrial grade materials selected for toughness. The low center of gravity ensures the Pet Cam remains upright during play. Tested on over 500 sets of paws.

Treat Jam Prevention

The compartmentalized treat tray was engineered to prevent treats from jamming.

One Camera, Multi-Room View

Goodbye blindspots! Monitor your pet from room to room.
The wheels have treads so the Pet Cam can move on carpet or hardwood floors.

A built-in infrared LED filter lets you see your pet even in low-light conditions.

Built-in smart sensors prevent the Pet Cam from taking a tumble down the stairs and bumping into walls or pets!

 

 

 

Back with Confidence

Ready to Ship

We expect on-time delivery of the VAVA Mobile Pet Cam. The VAVA Mobile Pet Cam is our third crowdfunding campaign, and since then we have also made improvements to our logistics such as arranging for EU shipments from within the EU to minimize shipping times for our European backers. Back with confidence. 

Our Promise

Every pledge comes with an 18-month warranty, lifetime access to VAVA's friendly 24/7 phone and e-mail support, and access to backer-only groups. As a team of pet parents who work long hours, this project was extra special for us. We're excited to partner with you to bring the world's first mobile pet cam to market.
